text-decoration: none;\">May 21, 2015 at 9:27 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_62MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nindia must take putin's help and build our own CHIPS .<br />\n<br />\nour nuclear submrines must have our own chips. a submarine which can be POLLED and cannot hide is as good as dead in a war.<br />\n<br />\nIN MODERN WARS ONLY AN IDIOT WILL TRY TO KNOCK PUNCH OUT AN INCOMING MISSILE IN THE AIR<br />\n<br />\nMISSILES / FIGHTER JETS / DRONES ARE KNOCKED OUT BY FRYING ITS ELECTRONIC CHIPS FROM A SATELLITE -- OR HIJACKING ITS CHIPS .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU HIJACK A CHIP, THE ENEMY DRONE IS YOURS- TO BE REPROGRAMMED AND USED AGAINST THE ENEMY .<br />\n<br />\nEvery Zionist fighter jet manufacturer has a system to hijack the microprocessors by a KILL SWITCH that is activated by remote control .<br />\n<br />\nevery fighter jet has more than a 1000 chips - it is impossible to destect which is the TROJAN HORSE CHIP.<br />\n<br />\nUSA is worried bout Chinese chip invsions and US Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), the Pentagon's R&amp;D wing, has a secrey program named \" Trust in Integrated Circuits \"<br />\n<br />\nThis US Trust program has already started its prequalifying rounds by sending to three contractors four identical versions of a chip that contained unspecified malicious circuitry.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIt is practically IMPOSSIBLE to exhaustively test chips with BILLIONS of logic gates.-<br />\n<br />\nA mobile phone can be tested to check out if the phone's various functions work. Any extraneous circuitry that doesn't interfere with the chip's normal functions won't show up in these tests. And it is IMPOSSIBLE to detect this.<br />\n<br />\nTesting of chips is done \u2013say one in a thousand . It is IMPOSSIBLE to test every single chip.<br />\n<br />\nIt involves hundreds of man hours of grinding away a thin layer of the chip, put the chip into a scanning electron microscope, and then take a picture of it, repeating the process until every layer of the chip has been imaged.<br />\n<br />\nSpotting a tiny discrepancy amid a chip's many layers and billions of transistors is IMPOSSIBLE and the chip is destroyed in the process.<br />\n<br />\nFor ICs destined for mission-critical systems, it is IMPERATIVE to test every chip without destroying it.<br />\n<br />\nA kill switch is any manipulation of the chip's software or hardware that would cause the chip to die outright--to shut off a TEJAS 2 missile-launching electronics<br />\n<br />\nUsers will NEVER be aware of the malicious intrusion--the enemy could use it to bypass battlefield radio encryption.<br />\n<br />\nThis is happening in Syria right now. Syrian radars cannot detect incoming missiles. Iranians will NOT allow this to happen. This is why Zionists are worried.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ONLY WAY OUT IS TO TAKE PUTINs HELP IN DEVELOPING OUR OWN CHIPS PROGRAM. The front door and windows might offer vault like protection, but there is a an unknown rear window deep in the basement for malicious use by the enemy who designed and built your home .<br />\n<br />\nChips can be down graded or made to have a lesser shelf life ( expiry date ). All it needs is a small nick of the chip\u2019s copper wiring. The fault, is IMPOSSIBLE to detect. The chip fails due to electromigration: as current flowed through the wire, eventually the metal atoms would migrate and form voids, and the wire would break.<br />\n<br />\nIf the chip goes into a defense satellite, where it's supposed to work for 20 years but fails after 2 years -- you have a very expensive, inoperative satellite.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_62MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_62BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_62B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_63B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1916198875215981650\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_63M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/sukhoi-su-35-russian-ufo-jet-fighter.html?showComment=1432180689308#c1916198875215981650\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 21, 2015 at 9:28 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_63MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\nDuring the Falklands war the British fleet knew the fuel capacity of the Argentinian fighter jets. The aircraft carrier and battle ships target was there to be easily bombarded , but the jets cannot land back on Argentinian land and they will have to ditch into sea destroying their aerial capacity. One fighter jet pilot told me , he did NOT understand why his bosses ordered him back without taking a shot at sitting ducks \u2014they knew only when they were debriefed.<br />\n<br />\nTo create a controlled kill switch, they add an extra logic to a microprocessor, which can be done either during manufacturing or during the chip's design phase. A saboteur could substitute one of the masks used to imprint the pattern of wires and transistors onto the semiconductor wafer\u2014so that the pattern for just one microchip is different from the rest.<br />\n<br />\nModern fighter jets use field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs)--a generic chip that can be customized through ENEMY software. If you put the FPGA in a military system, someone else can reprogram it. Libya and Syria has faced these problems. Building a kill switch into an FPGA could mean embedding say 500 transistors within its billions. Malicious chips have back doors.<br />\n<br />\nAn enemy who embeds a kill switch in every commercial router could devastate the whole national security without ever targeting the Defense Department directly.<br />\n<br />\nThe timer could be programmed with a single command- The whole defence mechanism fails.<br />\n<br />\nChip alteration can even be done after the device has been manufactured and packaged, provided the design data is available. Focused-ion-beam etching machine ( FIB ) shoots a stream of ions at precise areas on the chip, mechanically milling away tiny amounts of material like Microsurgery with the beam acting like a tiny scalpel to remove material, cut a metal line, and make new connections. They can dig several layers to get to the intended target. It is IMPOSSIBLE to detect.<br />\n<br />\nThey can reroute signals to the transistors that are already in place because chips commonly contain large blocks of unused circuitry, leftovers from previous versions of the design.<br />\n<br />\nSoft X-ray tomography can be used to penetrate the chip for inspection but not strong enough to do irreversible damage.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a technique called Boolean equivalence checking to analyze what types of inputs will generate certain outputs. This process can be reversed- to detect monkey play.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike India Pakistan has refused to allow KILL CHIPS in their defence mechanism both offensive and defensive. . At a recent hearing, a U.S. House Committee on Foreign Affairs addressed Pakistan's ongoing refusal to let the United States help it secure its nuclear arsenal with American technology.<br />\n<br />\nALICE IN GUJJULAND MODI THINKS INDIA IS INVINCIBLE IN A FIGHT WITH PAKISTAN-<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE NOT .<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN MODIs, SWAMYs , RAJNATH SINGHs AND PARRIKKARs WEBSITE \u2013 THE LANGUAGE IS STRONG \u2013<br />\n<br />\nIT IS INTENDED THAT WAY .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedPC7TD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedPC7TD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the U.S. federal\nlevel, an organization becomes a PAC when it receives or spends more than $2,600\nfor the purpose of influencing a federal election, according to the Federal\nElection Campaign Act. Super PACs, officially known as\n\"independent-expenditure only committees\", may not make contributions\nto candidate campaigns or parties, but may engage in unlimited political\nspending independently of the campaigns. Unlike traditional PACs, they can\nraise funds from individuals, corporations, unions, and other groups without\nany legal limit on donation size. Super PACs controlled by JEW Rothschild is a\nmajor influence in the elections. Super PACs are independent political\ncommittees that support a candidate with unlimited, often anonymous, donations\nfrom companies, unions, or individuals. The groups can't contribute directly to\na candidate, but they can run favorable ads about a candidate\u2014or negative ones\nabout their favored candidate's opponent. In the 2014 midterm campaign, 1,360\nSuper PACs raisded nearly $700 million, according to OpenSecrets.org. The\nalready lax rules governing Super PACs are riddled with loopholes. For example,\ncandidates cannot communicate or coordinate with PAC organizers, but they can\nspeak to a group of donors at a fund-raising event and leave the gathering\nbefore any planning or coordinating about fundraising occurs\u2014&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMERICAN EXCEPTIONALISM\nAT ITS BEST. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9dF3zG0QfYM/WCG4fjWttGI/AAAAAAABOpM/RiNID96ne0EMZC-Fnq-yuUzsOLO4KeaigCLcB/s1600/a8324f510da233W8276597816e29b36e5a9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9dF3zG0QfYM/WCG4fjWttGI/AAAAAAABOpM/RiNID96ne0EMZC-Fnq-yuUzsOLO4KeaigCLcB/s400/a8324f510da233W8276597816e29b36e5a9.jpg\" width=\"397\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; She claimed for weeks,\nstanding over the flag-draped coffins of murdered Americans, that an\ninsensitive YouTube video had incited the violence that occurred that night.\nWhy? Because a terrorist attack on the anniversary of 9/11 \u2013 which it was \u2013\nwould have destroyed President Obama\u2019s re-election chances.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">But hey, at the end of the day it\u2019s worth it\nto Clinton to tell a politically expedient lie, so long as her Rothschild's point man Obama can stay\nin power.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qMCsmVvr1PU/WCO3-jZ5RcI/AAAAAAABOzM/-cmuZbUbX94NxWQtsOQobe-rK7HRh8v4wCLcB/s1600/ima996ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qMCsmVvr1PU/WCO3-jZ5RcI/AAAAAAABOzM/-cmuZbUbX94NxWQtsOQobe-rK7HRh8v4wCLcB/s400/ima996ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary &nbsp;falsely denied her previous support for the\nTrans-Pacific Partnership. When Trump called out Clinton for previously calling\nTPP \"the gold standard of trade deals,\" Clinton flatly said\n\"no\" and in a most sarcastic manner accused Trump of living \"in\nyour own reality.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;The former\nSecretary of State attempted to worm her way out of it by claiming that she had\n\"hoped it would be a good deal\" but couldn't support the finalized\nversion.&nbsp; This is a terrific lie. &nbsp;In 2012, Clinton's full quote on TPP was:\n\"This TPP sets the gold standard in trade agreements to open free,\ntransparent, fair trade, the kind of environment that has the rule of law and a\nlevel playing field. And when negotiated, this agreement will cover 40 percent\nof the world\u2019s total trade and build in strong protections for workers and the\nenvironment.\"&nbsp; Clinton's statement\nwas crystal-clear at the time; she did view the TPP as a good deal, not that\nshe \"hoped\" it would be a good deal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RC59f6VkuhQ/WCO3XzgnUDI/AAAAAAABOzA/VA0xRrd9T0onP9wa7E29ZeQPW4joziF_ACLcB/s1600/Hillary-Clirrnton-Lying-e1456283261441.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"570\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RC59f6VkuhQ/WCO3XzgnUDI/AAAAAAABOzA/VA0xRrd9T0onP9wa7E29ZeQPW4joziF_ACLcB/s640/Hillary-Clirrnton-Lying-e1456283261441.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinton lavished praise\non the Iran deal for supposedly stopping Iran's nuclear program when it really\ndidn't. \"My successor, John Kerry, and President Obama got a deal that put\na lid on Iran's nuclear program without firing a single shot,\" Clinton\nsaid. \"That's diplomacy. That's coalition-building. That's working with\nother nations.\"&nbsp; In actuality, Iran\nopenly flaunted the fact that they were violating the agreement's cap on their\nnuclear program, and yet Obama delegated authority to a joint commission that\nprovided permanent exemptions to Iran on their violations. Obama and Kerry knew\nthis, yet declared that Iran was in \"full compliance\" with the deal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j3ho-zHND7E/WCO2zNzEblI/AAAAAAABOy8/aTs5wficmJsSHaru68R-PyUvNy_UiFUkgCLcB/s1600/doxwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j3ho-zHND7E/WCO2zNzEblI/AAAAAAABOy8/aTs5wficmJsSHaru68R-PyUvNy_UiFUkgCLcB/s400/doxwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_237M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Thus other countries are generally seen as trying to follow or catch up<br />\n<br />\nAmerican exceptionalism contains a complicated and often contradictory set of assumptions. These assumptions do NOT stand up to the test of logical and empirical analysis. It is more akin to a cluster of stories that provides buttresses for pseudo-analytical judgments about American national identity.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild bequeathed to the American colonies the tradition of Protestant dissent, and that has been a very important part of American exceptionalism<br />\n<br />\nThe idea was touted that Protestantism is superior to Catholicism, let alone other religions, in allowing the development of an individual and as a counter to autocratic and hierarchical power. This idea of Protestantism\u2019s superiority flourished in 19th century U.S. exceptionalist ideas.<br />\n<br />\nPROTESTANT RELIGION WAS CREATED BY JEWS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html<br />\n<br />\nProtestantism, especially evangelical Protestantism, is still a vital component in American culture and identity. Exceptionalist ideas don\u2019t just stem from the age of the American and French revolution, but go deeper.<br />\n<br />\nFor America to buy into tired old Rothschild\u2019s socialist rehetoric while at the same time ignoring the fact that he had absolutely no record as a legislator or as an administrator is truly \u201cexceptional.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe idea is now applicable to United States by the time of the birth of the U.S. republic, when exceptionalism became associated with the liberal and individualist values that so many Americans still cherish.<br />\n<br />\nWhat was \u201cexceptional\u201d about America is it\u2019s very origins are found in constitutionalism. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE IRISH POTATO BLIGHT\nFAMINE WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On September 9, 1845,\nIrish newspapers reported for the first time that there was a famine in\nIreland. At that time, the population of Ireland was 8,295,000 by a census\n.&nbsp; By 1851, there were fewer than six\nmillion people remaining there, again by a census .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Irish immigrants\nmurdered the&nbsp; last full-blooded Aborigine\nin Tasmania in 1876.&nbsp; In Australia they\ndistributed small pox blankets to exterminate the aborgines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Irish must know\nthat they were forced to migrate .&nbsp; Moe\nthan&nbsp; 70 shiploads of food ( live stock,\ngrain, poultry etc ) per day was removed from Ireland by Rothschild\u2019s\nships.&nbsp; Around 150,000 soldiers and wars\nships stood guard while the Irish watched in sheer dismay.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enough white skinned\nsoldier recruits would soon arrive America to be used as cannon fodder . .In\nthe American civil war&nbsp; mostly Irish died.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/the-charge-of-light-brigade-exhuming.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/the-charge-of-light-brigade-exhuming.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">U.S. exercised\nsovereignty over a number of overseas territories, including Puerto Rico,\nHawaii, Guam, the Philippines, and Cuba. Paradoxically, Americans' belief in\nits exceptional nature helped to inform the acquisition of such colonies, as\nAmericans believed they were uniquely suited to ruling foreign peoples\nbenignly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2mAYVeBO8EU/WB2jeFXVePI/AAAAAAABOJ0/ZPGpKkQkfD8vCMCJclP-JcKopgS28OVrQCLcB/s1600/quote-the-american-way-of-life-as-i-see-it-AA2is-really-the-american-way-of-death-everything-lydia-lunch-119-70-85.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2mAYVeBO8EU/WB2jeFXVePI/AAAAAAABOJ0/ZPGpKkQkfD8vCMCJclP-JcKopgS28OVrQCLcB/s640/quote-the-american-way-of-life-as-i-see-it-AA2is-really-the-american-way-of-death-everything-lydia-lunch-119-70-85.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even when not under\ndirect U.S. rule, many Latin American states felt the weight of US influence in\nthe formation of their political institutions. Simply put, American\nexceptionalism ensured that Castro, Allende, Pinochet, and Ch\u00e1vez got into\npower.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T6LO0IgIBQE/WB3P2AVhh_I/AAAAAAABOMc/pfRHFlFpr98eug0f3_5D_cWRXHfKCpVjQCLcB/s1600/quote-the-government-which-was-desigKKKned-for-the-people-has-got-into-the-hands-of-the-bosses-and-their-woodrow-wilson-200170.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nterm AMERICAN EXCEPTIONISM has come to describe the belief that the United\nStates has an exceptional position among countries, and should not be bound by\ninternational law except where it serves American interests<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As of today in 2016,\nnone of the 15 religious courts permit same-sex marriage under their respective\nauspices. Consequently, Israelis who desire to have their same-sex marriage\nrecognized by the Israeli government must first wed outside Israel and then\nregister upon returning home<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American Jewish\nCommittee (AJC) celebrated the recent US Supreme Court ruling extending\nmarriage rights to homosexuals throughout the United States with a Twitter\nmessage which read:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cFor 109 years AJC has\nstood for liberty and human rights. Today is a happy day for that proud\ntradition \u201cLoveWins.\u201d &nbsp; It was punctuated with a heart emoticon splashed orange,\nyellow, green blue and purple\u2014the colors appropriated by the homosexual lobby.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Times of Israel wrote:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The contrast between an\norganization founded at the launch of the last century celebrating the rights\nembraced by Americans only at the launch of this one was emblematic of the glee\nwith which much of the Jewish establishment reacted to the ruling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Anti-Defamation\nLeague, in its own tweet, left out its age (102) but also got in the hashtag,\n#LoveWins, and that funny little heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The preeminence of\nJewish groups among those backing the litigants was not a surprise. In recent\ndecades, much of the Jewish establishment has embraced gay marriage as a right\nequivalent to the others it has advocated, including racial equality, religious\nfreedoms and rights for women.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multiple groups, in\ntheir statements, cited the passage in Genesis that states humans were created\n\u201cin the image of God,\u201d which has for decades been used by Jewish civil rights\ngroups to explain their activism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cJewish tradition\nreminds us that we were all created equally, b\u2019tzelem Elohim, in the \u2018image of\nGod\u2019 (Genesis 1:27), and also shows us that marriage is a sacred\nresponsibility, not only between the partners, but also between the couple and\nthe larger community,\u201d the Conservative movement\u2019s Rabbinical Assembly said in\na statement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paula Corbin Jones sued\nU.S. President Bill Clinton for sexual harassment. The Paula Jones case precipitated\nClinton's impeachment in the House of Representatives. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Bill Clinton entered\ninto an out-of-court settlement by agreeing to pay Jones 850,000 USD\u2014</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">100% proof that the charge was true.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kq-NJ8m2vrU/WB8huS_cj6I/AAAAAAABOTc/gu4fMGPyj2k7PlgFP2sD0tsG65z1vBGUgCLcB/s1600/down997load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kq-NJ8m2vrU/WB8huS_cj6I/AAAAAAABOTc/gu4fMGPyj2k7PlgFP2sD0tsG65z1vBGUgCLcB/s400/down997load.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kathleen Willey alleged\non the TV news program 60 Minutes that Bill Clinton had sexually assaulted her\non November 29, 1993, during his first term as President. According to Willey,\nduring a meeting in the private study of the Oval Office, Clinton had embraced\nher tightly, kissed her on the mouth, grabbed her breast, and forced her hand\non his genitals. Clinton stated that the allegation was absurd because Willey\nis a small-breasted woman and he would never pursue such a woman<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Let's see what *he said and decide* :<br />\n*\"If I am asked by any one to name two things*,<br />\n*which has destroyed this country or rather*,<br />\n*has not allowed the country,*<br />\n*to progress in the right direction, then the same is,*<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">*(i) Reservation*<br />*and (ii) Corruption*.</span><br />\n*It is very shameful for any citizen of this country to ask for reservation after 65 years of independence.*<br />\n<br />\n*When our Constitution was framed,*<br />\n*it was understood that the reservation would remain for a period of 10 years*, *but unfortunately,*<br />\n*it has continued even after 65 years of independence.*<br />\n<br />\n*The biggest threats*, *today, for the country is corruption.*<br />\n<br />\n*The countrymen should rise and fight against corruption at all levels*,<br />\n*rather than shedding blood and indulging in violence for the reservation.*<br />\n*The reservation has only played the role of an amoeboid monster sowing seeds of discord amongst the people*.<br />\n*The importance of merit, in any society, cannot be understated.*<br />\n<br />\nOne has to wonder why is he going to be impeached by MPs (mostly Congress MPs) .<br />\n<br />\n(The MPs who signed the petition include <span style=\"color: red;\">Anand Sharma</span>, <span style=\"color: red;\">Digvijay Singh</span>, Ashwani Kumar, P L Punia, <span style=\"color: red;\">Rajeev Shukla</span>, <span style=\"color: red;\">Oscar Fernandes, Ambika Soni</span>, B K Hariprasad (all Congress),<span style=\"color: blue;\"> D Raja (CPI)</span>, K N Balagopal (CPI-M), <span style=\"color: blue;\">Sharad Yadav</span> (JD-U), S C Misra and Narinder Kumar Kashyap (BSP), Tiruchi Siva (DMK) and D P Tripathi (NCP)).<br />\n<br />\n*YOU DON'T HAVE TO CANDLE MARCH to SUPPORT THE JUDGE. Just SPREAD THE WORD BY SHARING THIS WITH YOUR WHATSAPP FRIENDS, IF YOU CAN.*</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_160BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Google has responded via\nan email statement to the Washington Times:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201cGoogle Autocomplete\ndoes not favor any candidate or cause. Claims to the contrary simply misunderstand\nhow Autocomplete works. Our Autocomplete algorithm will not show a predicted\nquery that is offensive or disparaging when displayed in conjunction with a\nperson\u2019s name. More generally, our autocomplete predictions are produced based\non a number of factors including the popularity of search terms.\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vEpb3uU0Txc/WBjzb9gPOyI/AAAAAAABNzo/1rpD4dG1QQ8vKqnWjVTSGWrnFlgQ7I2CACLcB/s1600/imagkges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"367\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vEpb3uU0Txc/WBjzb9gPOyI/AAAAAAABNzo/1rpD4dG1QQ8vKqnWjVTSGWrnFlgQ7I2CACLcB/s400/imagkges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Google\u2019s search\nalgorithm can easily shift the voting preferences of undecided voters by 20\npercent or more\u2014up to 80 percent in some demographic groups\u2014with virtually no\none knowing they are being manipulated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Google adjusts its\nsearch engine algorithm 600 times a year, but the process is a closely kept\nsecret. They rely on it being almost impossible to prove favoritism in search\nresults, but it appears in this case the company has been caught with its pants\ndown by experts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHEN TRUMP BECOMES\nPRESIDENT-THERE WILL BE HAJAAAAR RETRIBUTION</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Obviously she is NOT going to White House to pray !</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DUJ0QNndNFU/WBjyimehzHI/AAAAAAABNzg/icZnex41x5M0T7HqrGwYUbxJB8M4jPxSACLcB/s1600/johanna_sheltDon-500x1024.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DUJ0QNndNFU/WBjyimehzHI/AAAAAAABNzg/icZnex41x5M0T7HqrGwYUbxJB8M4jPxSACLcB/s400/johanna_sheltDon-500x1024.png\" width=\"195\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_20M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">As per the&nbsp;\nLaws of Manu inform us that that the Yuga Cycle is of 12,000 years\nduration, and is comprised of four Yugas or World Ages \u2013 Krita or Satya, Treta,\nDwapara and Kali.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">As humanity moves from the Krita Yuga to the\nKali Yuga, the level of virtue and human capabilities, both physical and\nmental,&nbsp; gradually decrease, and reaches\nits nadir in the Kali Yuga, the dark age .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Our 4 Hindu yugas are a spiral-- at the rate\n4:3:2:1 . <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In the Kali yuga the cosmic cow stands of one\nleg. Dharma walks on four feet in Krutha/Satya Yuga, on 3 feet in Tretha Yuga,\non two feet in Dwapara Yuga and one foot in Kaliyuga- this is an allegory.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The 25765 years is divided into 4 yugas in a\nratio of 4:3:2:1. ( satya/ treta/ dwapara/ kali ) . The sun has this&nbsp; motion by which it revolves round a grand\ncenter called Vishnunabhi, which is the seat of the creative power.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The yugas during the approach to Vishnunabhi\nare 'ascending' yugas; those during the retreat from Vishnunabhi 'descending'\nyugas.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early voting (also\ncalled pre-poll voting or advance polling) is a process by which voters in a\npublic election can vote prior to the scheduled election day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early voting can\ntake place remotely, such as via postal voting, or in person, usually in\ndesignated early voting polling stations. The availability and time periods for\nearly voting vary among jurisdictions and types of election.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goals of early\nvoting are usually to increase voter participation and relieve congestion at\npolling stations on election day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The categories of\npeople who vote early include those who will be out of the polling area during\nthe election period, poll workers, campaign workers, people with medical\nprocedures scheduled for that time etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two types of\nearly voting: mailing in ballots and voting in-person before election day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As unconditional (no\nexcuse) early voting has gained ground, it is clear that this DAMAGES the democratic\nprocess\u2014as people have NOT heard out both candidates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five known investigations\nare into: Anthony Weiner, Huma Abedin's estranged husband sexting a\n15-year-old; the handling of classified material by Clinton and her staff on\nher private email server; questions over whether the Clinton Foundation was\nused as a front for influence-peddling; whether the Virginia governor broke\nlaws about foreign donations; and whether Hillary's campaign chairman's brother\ndid the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; It was later made clear there would be no other prosecutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was also revealed\nthat while she was at the State Department where she was Clinton's gatekeeper,\nAbedin received emails from Doug Band - Bill Clinton's right-hand man at the\nClinton Foundation - asking for help and access for 'friends' or 'friend of\nours'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Has previously been prolific Clinton\nfundraiser and chairman of the Democratic National Committee, and chairman of\nHillary's failed 2008 run for the White House.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FBI is\ninvestigating whether donations made were in breach of a ban on foreign\ngovernments influencing US elections. Chinaman Wenliang, a billionaire, is a\nmember of the one-party state's parliament - as well as a donor to the Clinton\nFoundation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; State Department chief of staff.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; she has already cut a deal with the FBI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She exchanged partial\nimmunity from prosecution in return for opening her laptop to FBI review during\nthe Clinton email investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mills was chief of\nstaff under Clinton at the State Department and communicated extensively on the\nClintonemail.com private server.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The deal with the\nJustice Department - headed by Attorney-General Loretta Lynch -&nbsp; was hugely advantageous as it also limited\nthe search to no later than January 31, 2015, the point at which&nbsp; the server's existence became known to a\nCongressional committee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March backups of\nClinton's emails were destroyed by a technician, a move which could have been\nseen as illegal destruction of evidence.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Sk0JtBkQfIQ/WBm74p9-kUI/AAAAAAABN3w/jipg_5_nz0golODfi4XL04pmdOSV82yqwCLcB/s1600/imaEEEges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Sk0JtBkQfIQ/WBm74p9-kUI/AAAAAAABN3w/jipg_5_nz0golODfi4XL04pmdOSV82yqwCLcB/s400/imaEEEges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Phillipe Reines</span>&nbsp;is Hillary\nClinton press secretary when she was senator; press secretary to failed 2008\npresidential campaign and spokesman for Chelsea during it; Deputy Assistant\nSecretary of State for Hillary; played Donald Trump in debate prep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reines was a key member\nof the inner circle when Clinton was Secretary of State.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His official title was\n'deputy assistant undersecretary' for strategy, effectively her most powerful\npublic affairs adviser. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That means that any\nknowledge he has of how the Clinton machine in the State Department interacted\nwith the Clinton Foundation and Bill Clinton Inc machines in Manhattan would be\ncrucial to the FBI investigation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">John Podesta </span>is THE 'Dean'\nof Clintonworld.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was Bill Clinton's\nfirst White House deputy chief of staff and later chief of staff; founder of DC\nlobbying firm Podesta &amp; Podesta, now the Podesta Group; took charge of the\nClinton Foundation in 2011 ; now Hillary campaign chairman; at 67, often seen\nas the 'dean' of the Clinton political machine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leaks from John\nPodesta's emails revealed by Wikileaks have shown how he was a key player in\nthe Clinton Foundation - at precisely the time that the focus of the FBI\ninfluence-peddling investigation is likely to be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time Clinton was\nSecretary of State and Doug Band, who had effectively run the foundation, wrote\na memo which emerged in Podesta's leaked emails.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In it, Band detailed\nthe overlap between the commercial activities of Bill Clinton and the\ncharitable fundraising of the William J. Clinton Foundation (now the Clinton\nFoundation) - material which is likely to be pertinent to the\ninfluence-peddling case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Podesta's role at\nFoundation lasted into 2012, so his knowledge of how it interacted with Hillary\nClinton's aides - particularly Cheryl Mills, with whom he was in frequent\ncontact, according to the emails - would be relevant to the FBI probe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Tony Podesta </span>is older\nbrother of John Podesta, with whom he founded what is now The Podesta Group of\nwhich he is chairman; social acquaintance of the Clintons; Democratic\nfundraiser. He is deep shit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Doug Band</span> was Bill\nClinton's 'body man' in the White House; his chief aide after leaving office\nuntil 2011; CEO of Teneo Holdings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FBI investigation\ninto whether the Clinton Foundation committed financial crimes or was involved\nin influence-peddling will inevitably focus on one man in particular: Band.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Band was at Bill\nClinton's side to the same extent as Huma Abedin was at his wife's, starting as\nhis 'body man' in the White House, putting himself through law school in the\nevenings, and then running Bill Clinton's post-presidency life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His emails to Cheryl\nMills and Huma Abedin which have emerged in lawsuits forcing publication by the\nState Department show how he sent messages asking for meetings for people\ndescribed as 'friend' or 'good friend of ours'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any influence-peddling\nor financial crimes committed by the Foundation appear to have some connection\nto them, if they were to exist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His explosive memo\ndetailing the project to make Bill Clinton rich which he sent to John Podesta\nmade clear how involved he was in 2011 in the Clintons' lives and finances. 'Independent\nof our fundraising and decision-making activities on behalf of the Foundation,\nwe have dedicated ourselves to helping the President secure and engage in\nfor-profit activities \u2013 including speeches, books, and advisory service\nengagements,' he wrote.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'In that context, we\nhave in effect served as agents, lawyers, managers and implementers to secure\nspeaking, business and advisory service deals.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also put a figure on\nBill Clinton's personal gains via Band.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Since 2001, President\nClinton\u2019s business arrangements have yielded more than $30 million for him\npersonally, with $66 million to be paid out over the next nine years should he\nchoose to continue with the current engagements,' it said. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in 2013 he asked\nJohn Podesta to help remove any stain on his reputation with a glowing letter\nof reference. Podesta obliged by redrafting it for him.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; edited Bill's memoir My Life; registered the notorious\nClintonemail.com server; now works for Teneo with Band.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yanks must demand a full\ninvestigation as to how Hillary Clinton spend 1030 Million USD for her election\ncampaign.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Priorities USA Action,\nthe main super PAC supporting Democrat Hillary Clinton\u2019s presidential campaign,\nhas raised and spent more money than any super PAC since the committees were\nsanctioned in 2010.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all of the money\nraised by Priorities USA Action has come from seven-figure donors. Of the\ngroup\u2019s total $176 million haul, $157 million \u2015 89 percent \u2015 has come from just\n42 donors giving $1 million or more\u2014mostly Jews<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hotel and real\nestate billionaires Jay and M.K. Pritzker combined to give more than $15\nmillion to Priorities USA Action. Pro-Israel donors Haim and Cheryl Saban gave\n$10 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Billionaire Haim Saban\nand his wife Cheryl have contributed $10 million to the pro-Clinton Priorities\nUSA Action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fred Eychaner, a media\nmogul and LGBTQ rights supporter, donated $10 million. The media-shy Democratic\nmegadonor has been a major backer of the party\u2019s super PACs. He hosted Clinton\nfor at least one fundraiser this election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other eight-figure\ndonors to the super PAC were hedge fund billionaire James Simons and his wife\nMarilyn. The couple have also given $10 million to the group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other top individual\ndonors include George Soros ($9 million), S. Daniel Abraham ($9 million), Laure\nWoods ($5 million), Henry and Marsha Laufer ($5 million), Steve and Susan\nMandel ($5 million), Dustin Moskovitz ($5 million), Herb Sandler ($4 million), David\nShaw ($4 million), and Bernard Schwartz ($2.5 million).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinton also has\nreceived super PAC support from labor unions. Working for Working Americans, a\nsuper PAC funded by a variety of unions, gave $5 million to Priorities USA\nAction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other union contributions came from the United Association of Plumbers\nand Pipefitters ($4 million), Laborers International Union ($4 million),\nAmerican Federation of Teachers ($2.5 million), International Union of\nOperating Engineers ($2 million), National Air Traffic Controllers ($1.85\nmillion), Teamsters Union ($1.5 million) and American Federation of State,\nCounty and Municipal Employees ($1 million).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While super PACs are\nsupposed to be independent from the candidates they support, the FEC\u2019s lax\ninterpretation of campaign finance law provides wide latitude for the groups to\nwork with campaigns. This has certainly been the case for Priorities USA Action\nand the Clinton campaign.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the United States, a\npolitical action committee (PAC) is a type of organization that pools campaign\ncontributions from members and donates those funds to campaign for or against\ncandidates, ballot initiatives, or legislation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2014, the Clinton\ncampaign-in-waiting took over the reins of Priorities USA Action from Obama\u2019s\nallies. They began to work out what the future campaign could and could not do\nto support the super PAC\u2019s efforts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of these deliberations are laid out in\nemails from Clinton campaign manager John Podesta that were illegally hacked\nand posted online by Wikileaks, which opposes Clinton\u2019s election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A memo prepared in\nMarch 2015 by Clinton and Priorities USA Action lawyer Marc Elias provided a\ndetailed walkthrough of how the campaign\u2019s surrogates could help raise money\nfor the super PAC.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two big takeaways were: Whenever a campaign surrogate\nasks a donor for super PAC money, they must make a \u201chard ask\u201d for a maximum\ncontribution of $5,000. And if they make this \u201chard ask\u201d then they can speak\nfreely about the campaign\u2019s support for the super PAC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A suggested line from\nmemo reads, \u201cWe cannot win this election without [Preferred Super PAC]. You\nshould support them.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Crooked Hillary with two FIXERS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QBmWvYp1kP0/WBm8OBEfgiI/AAAAAAABN34/j5h664uIKwwqQeTVkoplj6ml92shtOgcgCLcB/s1600/13nlWWook1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"630\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QBmWvYp1kP0/WBm8OBEfgiI/AAAAAAABN34/j5h664uIKwwqQeTVkoplj6ml92shtOgcgCLcB/s640/13nlWWook1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The legal term PAC has been created in pursuit\nof campaign finance reform in the United States. This term is quite specific to\nall activities of campaign finance in the United States. Democracies of other\ncountries use different terms for the units of campaign spending or spending on\npolitical competition (see political finance). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the U.S. federal\nlevel, an organization becomes a PAC when it receives or spends more than\n$2,600 for the purpose of influencing a federal election, according to the\nFederal Election Campaign Act<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super PACs, officially\nknown as \"independent-expenditure only committees\", may not make\ncontributions to candidate campaigns or parties, but may engage in unlimited\npolitical spending independently of the campaigns. Unlike traditional PACs,\nthey can raise funds from individuals, corporations, unions, and other groups\nwithout any legal limit on donation size.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super PACs are not\nallowed to coordinate directly with candidates or political parties. This\nrestriction is intended to prevent them from operating campaigns that\ncomplement or parallel those of the candidates they support or engaging in\nnegotiations that could result in quid pro quo bargaining between donors to the\nPAC and the candidate or officeholder.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, it is legal for candidates and\nSuper PAC managers to discuss campaign strategy and tactics through the media<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ehOJt5HIux0/WBm6jYgsS8I/AAAAAAABN3g/CwSsB4qyOsgH-bP6f65Fcf_4OQueIib2ACLcB/s1600/imag4422es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ehOJt5HIux0/WBm6jYgsS8I/AAAAAAABN3g/CwSsB4qyOsgH-bP6f65Fcf_4OQueIib2ACLcB/s400/imag4422es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nMARK MY WORDS<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD WILL NOW TAKE DOWN SOUTH KOREAN PRESIDENT PARK GEUN HYE AND INSTALL HIS AGENT WAR CRIMINAL &nbsp;BAN KI MOON<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLIKE TRUMPs PUSSYGATE AND MODIs STALKGATE, IT WILL BE&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"He misinforms the electorate, degrades\ntrust in public institutions with conspiracy theories, and promotes willful\ndelusion over engagement with reality. If elected, he poses a unique danger to\nthe functioning of democratic and economic institutions, and to the prosperity\nof the country.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AIYOOOOOOOOOOO !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"His statements\nreveal a deep ignorance of economics and an inability to listen to credible\nexperts. He repeats fake and misleading economic statistics, and pushes\nfallacies about the [value-added tax] and trade competitiveness. He promotes\nmagical thinking and conspiracy theories over sober assessments of feasible\neconomic policy options.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE HEEEEEEE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DONALD TRUMP, ASSIST NOT SO BRIGHT HILLY BILLY YANKS STEP BY STEP ON HOW TO DO IT--&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DO IT NOW !</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"content clearfix\" style=\"color: #292f33; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-left: 58px;\">\n<div class=\"permalink-header\" style=\"height: 48px; margin-bottom: 15px;\">\n<div class=\"follow-bar\" style=\"float: right;\">\n<div class=\"user-actions btn-group not-following  \" data-name=\"Donald J.
