line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>How was he compensated by crooked Hillary ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GKmuO5Yqbzg/WBpSKxnc_PI/AAAAAAABN6M/mBO5QyQ8CagEMSb9eqmjYHqEmCojxoxLgCLcB/s1600/voterfraud2ss016.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GKmuO5Yqbzg/WBpSKxnc_PI/AAAAAAABN6M/mBO5QyQ8CagEMSb9eqmjYHqEmCojxoxLgCLcB/s640/voterfraud2ss016.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></span></b></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BERNIE SANDERS ALLOWED HILLARY TO ROB HIM --WHY ?</span></b><br />\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MoGeDGHmwJU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MoGeDGHmwJU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ARE AMERICANS SO STUPID THAT THEY CAN FIGURE OUT &nbsp;VOTE FLIPPING BY ROTHSCHILD AGENTS MANUFACTURED PRIVATE MACHINES ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/AFjxYLsFDlQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/AFjxYLsFDlQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5wpqL9_6zIE/WBpYDRn7XsI/AAAAAAABN6c/fOq8sTH8WPsK4wYPQ3bJeJw0kYRojtcdgCLcB/s1600/ima8888ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5wpqL9_6zIE/WBpYDRn7XsI/AAAAAAABN6c/fOq8sTH8WPsK4wYPQ3bJeJw0kYRojtcdgCLcB/s400/ima8888ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In American politics, a\n\"superdelegate\" is an unpledged delegate to the Democratic National\nConvention who is seated automatically and chooses for whom they want to vote.\nThese Democratic Party superdelegates (who make up just under 15% of all\nconvention delegates) include elected officials and party activists and\nofficials. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Democratic\nsuperdelegates are free to support any candidate for the presidential\nnomination. This contrasts with convention \"pledged\" delegates who\nare selected based on the party primaries and caucuses in each U.S. state, in\nwhich voters choose among candidates for the party's presidential nomination.\nMoreover, superdelegates are permitted to participate in the primary elections\nas regular voters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least in name,\nsuperdelegates are not involved in the Republican Party nomination process.\nThere are delegates to the Republican National Convention who are seated\nautomatically, but they are limited to three per state, consisting of the state\nchairsperson and two district-level committee members. Republican Party\nsuperdelegates are obliged to vote for their state's popular vote winner under\nthe rules of the party branch to which they belong<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J4BrnNIHGbY/WBpcpneoHqI/AAAAAAABN6s/AEWC2dl10vs892srEH11EV2K5aNlDv7zgCLcB/s1600/imag33Ees.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J4BrnNIHGbY/WBpcpneoHqI/AAAAAAABN6s/AEWC2dl10vs892srEH11EV2K5aNlDv7zgCLcB/s400/imag33Ees.jpg\" width=\"374\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Democratic Party\nuses pledged delegates and superdelegates. A candidate for the Democratic\nnomination must win a majority of combined delegate votes at the Democratic\nNational Convention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 4,800 people\ndetermine the Democratic nominee for president. But most of them, called\npledged delegates, are bound by primary election results<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To win the Democratic\nnomination, a candidate needs a simple majority of 2,383 delegates (pledged or\nsuperdelegates) at the convention floor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 85 percent of the\nconvention's delegates are chosen by the voters, and about 15 percent are\nsuperdelegates. So it takes a pretty huge pledged delegate margin of victory \u2014\na win of 59 to 41 percent \u2014 to take the nomination outright. Otherwise, the superdelegates\nhave to push someone over the finish line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The superdelegates are\nmade up of party loyalists and elite insiders who don't really earn their\npositions. At a fundamental level, this violates the basic idea of how we\nshould pick our presidential nominees. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Superdelegates&nbsp; is a group of 719 party leaders who can vote\nfor whomever they want, and change their minds whenever they want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Superdelegates can\ninfluence the election in other ways, most notably through sharing their\npreference in the media. Occasionally, media organizations like the Associated\nPress call all 719 superdelegates to see who they prefer. And that's how the\nhilly billy yanks know the large majority of them supported Clinton over Bernie\nSanders, even before a single vote was cast.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yvi7XdLXyl8/WBpc7h2yd2I/AAAAAAABN6w/DgORWJ4BmV0WMJdLCtZ9Zs9DLgyqQLvEgCLcB/s1600/imaFges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"148\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yvi7XdLXyl8/WBpc7h2yd2I/AAAAAAABN6w/DgORWJ4BmV0WMJdLCtZ9Zs9DLgyqQLvEgCLcB/s640/imaFges.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are basically\nthree ways one can become a superdelegate, according to the DNC charter..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first is through\nholding political office. All Democratic governors, senators, and House\nrepresentatives automatically get a spot as a superdelegate.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second is through\nbeing a DNC member. There are 20 ways in which you can be a member of the DNC,\nmost of which involve being a high-ranking member of a DNC leadership group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third is being an\nespecially distinguished member of the party. This is a small group, only about\n20 people or so. If you're a current or former president, vice president,\nSenate leader, House leader, or DNC chair, then you're a superdelegate. This is\nwhy Barack Obama, Jimmy Carter, Bill Clinton, Joe Biden, Al Gore, Walter\nMondale, Howard Dean, and George Mitchell are superdelegates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caucuses are the original\nmethod for selecting delegates and superdelegates, and existed long before the\nfirst primary election was introduced. Since the early 1900s, when primary\nelections were established, the popularity of caucuses has decreased in favor\nof primary elections which are easier to manage, and award more power to\nindividuals in the electorate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In states that hold caucuses, each political\nparty announces the date, time, and location of the caucus. At a caucus,\nindividuals who are viewed favorably within the party are identified as\npotential delegates. After a comprehensive discussion and debate, an informal\nvote is held to determine which individuals will serve as delegates at the\nnational party convention.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vedBT8jhlic/WBpdIS_Z3HI/AAAAAAABN60/tzzY7TZpPR45Ebffe_IhbxyUrV69tfBbgCLcB/s1600/i4444mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vedBT8jhlic/WBpdIS_Z3HI/AAAAAAABN60/tzzY7TZpPR45Ebffe_IhbxyUrV69tfBbgCLcB/s400/i4444mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same rules that apply to delegates and\nsuperdelegates chosen from primary elections do not always apply to those\nchosen from caucuses. For example, the Iowa caucus follows a process in which\ncandidates receiving less than 15% support from caucus-goers in a given\ndistrict do not receive any delegates from that district.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The four most common\ntypes of primary elections are open, closed, semi-open, and semi-closed. Each\nstate that holds a primary election chooses which type they want to adopt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Open primaries and\ncaucuses allow all voters, regardless of party affiliation, to vote for a\nsingle candidate in a party of their choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Closed primaries and\ncaucuses require voters to register with a specific party to be able to vote\nfor that party\u2019s candidates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Semi-Open primaries and\ncaucuses allow any registered voter except for Republicans to vote for that\nparty\u2019s candidates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Semi-Closed primaries\nand caucuses follow the same rules as Closed, but they also allow voters who\nare not affiliated with a political party to vote.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2Xi3ey8pzQI/WBrMr4E5MWI/AAAAAAABN8E/9RNl1qEz_qI4jsY6funJd30Rtu96OatNQCLcB/s1600/4bc7451f22b3966d81b6www280ad7cc02862.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2Xi3ey8pzQI/WBrMr4E5MWI/AAAAAAABN8E/9RNl1qEz_qI4jsY6funJd30Rtu96OatNQCLcB/s400/4bc7451f22b3966d81b6www280ad7cc02862.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Closed primary\nelections and caucuses exist as a defense mechanism against political sabotage.\nSome states\u2019 political parties are concerned that voters, instead of using\ntheir vote to support the candidate with whom they agree the most, will vote\nfor a weak candidate in the opposing political party.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is to say, these\nindividuals may subvert the opposing political party\u2019s power as a way to\nadvance the potential of their own political party. By hosting a closed primary\nelection, states force individuals in their electorate to register as either a\nRepublican, a Democrat, or another political party, and then participate in\nonly their own party\u2019s caucus or primary election.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this way, both the state\nparties ensure that they are not undermining each other\u2019s political efficacy.\nThose states which hold open primary elections and caucuses have weighed the\nlikelihood of this political sabotage occurring, and have decided that the risk\nis insufficient to force voters to stick to rigid party lines, they would\nrather each voter choose to support a candidate regardless of party\naffiliation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D33FwUE9LWc/WBpb-wgYypI/AAAAAAABN6k/HRH1_BY-6CY9WivePxtco7OlRVG8O0CHACLcB/s1600/Clinton-SuperdeEEEElegates.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"534\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D33FwUE9LWc/WBpb-wgYypI/AAAAAAABN6k/HRH1_BY-6CY9WivePxtco7OlRVG8O0CHACLcB/s640/Clinton-SuperdeEEEElegates.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The corporate media\u2019s\nearly inclusion of the superdelegates in the delegate count created the\nimpression of an inevitable Clinton nomination. Seventy-three percent of\nsuperdelegates\u2014520 of the 712\u2014have pledged their support to the former\nsecretary of state, but superdelegates are free to change their minds any time\nbefore the Democratic National Convention in July.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The process for\npresidential elections in the United States is governed by the Constitution.\nPrimary elections, however, are not. They are controlled by the political\nparties themselves. &nbsp;&nbsp;To ensure that the\nvoters themselves didn't have all the power, in 1982 the Democratic Party\nadopted what are called superdelegates, who today control 15% of the final\nnomination process.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NRMoW-BfC8/WBrMdfkWgyI/AAAAAAABN8A/EyPbM9VL_lk6uc0o3-CHwzcc9kMv5mFZACLcB/s1600/75f2726bd31a6b757dd36b187f97a49724.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NRMoW-BfC8/WBrMdfkWgyI/AAAAAAABN8A/EyPbM9VL_lk6uc0o3-CHwzcc9kMv5mFZACLcB/s400/75f2726bd31a6b757dd36b187f97a49724.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary Clinton and\nBernie Sanders were almost tied for pledged delegates, with 52 and 51 of them,\nrespectively. And yet Clinton was leading by a much wider margin in the total\ndelegate count because a whopping 445 superdelegates -- out of a total of 712\n-- pledged to support her. By comparison, just 18 superdelegates pledged to\nsupport Sanders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Democratic Party's\nsuperdelegates exist to preserve the power and influence of the Democratic\nParty's elite ( Rothschild\u2019s agents ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Republican Party\nhas superdelegates, too, but they have a lot less power. GOP superdelegates are\nonly about 7% of the nominating vote, and according to Republican convention\nrules, superdelegates must vote in accordance with their state primary outcomes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cpTLZ6z3K-U/WByfrVfYxvI/AAAAAAABOEg/XjGIU4ynu44ZhSSBE6kzn8lIXQFsTQSKwCLcB/s1600/011116epstein77R-380x218.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SBuRgOdpYO0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SBuRgOdpYO0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp; Revelations by<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> WikiLeaks</span>[edit]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Congress Party had\nworked to support the government in the vote and on 17 March 2011 WikiLeaks\nclaimed[15] that Nachiketa Kapur, a Congress Party political aide, had boasted\nto US Embassy officials in July 2008 that his party had funds to bribe MPs in\norder to obtain a favourable outcome. Kapur claimed that four MPs who were\nmembers of Rashtriya Lok Dal (RLD) had already been paid off. The Hindu\nreported that<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Five days before the\nManmohan Singh government faced a <span style=\"color: red;\">crucial vote of confidence</span> on the Indo-U.S.\nnuclear deal in 2008, a political aide to Congress leader Satish Sharma showed\na U.S. Embassy employee \"two suitcases containing cash\" he said was<span style=\"color: blue;\">\npart of a bigger fund of Rs. 500 million ($13 million) to Rs. 600 million ($15\nmillion)</span> that the party had assembled to purchase the support of MPs.\"[</span>16]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former United States\nAmbassador to India David Campbell Mulford commented that US diplomatic cables\nwere \"generally accurate\" but that all he could recall of the\nincident was that someone \"turned out with a suitcase of money and dumped\nit on the table ... &nbsp;UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j3DKYJq54eA/WBrRp5svIYI/AAAAAAABN8k/pryRt485P-EVHSaRMgWY-3Lz_4DczrFEACLcB/s1600/imaqqqsdddges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j3DKYJq54eA/WBrRp5svIYI/AAAAAAABN8k/pryRt485P-EVHSaRMgWY-3Lz_4DczrFEACLcB/s400/imaqqqsdddges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Hillary Clinton had blocked Modi's US visa-- she took the lead&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ebJIPmBCifU/WBrkHAvHmZI/AAAAAAABN84/Ee6T8RW6W3s6hEPhssxM81cjlDiOEMHywCLcB/s1600/Narendra-modi-quotes-twwhoughts-images-wallpapers-photos-pictures.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"510\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ebJIPmBCifU/WBrkHAvHmZI/AAAAAAABN84/Ee6T8RW6W3s6hEPhssxM81cjlDiOEMHywCLcB/s640/Narendra-modi-quotes-twwhoughts-images-wallpapers-photos-pictures.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\nwww.sacw.net | March 24, 2005</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\n<span style=\"color: #003399;\"><b>Text of citizens statement re the Indian Prime minister's comments in the Rajya Sabha following refusal of US Visa to Narendra Modi</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\nWe express our shock and anger at the stand taken by the Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in the Rajya Sabha on the issue of refusal of visa to Mr. Narendra Modi by the USA. He has said that it is not proper for any agency to form its opinion on the role of Sh. Modi in the 2002 Gujarat genocide based on mere allegations. Sh. Singh needs to be reminded that it was the NHRC which had castigated Mr. Modi and his state government for having aided and abetted the act of genocide of Muslims in Gujarat in 2002, and it was the SUPreme Court of India that had opined that the Modi government cannot be relied UPon to bring about justice to the victims of the carnage. More than 50 national and international agencies of high credibility with their painstaking investigation had held Mr. Modi directly responsible for the act of genocide. The Prime Minister needs to come clean on this issue. Does he hold a considered opinion that the observations made by the NHRC and the Supreme Court of India are to be treated with contempt as shown by him in his Rajya Sabha speech?<br />\n<br />\nMr. Modi's policies of hatred should not be legitimised even by association. Mr. Modi is no ordinary elected leader. He has become infamous for his active abetment in the most brutal massacre since India became free, of a segment of the citizens of his state. His notoriety has deepened in the past 3 years because he remains completely unrepentant for these crimes, including the mass slaughter and rape of hundreds of innocent women and children, and instead has openly fought elections from a platform of hate. He has deliberately subverted the process of justice, that have attracted unprecedented structure from the Supreme Court of India.<br />\n<br />\nWe continue - to harbour grave disquiet about the militaristic and chauvinistic policies of the current US government itself, most notably in Afghanistan and Iraq. George Bush and his cohorts cannot be the arbiters of human rights.<br />\n<br />\nWe commend the untiring efforts of NRIs and human rights activists in the US and in India who mobilized public opinion and pressurized the US administration which led to the denial of Modi's visa. For those who claim that the international community has no role to play in the Gujarat carnage since it is a matter internal to the Indian nation, we would like to remind them that by the same logic, the entire world should have remained a mute spectator as millions of Jews were imprisoned and executed in concentration camps by the Nazi government. For those who claim that any insult to any elected official is an insult to the entire nation, we would like to remind them that Hitler, who is reviled even today, was also an elected official. There is nothing more insulting to the Indian nation than the pogroms that took place in Gujarat, and the fact that their main architect, Sh Narendra Modi, still continues to enjoy the powers and privileges of the Chief Minister in that state, while the Prime Minister of the country rushes to his defence.<br />\n<br />\nIt is a matter of great shame that even 10 months after having assumed power the UPA government has done nothing to ensure justice to the victims of Gujarat genocide. It has taken no steps to instill a sense of security and confidence among the displaced, raped, and maimed minorities of Gujarat who have been left to fend for themselves. No financial and legal aid has been arranged by the Central government for them and it is treating the whole Gujarat genocide as a routine state matter.<br />\n<br />\nThe statement by Dr. Manmohan Singh adds insult to the injury suffered by the Genocide victims of Gujarat, and is an affront to those NRIs and human rights activists in the US whose unflagging pressure on the US administration resulted in the denial of Mr. Modi's visa. That Dr. Singh should feel compelled to come out openly to speak for an organizer of mass murder who feels no remorse for his role shows that Dr. Singh has lost all sense of propriety. The statement also shows that the government wants to remain neutral on the question of communalism.<br />\n<br />\nWe, as people who are committed to secularism and human rights in India, feel betrayed and would like to take this opportunity to express our sense of despair that the political formation which is in power at the centre lacks any sense of moral responsibility and moral courage.<br />\n<br />\nOn behalf of the dead and living victims of Gujarat genocide and on behalf of the sections of civil society which have worked for the defeat of the communal forces we demand an apology from Dr. Manmohan Singh for having humiliated the wronged citizens of India by issuing a highly insensitive and irresponsible statement defending Mr. Narendra Modi.<br />\nMarch 21, 2005</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Released by</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Shabnam Hashmi - ANHAD, Delhi <anhad_delhi yahoo.co.in=\"\">&gt;</anhad_delhi></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ew4SmFOmM6A/WBrnbhFY9CI/AAAAAAABN9M/Q1Xb57II5CUsWs1sqfsL0Jpth7d2dQM1QCLcB/s1600/Hillary%2BMissioSSSSnary.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"326\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ew4SmFOmM6A/WBrnbhFY9CI/AAAAAAABN9M/Q1Xb57II5CUsWs1sqfsL0Jpth7d2dQM1QCLcB/s400/Hillary%2BMissioSSSSnary.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\"><b>On behalf of:</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">1. Aamir Khan- Actor, Mumbai</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">2. padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedHrIhD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_35B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7033944314949170722\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html?showComment=1478168786895#c7033944314949170722\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 3, 2016 at 3:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_35MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi pb,<br />\n<br />\nIN MY LATEST BLOG I HAVE ASKED DONALD TRUMP TO LEGALISE MEDICAL MARIJUANA IN USA\u2014AND THEN THEN THE WHOLE WORLD WILL ACCEPT IT.<br />\n<br />\nBASICALLY IT IS ABOUT KICKING KOSHER EVIL PHARMA IN THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THERE IS NO WESTERN CURE FOR MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY \u2013 AND SO THEY ARE QUICK TO DUMP IT AS A GENETIC DISORDER</span></b><br />\n<br />\nMuscular dystrophies refer to a group of diseases that result in progressive degeneration of muscle mass.<br />\n<br />\nThere are nine major types of muscular dystrophies, each causing unique manifestations of muscular deterioration. Over time, some patients may have trouble breathing or swallowing, and some will lose the ability to sit up or walk.<br />\n<br />\nMuscular dystrophy (MD) is a collective group of noninflammatory but progressive muscle disorders without a central or peripheral nerve abnormality.<br />\n<br />\nThe disease affects the muscles with definite fiber degeneration.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />There is no cure for muscular dystrophy in allopathy .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br />In ancient ayurveda medical marijuana, herbal oil massage, yoga , pranayama ( nitric oxide boost ) and atapa snana (sun bath ) were used .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nIn allopathy medications and therapy can only help manage symptoms and slow the course of the disease.<br />\n<br />\nTreatment may include physical therapy, respiratory therapy, speech therapy, orthopedic appliances used for support, and corrective orthopedic surgery.<br />\n<br />\nSometimes there may be symptoms other than muscle weakness.<br />\n<br />\nThese are:--<br />\nMuscle wasting - where the muscles become thin.<br />\nMuscle hypertrophy - where the muscles are bulkier than normal- though they work less well.<br />\nAches or pains in the muscles.<br />\nContractures - where joints are tight, due to tightness of the muscles or reduced movement of the joints.<br />\nDevelopmental delay in a child (this means that the child's 'milestones' of development are later than usual).<br />\n<br />\nSome types of MD can affect the heart. In some cases, there may be symptoms of heart disease without much in the way of muscle weakness.<br />\n<br />\nSymptoms:--<br />\nSymptoms usually appear before age 6 and may appear as early as infancy.<br />\n<br />\nThey may include:<br />\n<br />\nFatigue<br />\nLearning difficulties (the IQ can be below 75)<br />\nIntellectual disability (possible, but does not get worse over time)<br />\nMuscle weakness:<br />\n<br />\nBegins in the legs and pelvis, but also occurs less severely in the arms, neck, and other areas of the body<br />\nProblems with motor skills (running, hopping, jumping)<br />\nFrequent falls<br />\nTrouble getting up from a lying position or climbing stairs<br />\nWeakness quickly gets worse<br />\nProgressive difficulty walking:<br />\n<br />\nAbility to walk may be lost by age 12, and the child will have to use a wheelchair<br />\nBreathing difficulties and heart disease usually start by age 20<br />\n<br />\nA physical therapist also uses bracing to help prevent joint contractures, a stiffening of the muscles near the joints that can make it harder to move and can lock the joints in painful positions.<br />\n<br />\nA doctor may prescribe the steroid prednisone to help slow the rate of muscle deterioration.<br />\n.<br />\n<br />\nPrednisone does have HAJAAAR side effects, though. It can cause weight gain, which can put even greater strain on already weak muscles. It also can cause a loss of bone density and, possibly, lead to fractures<br />\n<br />\nThe muscle weakness of muscular dystrophy often begins in the legs. This makes it difficult for a child to walk normally, and he or she may walk with their feet wide apart to help keep balance<br />\n<br />\nWestern doctors prescribe medication such as steroids to improve muscle strength, or ACE inhibitors and beta-blockers to treat heart problems- surgery to correct postural deformities ( how many surgeries are you gonna suffer )?<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_35MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_35BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_35B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_36B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1993499677309947259\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html?showComment=1478168811050#c1993499677309947259\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 3, 2016 at 3:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nMD is a progressive condition, which means that it gets worse over time. Some types of MD eventually affect the heart or the muscles used for breathing, at which point the condition becomes life threatening--and life is not worth living anymore.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile there is plenty money in all this-- some scientists are trying to fix the defective genes that lead to MD so they will make the right proteins. Others are trying to make chemicals that will act like these proteins in the body. PAISA MAANGTHA HAI NA ?<br />\n<br />\nDrug therapy includes corticosteroids to slow muscle degeneration, anticonvulsants to control seizures and some muscle activity, immunosuppressants to delay some damage to dying muscle cells, and antibiotics to fight respiratory infections.<br />\n<br />\nSome patients may need assisted ventilation to treat respiratory muscle weakness and a pacemaker for cardiac abnormalities. Braces can help keep muscles and tendons stretched and flexible, slowing the progression of contractures. Braces can also aid mobility by providing support for weakened muscles.<br />\n<br />\nMuscular dystrophy can restrict the flexibility and mobility of joints. Limbs often draw inward and become fixed in that position-- AND THERE IS SEVERE PAIN.<br />\n<br />\nCanes, walkers and wheelchairs can help maintain mobility and independence\u2014<br />\n<br />\nSigns and symptoms typically appear between the ages of 2 and 3, and may include:<br />\n<br />\nFrequent falls<br />\nDifficulty getting up from a lying or sitting position<br />\nTrouble running and jumping<br />\nWaddling gait<br />\nWalking on the toes<br />\nLarge calf muscles<br />\nMuscle pain and stiffness<br />\nLearning disabilities<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedHrIhD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedHrIhD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; [gross domestic product] by about $1.70\u2014which means, by the way, that much of the money laid out to help families in need actually comes right back to the government in the form of higher revenue. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nHEY CHOOT PAUL KRUGMAN \u2013<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW YOU DO NOT KNOW A SHIT ABOUT ECONOMICS<br />\n<br />\nREFRAIN FROM ADVISING INDIA, EVER AGAIN.<br />\n<br />\nBarack Obama\u2019s government-paid recruiters hold bingo games and \u201cparties\u201d to try to get more people on food stamps who might not otherwise seek taxpayer assistance.<br />\n<br />\nFood stamps are intended to serve as a temporary safety net for those who face economic hardship, not as an economic stimulus.<br />\n<br />\nTo justify food stamps as a stimulus to raise government revenue ignores the long-term economic consequences of welfare spending.<br />\n<br />\nFood stamp dollars come from the taxpayers, meaning that as program spending increases, fewer dollars are available in the private sector.<br />\n<br />\nThe argument for stimulus assumes that consumption spending adds to immediate economic growth while savings do not.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, private savings help lift people out of poverty and boost the economy, but high rates of government borrowing can weaken the economy and harm Americans.<br />\n<br />\nThe United States just hit the debt ceiling with 19.8 TRILLION USD in external debt, and spending on means-tested welfare programs, which include food stamps, is the fastest growing component of government.<br />\n<br />\nHEY CHOOT WINNER OF NOBEL PRIZE IN ECONOMICS PAUL KRUGMAN \u2013 ARE YOU MAD, LIKE NOBEL PRIZE WINNER AMARTYA SEN ( WITH A ROTHSCHILD WIFE ) ?<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT\nYURY BEZMENOV HAD WARNED WESTERN NATIONS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7nSl7rAgzms/WBzB5O4fgRI/AAAAAAABOFg/eWKFCBmaKqkIITA9wz908pM34aeBe-m6QCLcB/s1600/imd77ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under their vast and\ncomplex system, most families have ended up paying for their own benefits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Government\nscrapped all family payments tomorrow, and compensated by reducing families\u2019\ntax contributions by the same amount, at least two-thirds of families would be\nno worse off, and up to three-quarters would hardly notice the difference.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOTHERS SOMETIMES\nMUTILATE THEIR BABIES TO GET SYMPATHY.&nbsp;\nTHIS IS A MENTAL DISEASE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Munchausen syndrome is\na psychiatric disorder wherein those affected feign disease, illness, or\npsychological trauma to draw attention, sympathy, or reassurance to themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Munchausen syndrome\nshould not be confused with hypochondria, as patients with Munchausen syndrome\ndo not really believe they are sick; they only want to be sick, and thus\nfabricate the symptoms of an illness.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is also not the same as pretending to\nbe sick for personal benefit such as being excused from work or school<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Hardly anybody attended the funeral of Mother Teresa.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she got Nobel\nPrize lakhs of Bongs were dancing on the streets .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember that self-\nvictimisers play a role that has always worked for them. &nbsp;&nbsp;Whatever money Mother nay Saint Teresa milked\nby keeping Calcutta as an open sore ( to attract flies ) , she used to open hundreds\nof evangelist branches abroad in connivance with the Pope<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians play the\nvictim card&nbsp; often. A politician will\nattack his opponent with all kinds of criticism, denunciations and slander, and\neven blatant lies, and when the opponent fights back and counter-attacks, the\nfirst politician takes on a wounded look and complains how unfair it is for his\nopponent to be so vicious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He seduced me . It's\nall his fault. He came on to me. It's all his fault, and now I'm getting all of\nthe blame for getting pregnant . &nbsp;He raped me for 6 years while we lived\ntogether. &nbsp;( she wont reveal that he stopped having sex with her for six months ) &nbsp;NCW has told me to sue him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Self-victimization is\nthe fabrication of victimhood for a variety of reasons such as to justify abuse\nof others, to manipulate others, a coping strategy or attention seeking.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where a person is known for regular victim\nplaying, the person may be referred to as a professional victim.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manipulators often play\nthe victim role (\"poor me\") by portraying themselves as victims of\ncircumstances or someone else's behavior in order to gain pity or sympathy or\nto evoke compassion and thereby get something from another.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caring and\nconscientious people cannot stand to see anyone suffering, and the manipulator\noften finds it easy and rewarding to play on sympathy to get cooperation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A victim suffering from\npersecution mania , has trouble accepting they contributed to a problem and\naccepting responsibility for the circumstance that they are in.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The victim\nlikes to hang onto old grievances. They carry these around like weapons, just\nin case anyone ever tries to hold them accountable for something.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A victim will\nbring up old memories and events in which they were probably legitimately hurt,\nbut they use them as reasons why they can\u2019t make changes to their attitude,\ntheir life, or their circumstances in the present. These hurts and grudges\nunderpin the victim\u2019s hobbled life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the victim will try to\nbe manipulative, coercive, and underhanded in getting what they need. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In sexual relationships,\nFEMALE victims have no decency or sense of limits<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1XZvVCJAbro/WBiTLQzY21I/AAAAAAABNwQ/IUIwO3sTAjcMhwFxEXqrjeYkPcV16DtxwCLcB/s1600/UntiWWtled1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/pz-p31tQyuA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pz-p31tQyuA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Claim that you are the\nvictim, not the offender. No matter what happened, or who did what to whom,\nclaim that you are the victim of all kinds of attacks, and nasty conspiracies,\nand slander and libel, and on and on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person who plays the\nvictim card can\u2019t get past themselves to realize other people matter, too. They\noverreact to small daily obstacles. They blame you and the people around them\nfor tiny setbacks in their day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never give value to people who have a past\nrecord of using the value you give them, &nbsp;in negative &nbsp;ways. They can evoke anger and aggression in you,\nespecially after you realise you have been duped into giving them sympathy when\nit should have gone to the real victim of their abuse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes go to extremes\nto get revenge for perceived or actual abuse, like destroying their own\nproperty and falsely accusing someone else of being responsible. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Victim playing by\nabusers is either:---</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">diverting attention\naway from acts of abuse by claiming that the abuse was justified based on\nanother person's bad behavior (typically the victim)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">soliciting sympathy\nfrom others in order to gain their assistance in supporting or enabling the\nabuse of a victim (known as proxy abuse).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is common for\nabusers to engage in victim playing. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This serves two\npurposes:-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">justification to\nthemselves \u2013 as a way of dealing with the cognitive dissonance that results\nfrom inconsistencies between the way they treat others and what they believe\nabout themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">justification to others\n\u2013 as a way of escaping harsh judgment or condemnation they may fear from\nothers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A woman victim makes\nyou into her therapist. If you try to hold her accountable, she will use tears\nand guilt to control you and even withhold her friendship. They instinctively\ndraw out the caring, nurturing, and protective qualities in people, only to set\nthem up for manipulation or abuse.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Do nothing to empower such victim mentality.\nNever negotiate with people who give you emotional ultimatums. Refuse to change\nyour behavior in any way for someone who attempts to force you into giving them\nyour time, attention, or feelings.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp;Sometimes they will take extreme measures to\nget attention, like&nbsp; sending hate emails\nto themselves and then accusing others of sending them. Women celebrities do\nthis very often and get the media to support them.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5235331940960013337\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_182M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1526060471074#c2685797842938331508\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 11:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-collegium-agrees-in-principle-to-reitereate-justice-josephs-name-for-elevation-to-top-court/articleshow/64123835.cms<br /><br />THE ACCOUNTABLE ELECTED EXECUTIVE CAN REJECT JUDGE KM JOSEPHs ELEVATION TO SUPREME COURT --WITHOUT ASSIGNING REASONS..<br /><br />ONCE KM JOSEPHs NAME IS REJECTED--IT IS FINAL.. THERE IS NO NEED FOR THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO GIVE REASON--ESPECIALLY IF IT IS TO BE PUBLISHED IN THE MEDIA..<br /><br />IF UNACCOUNTABLE ( TO WE THE PEOPLE ) SUPREME COURT COLLEGIUM SENDS BACK THE SAME NAME AGAIN -- IT IS INDISCIPLINE ..<br /><br />AND NOW IT IS THE PLEASURE OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO PUNISH ( LOSS OF PROMOTION - LOSS OF SALARY RISE ) THE RECALCITRANT JUDGES...<br /><br />DO NOT REDUCE THE SANCTITY OF THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM...<br /><br />IN THE FIRST PLACE-- OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM..INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THIS PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br /><br />WHO ARE THESE JUDGES ?<br /><br />ARE THEY SOME GOLDEN KNIGHTS ?<br /><br />SORRY--THESE ARE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS .. OUT OF THE POOL OF LAWYERS THE LOSER FOOT SLOGGING LAWYERS BECAME JUDGES TO COCK A NOOK AT THEIR SUCCESSFUL RICH LAWYER COLLEAGUES ..<br /><br />THE EX-CJI KG BALAKRISHNAN WAS NOT EVEN QUALIFIED TO BE SUPREME COURT JUDGE--LEAVE ALONE CJI... HE WAS A CHRISTIAN MASQUERADING AS A DALIT HINDU...HIS FATHER WAS A CHRISTIAN.<br /><br />The Constitution confers the power of appointment of judges on the President of India i.e. the Government of India to be made in consultation with the Chief Justice of India and other judges of the Supreme Court. How then did a collegium of judges of the Supreme Court come to exist and come to possess this UNIQUE power?<br /><br />The Supreme Court rewrote the provisions of the Constitution for appointment of judges and appropriated the power to appoint judges by the judges-- when this is amazing Judicial over reach .<br /><br />The collegium method was created as a result of two judgments of the Supreme Court, first in 1993 (Supreme Court Advocate-on-Record Association case) and by a follow-up President\u2019s Reference to the Court in 1998<br /><br />By the first case the power was vested in the Chief Justice of India in whom it was held the primacy lay in appointments assisted by two judges of the Supreme Court. In the second case the court took away the primacy of the Chief Justice of India and vested the power in a collegium of the Chief Justice of India and four senior-most judges of the Supreme Court.<br /><br />The clear intention of the Constitution makers in the Constituent Assembly debates of not making the Chief Justice of India the final authority was disregarded.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Inversing the constitutional provisions, the Chief Justice of India and the collegium became the initiator and appointer of judges, and the President of India was illegally and unconstiutionally REDUCED to be a NAPUNSAK formal approver in the process. Foreign forces were involved in this humongous subversion..</span></div>\n<br />.Indeed, in the second judgment of 1998 the Court went to the extent of extracting a statement from the government that it was not seeking a reconsideration of its earlier judgment of 1993, and DEEP STATE controlled government would also accept and binding the judgment it was delivering.<br /><br />The essential features of this judicially created system of appointments is that the collegium selects judges on their own assessment of the merits of a person and the government is bound to appoint the selected person except in a rare case of the collegium having overlooked some aspect of the incumbent not being a suitable judge.<br /><br />BUT HEY-- LO AND BEHOLD - THE ELECTED EXECUTIVEs VIEW CAN BE KICKED INTO THE DUSTBIN BY THE COLLEGIUM MELORDS AND THEY COULD RESSERT THEIR CHOICE ( AS IS HAPPENING WITH KM JOSEPH NOW )<br /><br />The executive has thus ZILCH role in the appointment of judges as a result.<br /><br />OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO PLAY GOD.<br /><br />It is EASY to comprehend that there is FOREIGN HAND in the new hijacked system of kicking the Constitution\u2019s prescription.<br /><br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_181BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1526060535018#c8186360616079631025\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 11:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_180MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">JUDICIARY CANNOT MAKE LAWS .. THIS IS THE PREROGATIVE OF THE LEGISTLATURE. JUDICIARY CAN ONLY INTERPET LAWS--AND THAT TOO WHEN ASKED FOR IT ( NOT BY VESTED PIL )..</span></div>\n<br />In prescribing the appointment to judges of the Supreme Court and the High Courts by the collegium, the Supreme Court did not realise the burden it was imposing on the collegium of selecting judges for the Supreme Court and High Courts and transferring them from one High Court to another.<br /><br />At any given time there are two to three vacancies in the Supreme Court, and 200 in the 22 High Courts and the transfer of a number of judges to be made. An administrative task of this magnitude must necessarily detract the judges of the collegium from their principal judicial work of hearing and deciding cases.<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The collegium neither has a secretariat to shoulder this burden nor an INTELLIGENCE BUREAU to make appropriate inquiries of the competence, character,&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">loyalty to the watan</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, and integrity of a proposed appointee.</span></span></div>\n<br />BEFORE 1947 ALMOST ALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES WERE IN THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br /><br />Lacking this infrastructural backup the collegium resorts to ad hoc informal consultations with other judges in the Supreme Court who are expected to know the merits of a proposed appointee from a High Court or occasionally by sounding a member of the Bar.<br /><br />These methods are poor substitutes for a full time intensive collection of data about an incumbent, his loyalty to the watan, his work, standing, merit, integrity and potential which requires to be made considerably in advance for filing in the vacancy.<br /><br />Besides, the collegium\u2019s deliberations are secret, the system is opaque and the choice of a judge is only known when his name is forwarded to the Government for formal appointment.<br /><br />IN THE RECENT PAST COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SAVED SEVERAL TRAITORS WHO HAVE TRIED TO KILL BHARATMATA .<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIA MUST DESTROY THE COLLEGIUM SYSTEM AND GO FOR NJAC..&nbsp; ONE STUP1D JUDGE HAD SLAPPED BOTH \"SEDITION\" AND \"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" ON ARUN JAITLEY FOR SAYING CONSTITUTION DOES NOT SUPPORT \"COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\" BUT ONLY NJAC&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />The advantage of judicial commissions are that they are independent, broad based and they represent not only the views of the judiciary but also of the executive and other sections of society.<br /><br />IN 1993 A 9 BENCH ( SECOND JUDGES CASE ) ILLEGALLY CONVERTED \"CONSULTATION\" TO \"CONCURRANCE \"..<br /><br />THE 9 BENCH ( THIRD JUDGES CASE ) THE REDUCED THE POWERS OF THE CJI TO A MERE \"RECOMMENDER\".. This\nwealth was accumulated during Mrs. Clinton\u2019s tenure as US Secretary of State\nthrough lucrative speaking fees and contracts paid for by foreign companies and\nClinton Foundation donors.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
