font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews are just\n1.94%&nbsp; of the population of USA.&nbsp; Yet they control everything .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They decide\nwhen a nation of over 320 million will go to war, leave its borders wide open ,\nhave gay marriages - but all that will end with a TRUMP presidency and they are\nin panic mode.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today Hilly Billy Yanks\nknow that a Hillary&nbsp; presidency will seal\ntheir doom!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">56% of donations to\nHillary Clinton\u2019s campaign come from Jewish contributors.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KJxjXeKd1yQ/WBderJnziDI/AAAAAAABNuA/XmBVZTHy7OQiKivraTTQXUTGI5R40OazgCLcB/s1600/imXages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KJxjXeKd1yQ/WBderJnziDI/AAAAAAABNuA/XmBVZTHy7OQiKivraTTQXUTGI5R40OazgCLcB/s400/imXages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The electorate system\nis preferential towards states that have large Jewish populations like Florida,\nOhio, Pennsylvania and Michigan. Jews make up a significant portion of the\nelectorate in several key \"swing states,\" the hard-fought electoral\nbattlegrounds that make or break candidates for president.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is possible to win\nthe election by winning eleven states and disregarding the rest of the country.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-03xNLEj6p-4/WBUTz7qAh6I/AAAAAAABNjQ/4zN5o6b7NF4kQwAmTA9qwr8nAaMj07bvgCLcB/s1600/states_imDDDgmap.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"440\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-03xNLEj6p-4/WBUTz7qAh6I/AAAAAAABNjQ/4zN5o6b7NF4kQwAmTA9qwr8nAaMj07bvgCLcB/s640/states_imDDDgmap.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-22JcdbNxOhY/WBRu99a9wPI/AAAAAAABNeU/KfLg1yUT4jYPbODWNtQaTY9WDRGTnaq7gCLcB/s1600/Electoral_mmmap_2012-2020.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"394\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-22JcdbNxOhY/WBRu99a9wPI/AAAAAAABNeU/KfLg1yUT4jYPbODWNtQaTY9WDRGTnaq7gCLcB/s640/Electoral_mmmap_2012-2020.svg.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one ticket were to take California (55 votes), Texas (38), New York (29),\nFlorida (29), Illinois (20), Pennsylvania (20), Ohio (18), Michigan (16),\nGeorgia (16), North Carolina (15), and New Jersey (14) that ticket would have\n270 votes, which would be enough to win.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">76% of Jews will vote\nfor Hilary in November, which is similar to the percent of Jews that voted for\nBarack Obama in the last elections.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-C66Oi__GpWg/WBRva1LtQvI/AAAAAAABNeY/AhwwLVqKXfYgXORddq21r5R25Eq6_qrfACLcB/s1600/7cdb18791486fb88740b34a75471d018cb59a1a6dd2-618x989.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-C66Oi__GpWg/WBRva1LtQvI/AAAAAAABNeY/AhwwLVqKXfYgXORddq21r5R25Eq6_qrfACLcB/s640/7cdb18791486fb88740b34a75471d018cb59a1a6dd2-618x989.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jewish contributors\nstill mostly support the Democratic Party, despite the unwavering pro-Israeli\npolicy of the Republican Party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Citizens of the United\nStates do not directly elect the president or the vice president; instead they\nchoose \"electors\", who usually pledge to vote for particular\ncandidates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electors are\napportioned to each of the states. The number of electors in each state is\nequal to the number of members of Congress to which the state is entitled.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B7T1eZQ7eQI/WBdeXidle-I/AAAAAAABNt8/_KG7YGvJ1kIXyHOhnkbl769Bm7Me7tk1wCLcB/s1600/im99999ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B7T1eZQ7eQI/WBdeXidle-I/AAAAAAABNt8/_KG7YGvJ1kIXyHOhnkbl769Bm7Me7tk1wCLcB/s400/im99999ages.jpg\" width=\"387\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Therefore, there are currently 538 electors, corresponding to the 435\nRepresentatives and 100 Senators, plus the three additional electors from the\nDistrict of Columbia. The candidate who receives an absolute majority of\nelectoral votes (currently 270) for the office of president&nbsp; is elected to that office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The issue of support\nfor Israel has proven capable of spurring a sizable portion of Jews to switch\nparties - in large enough numbers to tip the scales in national or statewide\nelections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"Israel swing\nvote\" is especially open to political courtship because, unlike the\ninterests of other minority groups, support for Israel has long been compatible\nwith traditional Republican and Democratic agendas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/J24ePU96QBk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/J24ePU96QBk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American Jews not only\nhave a swing vote - a constituency that can be swayed in any direction - they\nalso have a swing issue: support for Israel. The evidence shows that when the\nJewish community judges a candidate to be distinctly problematic on Israel, it\nwill desert that candidate or his party in decisive numbers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This shift can be\nso significant that it could easily decide the outcome in a swing state in a\nclose election<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Each state\u2019s total\nnumber of congressional representatives plus its two senators. Every state (and\nWashington, D.C.) is guaranteed at least three electoral votes.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-v97dMZ1_dDA/WBdeKo5dOuI/AAAAAAABNt0/IBUfekoSIG8zZtjy8MtG3tJAvqsam9PSwCLcB/s1600/1560412_1015190205541173MM3_826736032_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-v97dMZ1_dDA/WBdeKo5dOuI/AAAAAAABNt0/IBUfekoSIG8zZtjy8MtG3tJAvqsam9PSwCLcB/s400/1560412_1015190205541173MM3_826736032_n.jpg\" width=\"275\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Interestingly \u2014 and\ncontroversially \u2014 the more than four million people living in U.S. territories\nlike Puerto Rico and Guam get no electors. And although most residents of these\nterritories are citizens and can participate in their party\u2019s presidential\nprimaries, they have no influence in the general election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The presidential\nelection is a grueling state-by-state battle, and in almost every one of those\nstates, it\u2019s a winner-take-all scenario. That means the candidate who receives\nthe most popular (a.k.a. direct) votes in each state, gets all of that state\u2019s\nelectors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\u2019s bad news for the\nother candidates in the race: even if they lose the popular vote by a handful\nof actual votes, they walk away from that state without a single elector.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE BULLSHIT\nWHICH GOES ON IN HILLY BILLY LAND<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NXtYbWvjuu4/WBdd3rvzuhI/AAAAAAABNtw/pZ58uKjW-acQEbe5sCMWi9ZAKqFcePNKwCLcB/s1600/imagMMes-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NXtYbWvjuu4/WBdd3rvzuhI/AAAAAAABNtw/pZ58uKjW-acQEbe5sCMWi9ZAKqFcePNKwCLcB/s400/imagMMes-1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So looking again at\nCalifornia: if Hillary Clinton wins the popular vote, she gets all 55 electors,\nleaving Donald Trump with none.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And that\u2019s why\nCalifornia and other very populous states like New York, Texas, and Florida are\npolitical jackpots: they have so many delicious electors for the taking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As if this wasn\u2019t\ncomplicated enough, there are actually two states that follow different rules.\nMaine and Nebraska use a proportional system, in which two electors are chosen\nby statewide popular vote and the remaining electors are decided by popular\nvote within each congressional district.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rZr-oswZHl8/WBVlv481VuI/AAAAAAABNkA/hjP9XWw-ZIgAhB5TTIPRE7foY-u1-GgFwCLcB/s1600/ima95ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"131\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rZr-oswZHl8/WBVlv481VuI/AAAAAAABNkA/hjP9XWw-ZIgAhB5TTIPRE7foY-u1-GgFwCLcB/s400/ima95ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s the big swing\nstates (a.k.a. the battleground states) \u2013 like Florida, Ohio, Pennsylvania,\nWisconsin and Virginia \u2013 where Presidential candidates will be spending most of\ntheir time as the election nears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the infamous 2000\nelection, ultimately decided by the Supreme Court, in which Al Gore won more\npopular votes than George W. Bush, but came up short on electoral votes (following\na controversial Florida recount)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the current\nelectoral system, not all votes are equal; voters in swing states and less\npopulous states have disproportionate power.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wq7j5PgA6Rk/WBSxdaI0CQI/AAAAAAABNgs/wdm9neXtPN4Deb-p3rovtrkmPALVqejTwCLcB/s1600/Every%2Btime%2Bwe%2Bwitness%2Ban%2Binjustice%2Band%2Bdo%2Bnot%2Bact%252C%2Bwe%2Btrain%2Bour%2Bcharacter%2Bto%2Bbe%2Bpassive%2Bin%2Bits%2Bpresence%2Band%2Bthereby%2Beventually%2Blose%2BallGG%2Bability%2Bto%2Bdefend%2Bourselves%2Band%2Bthose%2Bwe%2Blove%2B-%2BJulian%2BAssange.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wq7j5PgA6Rk/WBSxdaI0CQI/AAAAAAABNgs/wdm9neXtPN4Deb-p3rovtrkmPALVqejTwCLcB/s400/Every%2Btime%2Bwe%2Bwitness%2Ban%2Binjustice%2Band%2Bdo%2Bnot%2Bact%252C%2Bwe%2Btrain%2Bour%2Bcharacter%2Bto%2Bbe%2Bpassive%2Bin%2Bits%2Bpresence%2Band%2Bthereby%2Beventually%2Blose%2BallGG%2Bability%2Bto%2Bdefend%2Bourselves%2Band%2Bthose%2Bwe%2Blove%2B-%2BJulian%2BAssange.jpg\" width=\"353\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And that means that not\nevery vote has equal impact. In a direct democracy, everyone\u2019s vote would have\nthe same weight regardless of geography.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It encourages\ncandidates to focus their campaigns largely in swing states while often\nignoring the millions of voters in more populous states that tend to\npredictably favor one party.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s a super outdated\nsystem that makes it possible for a candidate to win the popular vote but still\nlose the election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY WE CALL\nYANKS STUPID !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The Forbes Family.\nJohn Murray Forbes and Robert Bennet Forbes worked for Perkins &amp; Co. in its\nOpium trade. Their father, Ralph Forbes, had married into the Perkins family. The\nmost notable family member on the contemporary scene is US Secretary of State\nJohn Forbes Kerry. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. The Russell Family.\nSamuel Wadsworth Russell landed in Canton in 1819 and quickly amassed a fortune\nin the opium trade. &nbsp;&nbsp;Russell's cousin\nand fellow opium trader, William Huntington Russell, was a co-founder and\nfunder of Yale University's Skull and Bones Society.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. The Delano\nFamily.Warren Delano, Jr., the grandfather of Franklin Delano Roosevelt, was\nchief of operations for Russell &amp; Co., another Boston trading firm which\ndid big business in the Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;opium trade in Canton. He first went to China\nat age 24 and spent a decade dealing dope on the Pearl River before returning\nto New York as a newly wealthy and very eligible bachelor. A LOT OF YOUNG SIMI RECRUITS ARE OPIUM DRUG RUNNERS AND ADDICTS\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHCHILD USED HIS MARWARI, PALANPURI AND KATHIAWARI CRYPTO JEWS ( MOSTLY JAINS ) AS AGENTS IN MALWA OPIUM BUSINESS\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTODA THE DESCENDANTS OF THESE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING FAMILIES ARE IN ANTWERP DIAMOND BUSINESS AND ALSO INDIAs BIGGEST INDUSTRIALISTS \u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD HANDED OVER HIS IMMOVABLE ASSETS TO THESE FAMILIES TO OPERATE AS BENAMI OWNERS \u2026\u2026 SOME OF THE OPIUM AGENT DESCENDANTS ARE RAJYA SABHA POLITICIANS \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCultivation of the opium poppy is illegal under Section 8 of the NDPS Act, 1985\u2026\u2026.. However, Rule 8 of the NDPS Rules, 1985, allows cultivation against a licence issued by the Central Bureau of Narcotics\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPoppy cultivation is governed not only by the NDPS Act, but also by the UN Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs, 1961, to which India is a party\u2026\u2026.. In fact, India is the only country authorised to produce gum opium\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nOpen boundaries with Rajasthan, Gujarat and Maharashtra made smuggling of arms easy and that the thriving illegal opium trade in the MALWA--Ratlam-Mandsaur belt provided avenues to raise money\u2026 .<br />\n<br />\nIn 2008, 13 SIMI leaders were arrested from Malwa region; in 2009, five were held\u2026\u2026.. The Nagori brothers and Shibly Peedicaal Abdul, wanted in connection with the Mumbai train serial blasts of July 2006, were among the prize catches of 2008\u2026\u2026. SIMI has a women's wing, the \"Shaheen Force\"\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the rule of the Italian waitress Opium cultivation was rampant in Malwa\u2026\u2026 The Pathan gang in Malwa are CRYPTO JEWS\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAs per the Central Bureau of Narcotics (CBN), any farmer who fails to produce at least 52 kg of opium per hectare for two consecutive years, forfeits his licence for the third season\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for the blogpost below-----<br />\n<br />\n\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026. THE DRUG RUNNERS OF INDIA VADAKAYIL \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nMalwa opium went directly on Rothschild\u2019s ships to USA \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026. Malwa opium, shipped from Bombay, was not only cheaper, but more profitable than its Bengal variant.<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for the blogpost below-----<br />\n<br />\n\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.. OPIUM DRUG RUNNING TAGORE FAMILY VADAKAYIL \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\nAnd<br />\n\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026. Ouspensky met Gurdjieff in 1915 and spent the next five years studying with him.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Guru Gurdjeiff and pupil Ouspensky have lifted from Patanjali\u2019s Yoga and Shiva\u2019s Tantra without understanding it.<br />\n<br />\nThey have explained consciousness , mind states of OM symbol and REM sleep without understanding it.<br />\n<br />\nBoth have wowed the west.<br />\n<br />\nFor an Indian this duo belong to the lowest intellectual plane\u2014at par with Plato, Socrates , Aristotle etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe western mind can only go that far\u2014that is why the white man comes to Indian for LIFE MANAGEMENT \u2013 when psychiatry and psychology goes PHUTTT .<br />\n<br />\nThere is NO other place to get real answers from on this planet .<br />\n<br />\nThe greatest psychoanalyst in the west is still prone to the same kind of sicknesses as any ordinary man, to the same schizophrenia.<br />\n<br />\nAs far as his expertise is concerned he is well- trained, but as far as his humanity is concerned, he is just as ordinary as anybody else. There is no transformation in him nor can he create one.<br />\n<br />\nHas any western psychoanalyst ever shown a bit of calm or certainty or authority or bliss , ever ? Every psychoanalyst has been afraid to talk with a Indian mystic. For they will be soon totally exposed.<br />\n<br />\nThe western psychoanalyst is afraid of meeting an Indian sage , because shallow western philosophy , other than what is lifted from the ancient Vedic thought and stitched together in a clumsy manner , is based on shifting sands , and has no foundation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Indian civilization put down their lofty philosophical thoughts in the Vedas and Upanishads as early as 5000 BC, when the west were doing grunt grunt for language. The Indians had lived all its glories that the west thinks it is attaining now --7000 year ago.<br />\n<br />\nCan Gurdjeiff and Ouspensky ever understand Patanjali\u2019s yoga sutras ? Both got free sex by pretending to me masters of Tantra.<br />\n<br />\nTANTRA IS NOT SEX. Tantra means \u201c technique\u201d in Malayalam and Sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\nYANTRA is a device. In VIGYAN BHAIRAV TANTRA Shiva shows 108 techniques to parvati-- how to raise consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nBhairava is \u201c beyond consciousness \u201c\u2014a NO MIND STATE.<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra was penned down 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra starts with a question from Devi regarding the nature of reality. Parvati asks Shiva about Universe, about fundamental nature of this world, how one can go beyond space and time to understand this truth.<br />\n<br />\nThe book is all about Shiva\u2019s answers to Devi\u2019s queries. He does not tell her what is. He goes on and on giving her different dharanas.<br />\n<br />\nThe book starts with Parvati asking her husband Lord Shiva -<br />\nO Shiva, what is your reality?<br />\nWhat is this wonder-filled universe?<br />\nWhat constitutes seed?<br />\nWho centers the universal wheel?<br />\nWhat is this life beyond form pervading forms?<br />\nHow may we enter it fully, above space and time, names and descriptions?<br />\nLet my doubts be cleared!<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_60MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_60BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_60B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_61B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7610441989913097476\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_61M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html?showComment=1477562425726#c7610441989913097476\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 27, 2016 at 3:30 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_61MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nShe is NOT asking him about how to lick an purulent asshole or suck a syphilitic dick or slimy methods to steal another man\u2019s wife .<br />\n<br />\nSingle messiah/ holy book readers will NOT understand the ramifications of Lord Shiva\u2019s replies, as it is in such a lofty plane.<br />\n<br />\nIt is NOT a dialogue between a Guru and shishya\u2014but a dialogue between two lovers\u2014and hence is refreshingly incisive, where the BEYOND IS EXPRESSED.<br />\n<br />\nYou need not be a woman to be a disciple, but you need to be in a feminine attitude of receptivity.<br />\n<br />\nPhilosophy ( every fuckin\u2019 philosophy is a lie ) is concerned with the mind and the brain is enough; your totality is not required. Tantra needs you in your totality, your every cell among trillions .<br />\n<br />\nVIGYAN BHAIRAV TANTRA verses are coded and an abbreviated way, which only the discerning and enlightened can shed light on-- OSHO was unable to do this.<br />\nVIGYAN BHAIRAV TANTRA is not a dialogue between a guru and shishya, it is a dialogue between two lovers. For only then can the higher, the beyond, be expressed.<br />\n<br />\nLovers have always known what saints have not known, for they have have touched that center.<br />\n<br />\nThe whole of tantra is concerned with the techniques of how to transcend the mind for the human mind lives with laws and an order.<br />\n<br />\nOsho is right when he says \" in tantra there is no devil, only divine existence\" and that the tantric orgasm is a deep, relaxing meditation..<br />\nTantra will not give you the answer--it just shows a technique to attain the answer.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTantra says that when there is no mind, that is the state of a Bhairava \u2013 a no-mind state.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is suppression with awareness, while tantra is indulgence with awareness. Tantra teaches you how to be witness.<br />\nLord Shiva gives his wife Parvati most profound methods of centering oneself using a lover ( this is NOT sex) , achieving pure awareness, quantum entrainment, consciousness , prana amplification , focusing the mind like a laser beam, the meaning of OM, channeling the breath for Nitric oxide boost, the alpha / theta frequency states, nadis, bindu of Sri Yantra geometry , shabda brahman, advaita brahmAn , raising kundalini, the chakras, mudras, tattwas, delusions of Maya, core of Shakti etc etc -<br />\n<br />\nThe modern man is NOT intelligent enough or perceptive enough to understand the ancient Tantra\u2014which has been reduced to sex and perversion.<br />\n<br />\nTantra stands for deep experiences. Anything experienced can be transcended; anything suppressed can never be transcended.<br />\n<br />\nIf at all sex is involves it is only to achieve purity. A small child is NOT aware that he is stealing . He is NOT aware of his nakedness. This is why we Hindus do NOT cremate our young children who die. They do NOT have egos .<br />\n<br />\nTheir minds are not harnessed by laws . Tantra transcends the mind and accept the whole of the human in complete totality . Mind is an order and it lives with de\ufb01nitions and disciplines..<br />\nShiva tells Parvati \u2013take your pick-- he tells her to choose anyone of the 108 methods.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is suppression with awareness; tantra is indulgence with awareness.<br />\n<br />\nTantra method is to be aware of the desire , NOT to create any \ufb01ght, but to move in desire with full consciousness,and only then you can transcend it.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is outgoing energy, while tantra is energy moving inwards.<br />\n<br />\nTantra is about depth, while yoga is about height.<br />\nI have created all worlds at my will, without being urged by any higher being, and I dwell within them. I permeate the earth and heaven, all created entities with my greatness, and dwell in them as eternal and infinite consciousness.\u2014\u2009Devi Sukta, Rigveda 10.125.8 - 5000 BC<br />\n<br />\nTantric art has captured the images of the Hindu god Shiva and his consort, the goddess Shakti, in ecstatic union. Shiva is recognized as the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Shakti as the embodiment of pure energy. Through uniting with Shiva, Shakti gave form to his spirit and created the universe. SHIVA symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. SHAKTI symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_61MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_61BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_61B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_62B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3205610102358549064\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_62M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. In tantric sex there is NO ejaculation and can go on from sunset to sunrise..<br />\n<br />\n--the opposite pole energy is renewed.<br />\n<br />\nthe tantra ecstasy will last for for weeks.<br />\n<br />\nthis planet is NOT ready for all this--as too may selfish people exist.<br />\n<br />\nTantra is a highly complex and sophisticated science and hence it requires a Guru to teach you Tantra.<br />\n<br />\nAll real tantrics know how to raise the Kundalini just by an act of controlled sex . Tantrics hold the human body as the pinnacle of creation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Dakshinachara style is the Vedic style ( right handed path ) were you undergo pain via penance to come into consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vamachara style ( left handed path ) is done via forbidden pleasures . Yet none of the Tantrics are hedonists as they remain above this base plane. The human body could send scalar fields to hyperpace by actuating the Mobius coils in the DNA and the blood veins and arteries.<br />\n<br />\nThis left handed style is now dead- once upon a time it was prevalent in North Malabar, . The Vedic right handed style has decimated this Vamachara path.<br />\n<br />\nIn Kerala Tantrics would sit in the middle of a venomous snake pit filled with hundreds of cobras and vipers and draw a circle around them, which no snake will transgress.<br />\n<br />\nThe Internet is full of thousands of fake charlatan Tantrics wanting free screws with attractive women. Tantric have always shunned the spotlight for millieniums, even by adopting unacceptable behavior, and there is NO way they will advertise their wares by TV and Internet.<br />\n<br />\nAll such people should be put in jail.<br />\n<br />\nTo be honest, Tantra existed before the Vedas were written.<br />\n<br />\nTantra sex uses MOBIUS COILS of the body.<br />\n<br />\nA match stick can be given to a monkey-- only after the monkey is trained.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOther wise you have monkeys like Armenian JEW Georges Ivanovich Gurdjieff - SCREWING ALL HIS ATTRACTIVE DISCIPLES- - MOSTLY VULNERABLE MARRIED WOMEN.<br />\n<br />\nGurdjieff had pathetic understanding of Vedanta\u2014he claimed that mortals live their lives in a state of hypnotic \"waking sleep\", but that it is possible to transcend to a higher state of consciousness and achieve full human potential.<br />\n<br />\nGurdjieff made his students do \"sacred dances\" or \"movements\", later known as the Gurdjieff movements, which they performed together as a group. Osho caught on later and did his own thingy with more SEX thrown in .<br />\n<br />\nGurdjeiff read from Socrated and Plato who stole from Vedanta and patented whatever they could underdstad in their own name. Socratic and Platonic emphasis on \"the examined life\" recurs in Gurdjieff's teaching as the practice of self-observation.<br />\n<br />\nGurdjeiff spAke that Bible possesses a very different meaning than what is commonly attributed to it. He does NOT know that Bible was cooked up in 325 AD by the Roman emperor.<br />\n<br />\nPD Ouspensky learnt the FOURTH WAY from Gurdjieff, and then went around teaching his own STUPID WAY. Ouspensky visited India before he met Gurdjeiff.<br />\n<br />\nOuspensky provided an original discussion of the nature and expression of sexuality in his A New Model of the Universe\u2014bull of the first order.<br />\n<br />\nOuspensky's relationship with Gurdjieff is why Ouspensky left him, not once but three times\u2014Essentuki, 1918; Constantinople, 1921; Prieur\u00e9, 1924.<br />\n<br />\nHe had asked Gurdjieff in early July 1917, after some two years of work on himself: \"How can one strengthen the feeling of \"I\" and strengthen the activity of \"I\"?<br />\n<br />\nHindu mysticism is not about only intellectual understanding and splitting hairs in a way nobody will understand , and hence ask no questions , but is based on transformation of the man himself.<br />\n<br />\nThe whole personality of the western psychoanalyst is not involved in his work, only his education. No Indian sage will ever commit suicide like western psychoanalysts.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_62MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_62BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_62B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_63B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3500045066063325748\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_63M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. The psychoanalyst is NOT even a teacher. He pretends to know everything about the mind, but the poor guy does not know how to change his own mind, leave alone the pupil's.<br />\n<br />\nWhat does a psychoanalyst do? He makes the patient lie down on a couch , three times a week, and tells them to talk about their dreams and themselves. What can he extract out of this session other than money for himself.<br />\n<br />\nNone of them even knew what REM sleep is all about. The eastern mystic does NOT charge fees and hence he cares.<br />\n<br />\nYOGA IS NOW PATENTED BY ROGUES AND CHARLATANS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\n<br />\nOuspensky does NOT understand I ( EGO )-- he goes off on a midless tangent. \u201cThese 'I's are not connected and are not co-ordinated in any way. Each of them depends on the change in external circumstances, and on the change of impressions BLAH BLAH \u201c<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS DO NOT CREMATE EGO-LESS SAGES AND YOUNG CHILDREN WHO HAVE NOT YET FORMED AN EGO<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BRAHMAN SHEARS OFF PIECES OF HIS OWN FIELD LOWERS THE FREQUENCY TO ITS LOWEST AND SENDS THEM ON EARTH TO EXPERIENCE AND RAISE THEIR OWN FREQUENCIES .</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AT THE APEX OF SOUL EVOLUTION ( FROM UNI-CELLED BACTERIA TO JIVAN MUKT ) THE SOUL NOW AT ITS HIGHEST FREQUENCY AFFORDED BY KARMA , RE-UNITES WITH BRAHMAN ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">EVOLUTION IS NOT OF THE CARCASS ( CADAVER ) THE WAY FREE MASON AND MAD MAN CHARLES DARWIN PROPOUNDED</span></b><br />\n<br />\nOuspensky speaks the truth when he says \u2013\u201cFor thousands of years psychology existed under the name of philosophy. In India all forms of Yoga, are essentially psychology\u201d \u201cEverything that man thinks he does, really happens. It happens exactly as 'it rains,' or 'it thaws.'<br />\n<br />\nHe fails to understand reality when he says \u201c We must understand that man can do nothing \u201c \u201cMan cannot move, think or speak of his own accord. He is a marionette pulled here and there by invisible strings\u201d<br />\n<br />\n\u2013BUT AS PER VEDANTA MAN IS GIVEN FREE WILL AND HE FORGES THE HINGES OF HIS DESTINY ON HIS OWN TERMS.<br />\n<br />\nINDEED !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MAN IS HIS SOUL\u2014 EVOLUTION BELONGS TO SOUL\u2014 SOUL CREATES, INVENTS AND DISCOVERS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE FEED BACK LOOP BECOMES STILL AND EVOLUTION STAGNATES, BRAHMA INHALES \u2013<br />\n<br />\nPRALAYA HAPPENS-- FOR CHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT \u2013<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMA THEN BREATHES OUT AGAIN AND CREATES A NEW FORMATTED COSMOS \u2013<br />\n<br />\nTHINGS START ALL OVER AGAIN FROM SCRATCH.<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU TAKES HIS FIRST MATSYA AVATAR.<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN MAHARISHIS PICK OFF VEDAS FROM AKASHIK RECORDS .<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A CONTINUOUS ENDLESS CYCLE .<br />\n<br />\nAND HOW !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_63MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedE5aUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_64b+seedE5aUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1513299301098#c2062343270619180569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 15, 2017 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME TO EXPOUND ON QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT IN VEDAS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHY DOES WIKIPEDIA BAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL. BECAUSE I GO WITH VEDAS AGAINST STUPID PEOPLE LIKE ISAAC NEWTON AND ALBERT EINSTEIN ( WHO SAYS FASTER THAN SPEED OF LIGHT IS IMPOSSIBLE ) \u2013 BOTH THIEVES WHO STOLE FROM VEDAS WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANCIENT VEDIC ASTROLOGY FACTORED IN QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One of the core objections to astrology is that there is no known scientific mechanism to account for how it all works. Well for this modern scientists have to work hard for another 500 years . The lack of a mechanism using 5 low bandwidth human senses is MAD justification for dismissing a Quantum entanglement phenomenon.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement says that two entangled particles affect each other irrespective of distance and time. We humans are NOT what you see in the mirror, we are balls of energy called SOULS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN KERALA ASTROLOGY WE RUSTLE COWRIE SHELLS. MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE . AT EVERY INSTANCE THE ASTROLOGER RUSTLED COWRIE SHELLS TO PICK UP A RANDOM NUMBER OF SHELLS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The lodestone (compass) was used successfully for several millennia in India. Kerala navigators traded with crete . Yet, no white man understood the Earth's magnetic field until the 20th century.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Mahabharata Arjuna shot his arrow into the red ruby eye of a magnetic fish floating unsteadily overhead in a transparent rotating bowl filled with water, by looking at its reflection in a placid pool of water below. He won the hand of Princess Draupadi at the Swayamvar. This is the ultimate test of human consciousness .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only a couple of mammals like elephant, dolphin and bonobos can pass the mirror and colour test.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement breaks the bedrock rules of standard physics: that nothing can travel FASTER THAN LIGHT , that objects are only influenced by their immediate surroundings\u2014that we need to verify by using our limited bandwith five sense for scientific approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through quantum entanglement, seemingly independent particles become intertwined. Entangled atoms can no longer be considered separate entities, but make sense only as part of a whole \u2014 even though the atoms may be far apart.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entangled particles can be used for \u201cquantum communication\u201d \u2014 a means of sending super secure messages that doesn't rely on cables, wireless signals, or code.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through a trick of quantum mechanics, you can link two particles in a special way, separate them, and then observe the effects of one upon the other over large distances. This is known as quantum entanglement \u2014 placing two objects in the same entangled quantum state.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entanglement can be demonstrated in the lab with particles of light. When these two particles, or photons, are separated over large distances, they are still correlated with each other. If you measure one particle, the other particle's state will be determined immediately no matter how far it is away.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because any interference with an entangled particle, even the mere act of observing it, automatically affects its partner, these missives can't be hacked. To hear quantum physicists tell it, entangled particles could help build a \u201cquantum internet,\u201d give rise to new kinds of coding, and allow for faster-than-light communication \u2014 possibilities that have powerful appeal in an era where hospitals, credit card companies, government agencies, even election systems are falling victim to cyber attacks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement is a quantum mechanical phenomenon in which the quantum states of two or more objects have to be described with reference to each other, even though the individual objects may be spatially separated. This leads to correlations between observable physical properties of the systems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_18T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5166903869757240958\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">For example, it is possible to prepare two particles in a single quantum state such that when one is observed to be spin-up, the other one will always be observed to be spin-down and vice versa, this despite the fact that it is impossible to predict, according to quantum mechanics, which set of measurements will be observed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">As a result, measurements performed on one system seem to be instantaneously influencing other systems entangled with it. Quantum entanglement has applications in the emerging technologies of quantum computing and quantum cryptography, and has been used to realize quantum teleportation experimentally.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Imagine you are a photon, a packet of light. You are a tiny blip of energy, hurtling through the universe on your own. But you have a twin, another photon to whom you have been intimately connected since the day you were born. No matter what distance separates you, be it the width of a lab bench or the breadth of the universe, you mirror each other. Whatever happens to your twin instantaneously affects you, and vice versa.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entangled photons don't need wires or cables to link them, but on Earth it is necessary to use a fiber optic cable to transmit one of the particles to its desired location. But fibers absorb light as the photon travels through, so the quantum connection weakens with every mile the particle is transmitted. The previous distance record for what's known as quantum teleportation, or sending information via entangled particles, was about 141 kilometers</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But no light gets absorbed in space, because there's nothing to do the absorbing. Space is empty. This means that entangled particles can be transmitted long distances across the vacuum and not lose information. Entangled particles sent through space could vastly extend the distance across which entangled particles communicate. The behavior of entangled particles in space and across vast distances offers insight into the nature of space-time.. Entangled photons know what their partner is doing</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Modern physicists know that there are actually four fundamental forces: the two nuclear forces, the electromagnetic force and the gravitational force. All of these play a role in binding matter together, from the tiniest of atoms to the largest of planets.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is well known in physics experiments that the observer can become entangled with the object that they are measuring, changing the measurement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that we are all entangled in some way, and there really is a connection between every living thing in the galaxy. The effects of quantum entanglement tend to be very small for everyday objects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands used their bodies for generating laser beams.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Processes in large biomolecules could be influenced by quantum entanglement effects. In the world of condensed matter physics \u2014 the study of solids \u2014 entanglement is more commonplace.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A superconductor floating over a magnet in the Meissner effect \u2014 are from macroscopic quantum entanglements of electrons, or a spooky \"force\" acting over large distances. Quantum entanglement plays a role in modern physics and it is a binding principle for matter and energy. However, quantum entanglement on a large scale is difficult to achieve, and even more difficult to observe in living creatures.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Scientists are still struggling to develop a theory of Quantum Gravity and as a result a Grand Unified Field Theory\u2014which is represented by the divine 3D geometry of Sri Yantra\u2014the symbol of OM , whose digital number is 108.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Vedic Puranas the Great bear constellation stars ( 7 Sapt Rishis ) and entangled with their 7 wives in Pleiades constellation</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2716751153349151345\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_19M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_19MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">#### Sapt rishi husband \u2013 Great Bear constellation star / Sapt rishi wife - Pleiades constellation star #####</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Krathu - Dubhe / Santhati - Merope</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Atri - Megrez / Anasuya -Electra</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Vasishta - Mizar / Arundhathi - Taygeta</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Angiras - Alioth / Shraddha - Calaeno</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Pulaha - Merak / Havubhuh - Alcyone</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Pulastya -Phecda /Gathih - Maia</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Bhrigu - Alkaid / Puloma \u2013 Asterope</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Vedic Indian rishis, firmly believed that the invisible below the quantum screen gives rise to the visible.. For Quantum entanglement, the entangled particles have to originate from the same source</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WATER HAS QUANTUM MEMORY. Quantum physics has showed the ancient Indian Yogis were NOT mere dreamers of cosmic consciousness, where our bodies, our brain and its mind, as inextricably joined with other matter and the mega dipole of universe .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Indian Vedic maharishis had the inherent ability to go on either side of the narrow band of five human senses. They could transcend the senses and limitations of space-time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In the quantum picture, electromagnetic radiation has a dual nature, existing both as waves and as streams of particles called photons. Photons are exchanged whenever electrically charged subatomic particles interact.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The photon has no electric charge, so it does not experience the electromagnetic force itself\u2014in other words, photons cannot interact with one another.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">At the level of quantum reality the universe is not made up of things. It is comprised of oscillating fields of energy. In the quantum domain everything is interrelated. The universe is filled with an incomprehensible amount of energy and substance\u2014some of which is imperceptible to our physical senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Radio waves, microwaves, infrared waves and microscopic particles are just a few examples of the infinite aspects of reality that elude the perception of our 5 senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Narrowing our 5 senses bands , serve as a filter or squelch to prevent breakdown due to excess information. THEY PONDERED ABOUT MAYA BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN. . THEY ARE NOT STUPID TO DO THIS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The theory of Maya is one of the grand pillars upon which Vedanta rests. The word origin of MAYA is derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and YA ( that ). The term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology, Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis of the reclining Vishnu. MAYA is the veritable fabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the morphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya just as magicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Our 5 senses serve as a filter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our physical existence.
