font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; In this theory, a piece of a long-term memory is similarly distributed over a dendritic arbor so that each part of the dendritic network contains all the information stored over the entire network<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Holograms encode distributed information as multi-scalar interference of coherent vibrations, e.g. from lasers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Structures inside brain neurons called microtubules as sources of laser-like coherence for the brain\u2019s vibrational hierarchy. The brain processes and stores information holographically as a massively parallel processing and associative computer system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 3--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Holographic processing is accomplished with the brain acting as a phase conjugating device (e.g. a phase gate) which is type of logic circuit where the inputs are sensitive to the phase of the input signal producing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Microtubules are cylindrical lattice polymers of the protein \u2018tubuln\u2019, major components of the structural cytoskeleton inside cells<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">A laser hologram is that it exhibits the distributive property. This means that even a small part of an entire holographic record contains the entire record of the recorded image .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The fact that living cells in any organism evolve and grow from more simple stem cells, implies quantum entanglement throughout the organism and its composite parts, with an associated instantaneous exchange of information through PCAR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PCAR is necessary for the brain to perceive objects as they really exist in three dimensional space. If the brain had to rely solely on the visible light spectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the retina of the eyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be if a picture of the object was recorded photographically with a camera.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Contrary to the popular opinion that we see objects in three dimensions entirely because of binocular vision, just close one eye and observe an external object with the remaining open eye. The object appears \"out there\" and not as an image \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This clearly presents a survival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately see and locate objects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ANIMALS CANY PASS THE COLOUR AND MIRROR TEST EXCEPT A HANDFUL OF CONCIOUS MAMMALS LIKE DOLPHIN, ELEPHANT, BONOBOS ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck knew Sanskrit and read the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck, ( founder of Quantum theory ) wrote the \u201cPlanck postulate\u201d, that electromagnetic energy could be emitted or absorbed only in discrete quanta which formed the basis of the description of black body radiation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">This was ultimately extended and used to describe how all matter absorbs and reemits photons (quanta of energy) from and into the quantum foam of the zero point field ( AKASHA that pervades all matter and even the vacuum of space..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Normally these emissions are random exchanges of energy between particles and the ZPF. However, the emissions from complex matter (e.g. living organisms) have been shown to exhibit quantum coherence and also carry information non-locally. Recall that the quantum phenomena of non-locality implies instantaneous transmission of information across space and time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Quantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like all models it enables us to make predictions and create interpretations about how nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Every one of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint of DNA and clearly that DNA and environmental influences exert major influences over the development and functioning of our cells. But cells are not only subordinate to DNA; they also function and maintain homeostasis by communicating and cooperating simultaneously with many other cells of the body and by the information they receive from the environment. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. This exchange is certainly necessary and provides information about how a cell must change to express itself correctly to become the right type of cell at the right place and at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">In higher organisms with brains, the massively parallel processing capabilities of the brain structures are capable of simultaneously resonating with QUANTUM HOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of frequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">AKASHIK RECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive foundation that contains not only all knowledge of the human experience but also the entire history of the universe. Our normal five senses cannot access this information but it can be accessed through spiritual practices such as meditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We live in a universe that operates according to the following principles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">It is:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Self-organizing - All non living and living matter seems to be the result of the emergent complexity adapting and evolving in response to changes in the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Intelligent - The universe utilizes information, processes it and assigns meaning to it. It seems to evaluate new experiences against stored information and \"chooses\" actions based on that evaluation based on feedback mechanisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Creative - All matter in the universe appears to be interconnected and communicates with itself to continually form more complex systems. These systems seem to regulate and organize themselves in ways that are flexible, adaptable and exhibit some form of purposeful behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Interactive - All matter continually interacts with all other matter. There is no such thing as independent action. Everything is defined in relationship to everything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Learning - Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the Quantum Hologram. Once information is created it is always available and never forgotten.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Participatory -The role of intention in conscious matter has demonstrable effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Evolving - Since its beginnings, nature has been developing into ever increasing levels of complexity in response to environmental changes or pressures resulting from natural processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Non-locally connected - All things in nature are interconnected in a very fundamental way beyond time and space. The exchange of information between any two objects occurs instantaneously no matter their space time separation and these interconnections cannot be shielded or attenuated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Based on Quantum Principles - From the micro scale of subatomic particles to the largest objects in the cosmos and everything in between, all matter displays the quantum characteristics of entanglement, coherence, correlation and resonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. THE METERS ARE SACRED.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SOUND OF THE VEDIC VERSES MATTERS , NOT THE MEANING OF THE VERSE , WHICH BASICALLY INDUCE A FEELING OF GRATITUDE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN THOUGHT HE COULD INJECT POISON INTO OUR VEDAS-- THEY NEVER KNEW, THAT&nbsp; ONCE POISON IS INJECTED THE VERSE IS MATHEMATICALLY INCONGRUENT --IT IS LIKE CURDLING MILK<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4671100578196233665\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Physicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Qubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Entanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span></span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span></span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Maharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">It\u2019s main postulates are:--</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">All of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Except ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Space-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">There are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Energy and mass are equivalent.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Here are some of the Sutras: ---</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Force is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">In the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span></span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><br /></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"></li>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_176TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_172B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1348481307020028419\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_172M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU WERE WOVEN INTO THE \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" BULLSHIT STORY .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 29, 2017 at 5:18 AM<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA--<br />\n<br />\nFULL MOON DAY ( POORNIMA ) AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nAND ..<br />\n<br />\nNEW MOON DAY ( AMAVASYA ) -- AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nWERE HOLIDAYS --FOR FASTING ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br />\n<br />\nSIX FIXED HOLIDAYS IN A MONTH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DO THIS TODAY IN MODERN TIMES--AND EAT ORGANIC FOOD , YOU WILL NOT GET CANCER..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE EVIL WHITE INVADER-- BASTARD-- CAME TO INDIA-- HE MADE US WORSE THAN MONKEYS BY MAKING US FAST ON WRONG MEANINGLESS DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947 JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS IN INDIA. \u2026 HE MADE THE PONTIFFS OF THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS CRYPTO JEWS WITH PALE EYES --STOPPING THE 4000 YEAR OLD TRADITION OK KERALA NAMBOODIRIS HEADING THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE POST ABOVE IS THE REPEAT THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR 1.1 BILLION HINDUS ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nSPRING TIDES ARE STRONGEST THREE DAYS-- REPEAT ---THREE DAYS AFTER FULL MOON AND NEW MOON..<br />\n<br />\nTides are long-period waves that roll around the planet as the ocean is \"pulled\" back and forth by the gravitational pull of the moon and the sun as these bodies interact with the Earth in their monthly and yearly orbits\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDuring full or new moons\u2014which occur when the Earth, sun, and moon are nearly in alignment\u2014average tidal ranges are slightly larger. ..This occurs twice each month. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe moon appears new (dark) when it is directly between the Earth and the sun. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br />\n<br />\nTHREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. HE CUT THEM OFF CULTURALLY FROM INDIA BY INTRODUCING FAKE FESTIVALS AT FAKE DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS NOT BORN ON THIS PLANET..-- HINDUS WOULD HAVE NEVER EVER KNOW ABOUT THIS HUMONGOUS DECEIT\u2026 THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ..<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN BODY AND BRAIN IS FULL OF WATER --AND SPRING TIDES AFFECT US..<br />\n<br />\nWater covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 66% of the human body. Brain is 83% water, blood-92%, kidneys - 82%, liver-69% , muscles-75%, bones-28%...<br />\n<br />\nIn my language Malayalam and in Sanskrit Kapha, Pitta and Vata means the same. Kapha is mucous , Pitta is bile and Vata means vayu or fart ( flatulence ). ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU FAST YOU BALANCE THE TRI DOSHAS..<br />\n<br />\nMost Hindus observe fast on Purnima and Amavasya. ..<br />\n<br />\nPeople who fast SERIOUSLY continue till the third day when the water pull/ push in human cells is highest . ..<br />\n<br />\nThese three days Hindus fast or take light veggie food rich in Magnesium\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFasting is done to reduce the acidic content in our system and to slow down the metabolic rates\u2026 This restores the body and mind balance. ..Meditation helps in centering your body, mind and soul\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2\u2014</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_141BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When the body is not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up tired and lethargic . There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. Only if conditions are right within the body can the moon pull the sodium back across the cell membrane, thus making way for the Magnesium to exert a gentle push with the potassium, so that they go back to their rightful position, which is inside the cell\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhat is lymph? gobble them up; strip them for parts; and use the resulting molecules for energy or to make new cell parts.<br />\n<br />\nAutophagy makes us more efficient machines to get rid of faulty parts, stop cancerous growths, and stop metabolic dysfunction like obesity and diabetes.. the process plays a hand in controlling inflammation and immunity.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT EFFECT IS THAT THE BRAIN GETS SHARPENED AND THE AGEING PROCESS SLOWS DOWN<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10jNZleNH9w<br />\n<br />\nFROM NOW ON HINDUS WILL CREATE THEIR OWN DESTINY--WE DONT CARE FOR THE WHITE MEN WHO FOOLED US USING AGENTS LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_139MN\" kind=\"m\"></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; superintendent ( his height was 6 feet 6 inches ) , insulted me when I went to Netherlands for\ncompany briefing, before I took over command of their highly sophisticated\nChemical tanker .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The young Dutch owner\nof the company ( who invited me there ) was by my side .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He told me \" He\nis upset that brown skins are taking over the company from white skins . He is\na racist . I am NOT tying to gain by lesser wages --I know you are more\ncompetent than any white captain in my company.&nbsp;\nBy the way, why did you NOT give it back to him--I have heard you are\nfamous for that \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I replied &nbsp;\" &nbsp;I did NOT want to show disrespect to you, as you would watch. &nbsp; Send Mr Racist on board within ten days . I will strip him naked on my ship . I will let you\nknow how I did it. The Dutch Chief Engineer on board will witness it. &nbsp;When his\ngets off the ship, I want you to debrief him and find out how I stripped that\nracist intellectually NAKED. &nbsp; I will take him on a tour of my ship along with Chief Engineer , and I will bet my bottom dollar that he wont know where to look even in the engine room , being an \"expert \" &nbsp;engineer . &nbsp;I am a mere deck boy &nbsp;\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS ALL ABOUT LOOKING\nAT THE RIGHT PLACE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN YOU SNAP YOUR\nFINGERS AT A NEW BORN KITTEN, STANDING NAKED IN FRONT OF IT- &nbsp;IT WILL NOT LOOK\nAT YOUR FINGERS , OR BALLS -- IT WILL LOOK INTO YOUR &nbsp;EYES . THE WAY GOD MEANT IT\nTO BE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7qNka34Z9KE/WBCESM8eQjI/AAAAAAABNVo/-J0J-LFbbYo-XGay76uWDw6AHLHupC--wCLcB/s1600/kww2itten-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"516\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7qNka34Z9KE/WBCESM8eQjI/AAAAAAABNVo/-J0J-LFbbYo-XGay76uWDw6AHLHupC--wCLcB/s640/kww2itten-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LONG AGO WHEN I VISITED\nTHE BRITISH STONEHENGE , I SAW A WHITE BRITISH STONEHENGOLOGIST ( SIC ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LATER ON WHEN I WENT TO\nTHE LOCAL PUB, I SAW THIS GUY AND I SAT NEXT TO HIM AT THE BAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS OLD MAN HAS SPENT\nHIS WHOLE LIFE STUDYING THE BRITISH STONEHENGE&nbsp;\nAND OF COURSE EARNED COUNTLESS QUID WITH HIS BULL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO I ASKED HIM \u201c WHO\nMADE THE STONEHENGE ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SAID\u2014IT IS SUCH A\nCOMPLICATED STRUCTURE THAT ONLY ALEINS COULD HAVE MADE IT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He showed me his photos\nand diagrams with lot of lines and angles <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I asked him \u201c How many\nportals or there on stonehenge ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He replied correctly \u2013 &nbsp;\"Twenty seven !\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I asked him \u2013 \"Why 27\n? &nbsp;Why not 26 or 30 ?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had NO fucking idea\n! &nbsp;He did not even understand astronomy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>So I pointed to a\nportal ( between two pillars ) and told him\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>\u201c That is me. &nbsp; POORAM NAKSHATRAM.&nbsp;\nI am <i>Pooram Piranna Purushan</i> . &nbsp; &nbsp;If you give me 3 strong people I will make a better stonehenge \u201c</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then I walked away-- no point in educating IDIOTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mystery-of-stonehenge-solved-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mystery-of-stonehenge-solved-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y7_Fo8Qxo8c/WBCuOp96PoI/AAAAAAABNWs/pkuWEWrNHPoXVHQb9h8lpS2cbwftxZeXgCLcB/s1600/nakshddatras.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"344\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y7_Fo8Qxo8c/WBCuOp96PoI/AAAAAAABNWs/pkuWEWrNHPoXVHQb9h8lpS2cbwftxZeXgCLcB/s640/nakshddatras.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nakshatra is one of 27\nsectors along the ecliptic.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ecliptic is an imaginary line on the sky that\nmarks the annual path of the sun. It is the projection of Earth's orbit onto\nthe celestial sphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED , DOING GRUNT GRUNT--WE INDIANS WERE MASTERS IN ASTRONOMY</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SNs80T5ZXAc/WBCrnL5xjrI/AAAAAAABNWY/x90XwcQHXUAN3cp6n3nIGsTFH4auq7HLACLcB/s1600/nakshatraee4day.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"566\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SNs80T5ZXAc/WBCrnL5xjrI/AAAAAAABNWY/x90XwcQHXUAN3cp6n3nIGsTFH4auq7HLACLcB/s640/nakshatraee4day.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My nakshatra is Pooram\n( Purva Phalguni )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-d2x1hh8OTLI/WBCq_SnoO2I/AAAAAAABNWM/TwM2gpjyyDgU2TUuylFZisiH0EEBC5FNQCLcB/s1600/mafnsions.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWELL WELL, WHAT DO YOU KNOW !&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">I AM JUST TELLING 5 % <o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMEANWHILE ENJOY THE PICTURES &nbsp;BELOW--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
