Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_15.html?showComment=1516063668705#c4093553763592258806\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 16, 2018 at 6:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE CALLED ME UP OVER THE CNN TV PROGRAM --WHERE IRANIAN JEWESS CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR WAS DISCUSSING LEORNARDO DA VINCI WITH JEW WALTER ISAACSON, THE EX-CHAIRMAN OF CNN.<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID , EVEN IF LEONARDO DA VINCI STOLE 100% FROM TECHNICAL BOOKS OF THE GREAT LIBRARY AT CORDOBA SPAIN.. HE WAS A GREAT ARTIST<br />\n<br />\nBALLS<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN, I HAVE SEEN THEM ALL--I HAVE BEEN ALL OVER ITALY AND SPAIN --AND SO HAS MY ELDER SON<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HEARD OF BERNINI ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/bernini-unsung-genius-bernini-versus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLET US ASSUME FR ARGUMENTs SAKE THAT LEONARDO DA VINCI DID NOT STEAL ( ONLY IMAGINE )<br />\n<br />\nHIS TECHNICAL DRAWINGS ARE NOTHING --<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE FIRST TO SAY THAT PYRAMIDS IN EGYPT WERE BUILT BY WATER FLOTATION POWER--LIKE SHIPS IN THE PANAMA CANAL--THIS IS ON RECORD<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EASE IN SOME MORE<br />\n<br />\nPYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY KERALA SAGES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THEY GET THE PRECISION--THIS IS BEING TOLD FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THE PLANET--SO HARK<br />\n<br />\nPRECESSION INSTRUMENTS LIKE SPHEROMETER , SCREW GUAGE , VERNIER CALIPERS ETC WERE ALL LIFTED FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY<br />\n<br />\nTOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION WAS AN INDIAN INVENTION..<br />\n<br />\nAncient Indians were the masters of Total Internal Reflection, and faster than light soliton waves. Today we see it used in fibre optics. Total Internal Reflection was a science written down in our Vedic texts 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nTill the white man discovered diamonds in South Africa in 1886, diamonds were available only in India. In 1726 the white man had found some\" low quality\" diamonds on a Brazilian river bed. The next discovery was in 1906 in Congo.<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT GET THE PRECISION WITHOUT MEASURING INSTRUMENTS AND KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nA PYRAMID ( ON A MACRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE FIRST DRAWN IN SMALL SCALE ON PAPER--INCORPORATING THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 AND THE GOLDEN ANGLE OF 51 DEGREES, 49 MINUTES AND 38.25 SECONDS<br />\n<br />\nA DIAMOND ( ON MICRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE ENLARGED ON PAPER<br />\n<br />\nRATNA PARIKSHA was a 5000 year old Sanskrit text on optics which dealt with critical angles, high refractive index of diamond ( 2.4 ) and low critical angle ( 24 deg ) and total internal reflection physics and the art of cutting diamonds, to make it spit fire.. Precision was 100% required as a poor cut brought bad luck<br />\n<br />\nThe EYE OF BRAHMA ( colour changing diamond at middle eye ) would become opaque as soon as it was gouged out and stolen --and it brought a terrible curse. So as soon as the white an stole it , the first thing he did was to cut the diamond ( poorly ).<br />\n<br />\nThis was done even with SYAMANTAKAM ( Kohinoor). Despite cutting it brought bad luck. The queen consulted Indian astrologers and started the BEEF EATER and BLACK RAVEN thingy -it continues even today at the Tower of London<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun is low in the sky the rainbow appears relatively high; as the Sun rises higher, the rainbow appears lower in the sky, maintaining the critical 40\u00b0- to 42\u00b0-angle. When the Sun is more than 42\u00b0 above the horizon no rainbow can be seen because the required angle passes over the head of the observer.<br />\n<br />\nThe secondary rainbow has an angular radius of about 50\u00b0 and hence is seen outside of the primary bow. Higher-order rainbows, resulting from three or more internal reflections, are exceedingly weak but can be observed in Kerala in the months of August.<br />\n<br />\nAll this is written in our ancient texts.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/mysteries-beneath-egyptian-sphinx-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIKE THE THREE GIZA PYRAMIDS ( BUILT ON VAASTU ) THE THREE TEOTIHUACAN PYRAMIDS ARE ALSO ALIGNED TO THE THREE STARS OF THE BELT OF ORION.</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">LARGE QUANTITIES OF LIQUID MERCURY WERE FOUND UNDER THE TEOTIHUACAN PYRAMID .. THIS MERCURY IN NOT NATURAL-- LIQUID MERCURY IS ARTIFICIAL..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY FOUND A HIDDEN TUNNEL BY MISTAKE WHEN FLOOD WATER STARTED DRAINING INTO A HOLE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MORE THAN ONE LAKH OBJECTS WERE FOUND IN THE TUNNEL ( 95% IS STILL NOT UNEARTHED ) INCLUDING JADE STATUES OF MAYA DANAVA. THE EYES HAD GOLDEN PYRITE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NUGGETS OF GOLDEN PYRITE AS LARGE AS 5 INCHES IN DIA WERE FOUND.. IN ANCIENT DAYS IN KERALA WE USED PYRITES TO CREATE SPARKS FOR FIRE..YOU CAN EXTRACT GOLD FROM PYRITES --AS THEY DO IN TAIWAN JINGUASHI GOLD MINE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MICA WAS USED EXTENSIVELY IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE TEOTIHUACAN PYRAMIDS</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">--INNER STRUCTURE. MICA IS A POWERFUL RADIOACTIVE INSULATOR WAS WAS FOUND IN THE KINGS COFFIN OF GIZA PYRAMID AS A VENEER.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U9e-HqSCSbU</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WROTE THe POST BELOW-- MY DETRACTORS LAUGHED SO MUCH THAT THEY LEAKED FROM ALL 3 ORIFICES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On April 4, 1944 at 4:40 a.m. the German submarine U-859 left on a mysterious mission carrying 67 men and 33 tons of mercury sealed in glass bottles in watertight tin crates.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The sub was sunk by a British submarine and most of the crew died. One survivor on his death bed about 30 years later told about the expensive cargo and some Naval divers checked out his story and found all the mercury.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This was the mercury destined for a secret base in Antartica , near a warm water geo-thermal pond, where a VIMANA construction factory was situated .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ANCIENT WORLD STRUCTURES HAD A MATH GEOMETRY PATTERN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I always felt the poetry was not so great.<br />\n<br />\nIs there a different Malayalam version of Ramayanam ? Who wrote actual Adhyatmaramayanam ? One thing I noticed in Adhyatmaramayanam is that at the end of Yuddhakandam it is mentioned that Adhyatmaramayanam ends here, though there is a separate chapter attached as uttararamayanam which is traditionally avoided while reading at homes.<br />\n<br />\nC Radhakrishnan wrote a novel on Thunchathu Ezhuthachan claiming he is his ancestor! In that novel, ezhuthachan goes to Tamilnadu to study Vedas!<br />\n<br />\nCaptain, when you get a chance, can you please enlighten about 'Parayi petta panthirukulam' ? HIS REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD FROM MY HOMETOWN OF CALICUT -- A VISITING PROFESSOR FROM KODUUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( MUZIRIS ) OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ..<br />\n<br />\nBHATTATHIRIPADS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF NAMBOODIRIS WELL VERSED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF THIYYAS OF KERALA WELL VERSED IN SANSKRIT AND VEDA SMRITI ORAL ROUTE..<br />\n<br />\nARYAN NAMBOODIRIS WERE VISITING PROFESSORS AT TAXILA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR / UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA ETC<br />\n<br />\nCHANAKYA WAS AN ARYAN NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR AT TAXILA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAN ARYAN WAS RECOGNIZED BY HIS SPECIAL HAIRDO ( KUDUMI TO THE SIDE OF THE HEAD ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA , BRAHMAVARTA AND BRAHMARISHIDESHA ARE ALL THE SAME...<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAVARTA WAS THE VAST HOLY FOREST UNIVERSITY LAND WHERE THE BRAHMANAS ( PART 2 ) AND ARNYAKAS ( PART 3 ) OF VEDAS --TECHNICAL SECTIONS-- WERE PENNED.. THIS IS MODERN MALABAR OR NORTH KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nThese two parts written in Sanskrit and Grantha lipi ( techinical volumes ) have been stolen by the white invader..<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ARYA VAIDYASALA IS A AYURVEDA HOSPITAL RUN BY ARYANS.. EVEN TODAY A NAMBOODIRI LODGE IN A TEMPLE TOWN IS CALLED ARYA BHAVAN.<br />\n<br />\nMANU SAID BHARAT IS THE LAND BETWEEN THE HOLY RIVER OF SARASWATI ( NORTH ) AND THE HOLY LAND OF BRAHMARISHIDESA ( SOUTH ) GIRDLED BY THE SEAS ON EITHER SIDE....<br />\n<br />\nLET ME QUOTE BHAGAWAD GITA CHAPTER 2 VERSE 2 , PENNED 6000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\n\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092d\u0917\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0935\u093e\u091a |<br />\n\u0915\u0941\u0924\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e \u0915\u0936\u094d\u092e\u0932\u092e\u093f\u0926\u0902 \u0935\u093f\u0937\u092e\u0947 \u0938\u092e\u0941\u092a\u0938\u094d\u0925\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d |<br />\n\u0905\u0928\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u091c\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0915\u0940\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0930\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928 || 2||<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha<br />\nkutastv\u0101 ka\u015bhmalamida\u1e41 vi\u1e63hame samupasthitam<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">an\u0101rya</span>-ju\u1e63h\u1e6damaswargyam ak\u012brti-karam arjuna<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b-bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha\u2014the Supreme Lord said; kuta\u1e25\u2014wherefrom; tv\u0101\u2014to you; ka\u015bhmalam\u2014delusion; idam\u2014this; vi\u1e63hame\u2014in this hour of peril; samupasthitam\u2014overcome; an\u0101rya\u2014<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">CUNT OF THE FIRST ORDER</span>&nbsp;; ju\u1e63h\u1e6dam\u2014practiced; aswargyam\u2014which does not lead to the higher abodes; ak\u012brti-karam\u2014leading to disgrace; arjuna\u2014Arjun<br />\n<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 2.2: The Supreme Lord said: My dear Arjun, how has this delusion overcome you in this hour of peril? It is not befitting an&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">NOBLE HIGHLY EVOLVED MAN</span>. It leads not to the higher abodes, but to disgrace.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS 100% PROOF !<br />\n<br />\nManu wrote 10,300 years ago --\u201c All the people on earth should learn their respective practices from a ARYAN born in that land of Brahmarisihidesa \u201d..<br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA ( PUNT/ SHEBA / OPHIR/ MALABAR/ ARYAVARTA / LAND OF GODS / BRAHMARISHIDESA ) WAS PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION-WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILISATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS..<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY KERALA IS KNOWN AS GODs OWN COUNTRY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA IS THE CRADLE OF THIS PLANETs KNOWLEDGE ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. XIV, 110.47).<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu mentions the Rig Veda many times, but the Rig Veda did not mention the Law Code of Manu even once.<br />\n<br />\nMANU WAS A SAGE FROM ARYAVARTA..<br />\n<br />\nThis is because Rig Veda went of oral route for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago.. Manu made his laws 10,300 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu does not just mention the Rig Veda only in passing, but as the cornerstone of its civilization's philosophical and spiritual thought.<br />\n<br />\nHAMMURABI LIFTED HIS LAWS WHOLE SALE FROM THE LAWS OF MANU ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; This is nonsense. Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj's religious and Vedic knowledge minister in 2800 BC<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. More important and older universities like Kodungallur and Bhoj Shala Dhar has been deleted from history.<br />\nMEZHATHOL AGNIHOTRI WAS BORN MORE THAN 48 CENTURIES AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parayi_Petta_Panthirukulam</span><br />\n<br />\nVararuchi never had a MAD son named Naranath Bhranthan ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naranath_Bhranthan</span><br />\nPakkanar never existed .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakkanar</span><br />\nPerumthachan is NOT the son of Vararuchi.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perumthachan</span><br />\nThiruvalluvar was a Tamilian , NOT a Malayali. Vararuchi was a Malayali.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n########################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4848674592747964571\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592996238#c4848674592747964571\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThis brings us squarely into the discussion of what Words mean and indeed to the philosophical question of what Meaning itself means. A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. ANCIENT HINDUS HEARD SRUTI VERSES\u2014&nbsp; THEY SAW IT TOO IN THEIR GREAT FRACTAL MINDS</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7380140728632971986\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: medium; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. He died in Chandernagor (Mission of Bengal in India ) in 1752..<br />\n<br />\nBy 1734, Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons called Jesuit JEW Antoine Gaubil \u2013and between them they deciphered Kerala astronomy .. they then charted 65 Indian cities on a map with Latitude and Longitude. SO MUCH FOR OUR TRAINING ..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS ELECTED FELLOW OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY IN 1767--AS HE GAVE MANY OF HIS STOLEN BOOKS FROM KERALA IN AYURVEDA AND MATH. ROTHSCHILD WOULD USE HIM FOR VACCINATING HIS WHITE SOLDIERS.<br />\n<br />\nIN GRATITUDE ROTHSCHILD MADE JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL GOVERNOR OF BENGAL --SUCCEEDING ROBERT CLIVE--ANOTHER THIEF OF THE FIRST ORDER.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WE MUST THANK JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL FOR DECLARING IN ENGLAND TO THE PUBLIC THAT INDIANS ARE NOT A BUNCH OF SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nIT SHOCKED THE WHITE ENGLISH PUBLIC WHEN HE WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Homer, Virgil, Lucretius, Ovid, Lucian availed themselves of the simple cosmology of Brahma and derived their myths of creation from the Hindus. --from these Hindoos our Mitton copied -- Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, borrowed their mythology and cosmology from the doctrines of the Indian Hindoo\"<br />\n<br />\nHolwell in his Preliminary Discourse to the Religious Tenets of the Gentoos&nbsp;said :&nbsp; \"Having sediously perused all that has been written of the empire of&nbsp;ndostan, both as to its ancient as well as more modem state; as also the various&nbsp;accounts transmitted to us, by authors in almost all ages ... I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. This statement was deleted by Jew Rothschild ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />John Zephaniah Holwell</span>&nbsp;thus established the great antiquity of the Indian people and their literature. He, expressing himself against superficial studies, emphasized the need for a new orientation to Indian studies.<br />\n<br />\nIn this context he told not to depend only on the application of European standards to the study of India's past\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAT LEAST WE HAVE A HONEST JEW IN SURGEON JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL--UNLIKE HIS MATHEMATICIAN GRANDFATHER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/metastatic-cancer-spurt-in-india-capt.html?showComment=1531125947919#c637773953184290448\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 9, 2018 at 2:15 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_230MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Nazca and Angkor Wat are exactly opposite each other, 180 degrees apart \u2013 this had to be planned by a civilization that navigated the world on a VIMANA .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nEaster Island and Mohenjo-Daro are 20.000 km apart, in both directions (east and west) directly opposite each other on the globe!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THERE IS A SWINGING PENDULAM OF 13,000 YEARS ( HALF OF THE 26,000 YEAR PRECESSION ) BETWEEN GIZA PYRAMIDS AND ANGKOR WAT ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDistance from Ankor Wat to Giza pyramids is 4754 miles. This multiplied by the Vedic Golden ratio of 1.618 gives 7692 miles which is the distance from Giza to Nazca . Now 7692 miles multiplied by the golden ratio again gives 12446, which is the distance from Nazca to Ankor Wat.<br />\n<br />\nThe spherical triangle between Alaska at the apex, Giza and Nazca gives the Sri Yantra angle of 51 degrees 49 minutes 38.25 seconds , which is the same as the Egyptian pyramid, and also the Vedic Sri Yantra.<br />\n<br />\nThe sky-ground plans of Angkor and Giza have succeeded in capturing the highest point in Draco's trajectory and the lowest point in Orion's .<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader stole precession from India and patented in his name \u2013though precession is written in our 7000 year old Vedas. Precession was only discovered (sic ) by modern astronomers relatively recently,<br />\n<br />\nThuban was the North Pole star from 3942 to 1793 BC. It is 250 times more luminous than the Sun.<br />\n<br />\nANGKOR WAT IS PART OF THE ANCIENT DRACO CONSTELLATION--WHEN IT WAS BUILT</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Our 7000 year old Vedic texts declare that devout people who know the 14 stars of Sisumara constellation are blessed. This is why after marriage in Kerala , the couple before consummating the marriage have to see Thuban star together , as a rite of passage \u2013Vivaha Samskara</span></div>\n<br />\n14 stars of Sisumara are :-<br />\n<br />\n1) Dharma 2.Uttanapada 3.Kratu 4.Narayana 5.Samvatsara 6-7 Ashvins 8-9. Aryama-Varuna 10.Mitra 11.Agni 12.Indra 13.Kashyapa 14.Dhruva. The last four stars ending with Dhruva are circumpolar and can be seen thoughout the year from Bharata<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE HAS STOPPED APPEASING CUNTS LONG AGO..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">nobody even knew that GIZA PYRAMIDS IS EIGHT SIDED as per vaastu. OR even how the pyramids were made by water flotation power..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedDkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedDkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedDkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2766037549176043609\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">GANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b><br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_167TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; AND AFTER THAT ALL WHITE MEN ARE CLAIMING PATENT FOR THIS -- BASTARDS !<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS IN MY TRAINING SHIP WITH 250 CADETS --DURING PRINCIPLE OF NAVIGATION CLASS WE WERE TAUGHT OF GREENWICH HOUR ANGLE ARIES AND LOCAL HOUR ANGLE ARIES --<br />\n<br />\nI GOT UP AND SAID --NOT IT IS NOT ARIES--IT IS PISCES -- AND I TRIED TO EXPLAIN PRECESSION OF PLANET EARTH ..THE CAPTAIN WHO WAS TEACHING THIS SUBJECT KNEW SHIT AND HE WAS UPSET WITH ME..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE WAN GOT STICK WITH ARIES AS HE HAD LIFTED IT FROM KERALA NAVIGATION-- A SUBJECT WRITTEN DOWN AND TAUGHT IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY TO THE THIEVING GREEKS ..<br />\n<br />\nEXCEPT ARISTOTLE --ALL ANCIENT GREEKS STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY.. ARISTOTLE USED THE NOTES OF HIS TEACHER PLATO WHO STUDIED IN KERALA.. ARISTOTLE'S STUDENT ALEXANDER THE GREAT CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nWE FUCKED ALEXANDER THE GREAT ( WHO WAS A HINDU WITH A HINDU INDIAN WIFE ROXANNA ) AND HAD HIM ON HIS KNEES.. THE WHITE HISTORIAN HAS RECORDED REVERSE--THAT PORUS WAS ON HIS KNEES..<br />\n<br />\nROXANNA CAME RUNNING TO PORUS AND TORE A PIECE OF HER BODY FABRIC AND MADE HIM HER BROTHER ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ORACLE OF DELPHI HAD PREDICTED THIS ..THAT IS WHY HE MARRIED ROXANNA BEFORE HIS FIRST BATTLE WITH PORUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/05/alexander-great-and-king-porus-hidden.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE DESH DROHI COMMIES LIKE ROMILA THAPAR STILL PEDDLING THE WHITE COMMIE JEWS LIES..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WONT WORK..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IS IN TOWN.<br />\n<br />\nTOMORROW IS MY BIRTHDAY--I WILL GIVE MY READERS THE EIGHT DEEKSHA .. THEY WERE THE RULING CLASS.. THE ANCIENT EGYPTIAN PHAROAHS WERE OF THIYYA CLAN.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNUs SECOND AVATAR KURMA</span></b>&nbsp;WAS THE TORTOISE ON WHOM MOUNT MERU RESTED WITH DEVAS AND DANAVAS WORKING AS A TEAM TO DO SAMUDRA MANTHAN \u2013 AFTER WHICH DHANVANTARI, THE GOD OF AYURVEDA ROSE FROM THE COSMIC OCEAN ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KHANADAVA FOREST WHICH WAS BURNT DOWN BY&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNUs EIGHTH AVATAR KRISHNA</span></b>&nbsp;IS KUTTANAD KERALA ( CHUTTA NAD ).<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNUs SEVENTH AVATAR RAMA</span></b>&nbsp;DID PITRU DAN FOR HIS FATHER KING DASARATHA AT THIRUNELLI TEMPLE KERALA ..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNUs SIXTH AVATAR PARASHURAMA</span></b>&nbsp;CONSECRATED VISHNUs NINTH AVATAR AYYAPPAs SANNIDHANAM WELL IN ADVANCE OF HIS BIRTH..<br />\n<br />\nKALKI THE FINAL TENTH AVATAR WILL BE BORN IN KERALA.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">DITI IS THE PROGENITOR OF THE DANAVAS..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">DITIs SECOND SON WAS HIRANYAKASHIPU ( VIJAYA ).. KILLED BY VISHNUs FOURTH AVATAR NARASIMHA..<br /><br />VISHNU s SECOND AVATAR VARAHA BOAR KILLED DITIs FIRST SON HIRANYAKASHA ( JAYA )..<br /><br />DITIs DAUGHER WAS HOLIKA, THE FEMALE CHARACTER YOU SEE IN KATHAKALI ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDITIs SISTER IS ADITI, THE PROGENITOR OF THE DEVAS..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT RAMA , KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA\u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedBWMjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedBWMjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first statue was supposed to be of Nero \u2013as\nper Rothschild historians .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sorry , initially the statue was &nbsp;of the PAGAN sun god SURYA ( sol ) \u2013 of 100\nfeet height. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">LATER DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND OF PEOPLE AND PAGAN\nSENATE A BIGGER STATUE OF APOLLONIUS &nbsp;HOLDING\nAN LARGE ANCHOR WAS CONSTRUCTED AT THE COLOSSEUM .</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dAudHW7CINE/WA2bTVkXVAI/AAAAAAABNJE/F1248EiT22cSbDwJLcAF9migNc8VLLfdgCLcB/s1600/colossWWus_nero.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dAudHW7CINE/WA2bTVkXVAI/AAAAAAABNJE/F1248EiT22cSbDwJLcAF9migNc8VLLfdgCLcB/s1600/colossWWus_nero.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">APOLLONIUS , THE DARLING OF ROMANS &nbsp;USED TO SPEAK TO ROMANS FROM HERE \u2013 A PACKED\nSTADIUM OF 87000 PEOPLE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;AND\nTHIS MADE THE ROMAN EMPERORS WERE NERVOUS .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">APOLLONIUS WAS THE ONLY STABLE ANCHOR IN\nROME, CONSIDERING MORE THAN TEN ROMAN EMPERORS PASSED IN HIS LIFETIME\u2014 ALL BASTARDS\nOF THE FIRST ORDER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ROME WAS SACKED THREE TIMES . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHO DID IT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE EMPEROR OF ROME IN COLLUSION WITH THE\nPOPE CALLED IN GOONDAS (&nbsp; VANDALS ) FROM\nOUTSIDE LIKE VANDAL AND SELECTIVELY DESTROYED ALL TEMPLES IN WHICH STATUES OF\nAPOLLONIUS EXISTED OR WERE DEDICATED TO HIM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY LIBRARY CONTAINING BOOKS ON APOLLONIUS\nWAS BURNT-- AND THIS INCLUDED THE GREAT LIBRARY AT ALEXANDRIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today, nothing remains of the statue of Colossus\n&nbsp;save for the foundations of the pedestal.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">My elder son and his wife were in Rome for 4\ndays \u2013while on Sabbatical.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I3L1sXmuGM8/WA2OlpPUXbI/AAAAAAABNHo/Pb2NWUOHaGYXtCnMEkzf2CAj5HCCyk-XwCLcB/s1600/IMG-20161023-WA0064%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The tour\nguide knows who Apollonius was \u2013but they don\u2019t talk about him unless asked\nagain and again - in private, with a special tip .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DURING THE TIME OF APOLLONIUS &nbsp;THE CENTRE OF THE AMPHITHEATER HAD UNDERGROUND\nPASSAGE WITH DOZENS OF RESTAURANTS ,&nbsp; WATER\nFOUNTAINS AND REST ROOMS . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There was a temple to Pagan ( Vedic Hindu ) god Mithra--the God of the Roman senate .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-J3xW8ugGcF8/WA2wGhgo0GI/AAAAAAABNJ4/z224j6ZBjR4RemGKP__PGQvRguRX7BeAACLcB/s1600/soliduwwwws_constantine_ii-heraclea_ric_vii_101.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The persecution of\npagans ( Hindus ) &nbsp;in the late Roman\nEmpire began late during the reign of Constantine the Great, when he ordered\nthe pillaging and the tearing down of some temples.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first anti-pagan laws\nby the Christian state started with Constantine's son Constantius II, who was\nan opponent of paganism; he ordered the closing of all Hindu temples, forbade\npagan Homams ( bloodless yagnas ) under pain of death, and removed the\ntraditional Pagan Altar of Victory from the Senate. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Roman senator was a Hindu ( pagan ).\nEvery senator took his oath at the Altar of Victory. In 357 AD, Catholic\nEmperor Constantius II ordered the destruction of the Altar of Victory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But\nthen it was quickly restored . &nbsp;&nbsp;Christian\nEmperors &nbsp;Jolian ( 363 AD ) and\nValentinian I (375 AD ) let the Altar of Victory unmolested. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in 382 A.D. the\nAltar of Victory was again removed from the Senate house, by the boy Emperor\nGratian, \"a fervent Nicene Christian,\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the period from 356 to\n381 A.D. no law existed against the practice of Roman pagan rites ( fire Homams\n) , but the evolution of the Theodosian Code in the next decade sealed the fate\nof pagan religion ( Hinduism ) finally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Theodosian Code was\nfirst published in 391 A.D., in the year of the consulship of Symmachus. It\nbegan with the curt commands that superstition \"shall cease\" and\n\"the insanity of fire rituals shall be abolished\u201d .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you, no animal\nwas ever sacrificed as is written by Pope\u2019s and Rothschild\u2019s historians . Only\nGHEE ( calarified butter ) was used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of senators\nwalking through a cloud of incense before sitting on their chairs inside the\nsenate was banned ..&nbsp; Incense would be\nput into the altar for the goddess of victory, Nike ( Parvati ) .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nplume of smoke would go out into the air. In order for the senators and the\nother people to get into the building they would have to walk through the smoke\n\u2013as a sort of spiritual cleansing .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A last attempt to\nreestablish the Roman religion was made again by Symmachus in 392 AD , but the\nEmperor Valentinian refused even against the wishes of the senate. &nbsp;Quintus Aurelius Symmachus (c. 345 \u2013 402 AD )\nwas a Roman statesman, orator, and man of letters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Symmachus argued ( from\n\"The Memorial of Symmachus, Prefect of the City\" ) \"We gaze up\nat the same stars; the sky covers us all; the same universe encompasses us.\nDoes it matter what practical system we adopt in our search for the Truth? &nbsp;The\nheart of so great a mystery cannot be reached by following one road only\"</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ITrQqbPIKX4/WA2yEF-O1NI/AAAAAAABNKA/kXskClucP78lJHbuNq-DQRF6TIwryd8ZQCLcB/s1600/Maccari-222Cicero.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ITrQqbPIKX4/WA2yEF-O1NI/AAAAAAABNKA/kXskClucP78lJHbuNq-DQRF6TIwryd8ZQCLcB/s1600/Maccari-222Cicero.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity was the main\ncause of the fall of the mighty Roman Empire .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;As Christianity grew it\nundermined the power and unity of the pagan senate. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity promulgated a new culture that HEATHEN\nPAGAN &nbsp;practices with a fresh philosophy\nand theology ( sic ) where RELIGION will hold more power .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more advanced\npagan religion holding principles of humanitarianism and benevolence were\nforced underground.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole thing was to DELETE the legacy of a beloved people\u2019s\nsage named Apollonius<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>22.50%</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1412009247886698274\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; CHRIST BEFORE 325 AD</span></b><br />\n<br />\nEVERY GUIDE TOLD THEM DESTRUCTION OF ROME WAS DONE SEVERAL TIMES BY THE EMPEROR HIMSELF IN CAHOOTS WITH THE POPE .<br />\n<br />\nWHAT WAS DESTROYED WAS ONLY TO DESTROY EVIDENCE OF APOLLONIUS<br />\n<br />\nWHAT I WROTE ON MY BLOG POST BELOW TURNED OUT TO BE TRUE<br />\n<br />\nI COULD HAVE WRITTEN THE POSTS BELOW IN 1980 WHEN I WAS A THREE STRIPER , VISTING ROME .<br />\n<br />\nTHOSE DAYS THERE WAS NO INTERNET<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">read all 5 parts of the posts below--</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL APOLLONIUS RUINS WERE REBUILT WITH CHRISTIAN STRUCTRES . &nbsp; 300 YEARS AGO THEY STOPPED DOING THAT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PEOPLE WHO GOT KILLED IN ROME WERE PAGANS ( HINDUS ) --NOT CHRISTIANS OR JEWS, AS PER THE GUIDES&nbsp;</span></b><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_134b+seedB3cFD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_134b+seedB3cFD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JUST BECAUSE BRITISH STONENEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS HOW CAN IT\nBE A HINDU STRUCTURE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LISTEN--- 27 PORTALS IS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Each of the 27 Nakshatra is divided into four Pada = 4\nquarters. 27 x 4 = 108= digital value of OM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">108 IS A DIVINE NUMBER --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">NOBODY CAN STEAL THIS NUMBER AND GIVE IT TO ANY OTHER LAND\nOTHER THAN INDIA , OR RELIGION OTHER THAN SANATANA DHARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Nakshatra ( Asterism ) is the general term, referring to any\nidentified pattern of stars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The ecliptic is divided into each of the nakshatras\neastwards starting from this first point of Aries<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">First point of Aries is the spot where equinoctial cuts the\necliptic.. The First Point of Aries, is current at PISCES and is a mismomer .\nIt just show the Greeks lifted from Kerala astrology-- It, defines the\nzero-point for Right Ascension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BEFORE THE \u201c INTERSECTION OF EQUINOCTIAL AND ECLIPTIC \u201c WAS\nAT ARIES \u2014 ONLY KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING KNEW ASTRONOMY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">RISHABHAM- TAURUS (4300 BC ) / MEDAM- ARIES (2150 BC ) /\nMENAM- PISCES ( 1 AD ) / KUMBHAM - AQUARIUS (2150 AD )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The First Point of Aries is not a fixed point in space: it\nmoves along the Ecliptic at a rate of roughly one degree every seventy years.\nWhen the Equinox was first observed, thousands of years ago, the First Point\nactually lay in the constellation of Aries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">When the Sun reaches the First Point of Aries, as it does\nonce each year, an equinox occurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because the First Point of Aries is the zero-point for\ncalculating coordinates on the Celestial Sphere, its own coordinates are always\nfixed, regardless of its motion. They are, of course, zero hours Right\nAscension and zero degrees Declination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">KERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY GAVE THE COSMIC\nALLEGORIES FOR THE BIBLE IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA TO THE ROMAN\nEMPEROR .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JESUS WAS A CLEVER COMBINATION OF COSMIC ALLEGORY/\nAPPOLONIUS OF TYANA , A KERALA SAGE AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA ( WHO MARRIED MARY\nOF MAGDALENE \u2013A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA WAS DESTROYED BY ROMAN\nEMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT &nbsp;TO SINK\nALL EVIDENCE OF A KERALA SAGE NAMED APOLLONIUS OF TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Serapeum of Alexandria was closed in July of 325 AD, on\nthe orders of Roman Emperor Constantine the Great..., the Serapeum was the\nlargest and most magnificent of all temples in the Greek quarter of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Besides the image of the god, the temple precinct housed an\noffshoot collection of the great Library of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">UNKNOWN TO ALL A BIG SECTION OF THE LIBRARY WAS UNDERGROUND\nIN A SUBTERRANEAN VAULT--AND MANY BOOKS ABOUT APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WERE RESCUED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Later a decree of Coptic Christian pope Theophilus of\nAlexandria in AD 391 called for all rescued books to be hunted down and burned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Hindu Manichaeans were burnt alive along with their\nHindu scriptures and books on Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thousands of followers of Apollonius of Tyna were put to\ndeath \u2013and lot of the survivors came running to Calicut by ship \u2013 they were NOT\nJews\u2014 they were Hindus , a sect named MANICHAEANS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Even today Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS . (\nchayyan )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EVIL CYRIL WAS SAINTED LIKE EVIL MOTHER TERESA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namboodiri woman mathematician Hypatia would be murdered by\na Christian mob in an revenge assault instigated by Cyril, the bishop's nephew\nand successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With her death, the glory of Alexandria finally was\nextinguished. &nbsp;&nbsp;Hypatia was on deputation\nto the Alexandia school of Math , the wife of a Namboodiri Astronomer /\nAyurveda professor, from the Kodungallur University , owned by the Calicut King\n( my hometown )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia &nbsp;was pulled down\nfrom her chariot, and dragged naked through the streets. ( IN THE LINK BELOW I\nHAVE SHOWN THE PAINTING )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Her father Theon was a professor in Geometry and Math. The\nUniversity of Alexandria was headed by a Namboodiri professor named Orestes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The great Library of Alexandria had a million books on its\nshelves containing Pagan knowledge . As a professor at the university, Hypatia\nand her father Theon were always inside this library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia's death ( hacked into pieces on the streets ) is a\nwatershed mark in history delineating the classical age of Hindu paganism from\nthe age of Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cyril was made Pope or Patriarch of Alexandria on 18 October\n412<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia was a beautiful woman who would wear a sari -- the\npieces of her body, carried around by the Christian mob through the streets of\nAlexandria, are finally burned together with her books in a place called\nCynaron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE A PICTURE OF HYPATHIA ( MATH\nPROFESSOR ON DEPUTATION FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY --LIKE HER MATH PROFESSOR\nFATHER THEON ) TEACHING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE POPE SANK ALL REFERENCES TO HYPATIA .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY WAS THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA BURNT?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">TO SINK APOLLONIUS OF TYANA --&nbsp; A KERALA SAGE WHO WAS BEING WORSHIPED AS\nGOD..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; HE WAS A SPIRITUAL ANCHOR FOR\nROMANS WHO WENT THROUGH TEN DESPOT ROMAN EMPERORS IN HIS LIFETIME <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE COLOSSEUM OF ROME ( CONSTRUCTED ON TOP OF A DRIED UP\nLAKE ) WAS NOT MADE FOR BLOODSPORT.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIT WAS MADE FOR HEARING THE SPEECHES OF APOLLONIUS OF TYANA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED CHILDREN DO NOT\nKNOW--THE GLORY OF ROME WAS HINDU GLORY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a HAPPENED IN THE COLOSSEUM-- A PLACE FOR RELIGIOUS HINDU CONGREGATION<br />\n<br />\nBy the end of the 19th century, the image of cowering Christians huddled in the arena awaiting their deaths as lions prowled towards them was the defining symbol of Roman religious persecution and the subject of many famous paintings.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PLAYED BALL AND USED HIS MEDIA, HISTORIANS AND HOLLYWOOD MEDIUM TO SHOW POOR CHRISTIANS AND JEWS BEING SACRIFICED BY VIOLENT HINDUS<br />\n<br />\nThe 1951 Hollywood version of Quo Vadis, starring Peter Ustinov and Deborah Kerr, enshrined this grisly scenario in popular culture.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE YOUTUBE VIDEO SHOW CHRISTIANS AND JEW BEING EATEN UP ENMASSE BY LIONS SET ON THEM BY BAAAAAD HINDUS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br HIS DEAD BODY WAS BAPTISED TO CHRISTIANITY BY THE POPE HE CREATED<br />\n<br />\nConstantine was a lifelong pagan ( HINDU ) who was baptized against his will on his deathbed. His fault was that he created a character named JESUS CHRIST to cut the strength of Apollonius of Tyana .. He was losing control over Rome<br />\n<br />\nConstantine made Christianity the official Roman religion solely for political gain--nay--self preservation and SURVIVAL..<br />\n<br />\nRegarding the Council of Nicea ( 325 AD ) and the biblical canon--while Constantine played an important role at the First Ecumenical Council, there is no evidence that he had anything to do with deciding which books would go into the Bible.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_97BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
