Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399892786#c214556610071273335\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi k,<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.smh.com.au/national/mathematician-reveals-hidden-5-7m-year-cycle-behind-the-date-of-easter-20180328-p4z6qd.html</span><br />\nTHE CUNT IS MAKING ROCKET SCIENCE OUT OF SIMPLE ASTROLOGY<br />\n<br />\nEaster, also called Resurrection Day is a Christian holiday celebrating Jesus Christ returning from the dead.<br />\n<br />\nEaster is not held on the same date every year. This is called a moveable feast. Western churches, like the Roman Catholic Church, use the Gregorian calendar, while Eastern churches, like the Eastern Orthodox Church, use the Julian calendar. In 2015 Easter was celebrated on April 5 for both the Gregorian calendar and Julian calendar.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Jesus Christ never existed\u2014but was cooked up by Roman Emperor Constntine the Great at the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD, which included an astronomer sage from Kerala&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE STUPID \u201cPOPE TO BE\u201dWANTED EASTER TO BE THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER THE FULL MOON AFTER THE VERNAL EQUINOX.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nVishu is the second biggest festival in Kerala and it ushers in the Malayalam new year<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian calendar was designed to keep the vernal equinox on or close to March 21, so that the date of Easter is celebrated on the Sunday after the full moon.. Read this line TWICE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EASTER IS CELEBRATED BY CHRISTIANS BETWEEN LAST WEEK MARCH TO LAST WEEK APRIL.</span></b><br />\nTHIS YEAR FOR WESTERN CHURCH IT IS APRIL 1ST AND FOR EASTERN CHURCH ARRIL 8TH<br />\nIn 1818 the Paschal Full Moon fell on Saturday March 21 (the equinox). Therefore, the following day, March 22, was Easter. It will not fall as early again until 2285, a span of 467 years. The next earliest Easter between 1818 and 2285 (March 23) occurred in 1845, 1856, 1913 and 2008, and will occur again in 2160--a 11, 57, 95 and 152-year gap, respectively.<br />\n<br />\nThe earliest dates for Easter in the Eastern Orthodox Church between 1875 and 2099 are, 22 March 1915 and 22 March 2010. Both dates are equivalent to April 4 in the Gregorian Calendar.<br />\n<br />\nDespite using calendars that are apart by 13 days, Easter 2014 fell on the same date. According to the Western (Gregorian) calendar, the first Paschal Full Moon after the Spring Equinox (March 20) fell on Monday, April 14, 2014. The following Sunday, April 20, was, therefore, Easter Day.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian Calendar was created so that annual astronomical events, specifically the vernal equinox (used to determine when Easter is), would on average keep their places in the calendar year over time.<br />\n<br />\nThere are two ways of finding how long it takes the sun to complete its apparent revolution in the heavens, or, in other words, how long it takes the earth to make a complete revolution around it.<br />\n<br />\nOne of these consists in observing the exact time at which the sun reaches the equinoxes. In ancient times astronomical observers were able to do this by noting the days when the sun rose exactly in the east or set exactly in the west. By observing the rising and setting from day to day, they could find not only the day, but almost the hour in which the sun was on the celestial equator<br />\n<br />\nThe period between two returns of the sun to the same equinox is called the solar year or equinoxial year. The other way of finding the length of the year consists in observing the interval of time between two passages of the sun past the same star in the heavens; for example, the period between two of its passages past one of the stars<br />\n<br />\nThe ancient Kerala astronomers got the same result by using the moon as an intermediate object to measure from. The moon could be seen before sunset and its distance from the sun determined. Then, when the star appeared after sunset, the distance from the star to the moon was measured.<br />\n<br />\nAllowing for the motion of the moon during the interval, the apparent distance between the sun and the star could thus be learned from day to day. In this way it could be found how many days it was between the times at which the sun was at the same distance from any given bright star.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_66B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_67B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1418662716273968311\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_67M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399955591#c1418662716273968311\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThis would be the period of apparent revolution of the sun in the celestial sphere, or, as we now know it to be, the period of one revolution of the earth in its orbit. This period is called the sidereal year, because it is fixed by the stars.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH HIPPARCHUS AND. PTOLEMY LEARNT IN THE KONDUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )<br />\n<br />\nWith our exact modern observations we have found the lengths of the years to be:--<br />\n<br />\nSolar year/ 365 d. 5 h. 48 m. 46 s.<br />\nSidereal year/ 365 d 6 h 9 m 9 s<br />\nDifference/ 20 m. 23 s.<br />\n<br />\nThis difference shows that the position of the equinoxes among the stars is changing from year to year-- nearly one degree in 70 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe tropics of Cancer and Capricorn mark the extreme north and south latitudes where the Sun can appear directly overhead. Because the vernal equinox moves back along the ecliptic due to precession, a tropical year is shorter than a sidereal year (in 2000, the difference was 20 m 23 s<br />\n<br />\nThe number of mean solar days in a vernal equinox year has been oscillating between 365.2424 and 365.2423 for several millennia and will likely remain near 365.2424 for a few more. This long-term stability is pure chance, because in our era the slowdown of the rotation, the acceleration of the mean orbital motion, and the effect at the vernal equinox of rotation and shape changes in the Earth's orbit, happen to almost cancel out.<br />\n<br />\nEarth's pole aligns with different pole stars throughout its precessional period. Polaris is Earth's current north-pole star. Earth's 25675 -year precessional cycle is also referred to as \"Earth's Great Year.\"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEarth's axis is tilted 23\u00b0 27' with respect the plane created by Earth's orbit around the Sun (the ecliptic plane)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n#######################################################<br />\nCapt. In other words, it is a projection of the terrestrial equator out into space. As a result of the Earth's axial tilt, the celestial equator is inclined by 23.4\u00b0 with respect to the ecliptic plane.<br />\n<br />\nThe ecliptic is an imaginary line on the sky that marks the annual path of the sun. It is the projection of Earth\u2019s orbit onto the celestial sphere.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST POINT OF ARIES ( VERNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE SOUTH TO NORTH ON ECLIPTIC) CORRESPONDS WITH THE GREENWICH MERIDIAN ON PLANET EARTH AND SO LONGITUDE IS DERIVED FROM THIS AFTER A CELESTIAL SIGHT USING SEXTANT<br />\n<br />\n180 DEGREES OPPOSITE IS THE \"FIRST POINT OF LIBRA\" ( AUTUMNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE NORTH TO SOUTH ON ECLIPTIC ) WHICH CORRESPONDS TO THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE. AGAIN THIS POINT IS NO LONGER IN LIBRA , BUT IN VIRGO DUE TO PRECESSION<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\nCapt. He painted THE LAST SUPPER ( which never happened ) and MONA LISA \u2013 a hyped up painting<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mona-lisa-and-her-eyebrows-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>LEONARDO DA VINCIs ENTIRE SCIENTIFIC AN MATH KNOWLEDGE WAS LIFTED FROM THE STOLEN BOOKS FROM THE GREAT LIBABRY OF CORDOBA , SOUTH SPAIN, AFTER IT WAS SACKED BY BERBERS IN 1012 AD</b></span><br />\nUniversities in Paris and Oxford were established after visits by scholars to Moorish Spain's library Cordova. He introduced Europe to the sequence of Fibonacci numbers, which he used as an example in Liber Abaci.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonardo_da_Vinci</span><br />\n<br />\nThe book De divina proportione (On the Divine Proportion) on mathematics written by Luca Pacioli and illustrated by Leonardo da Vinci, is 100% lifted from Vedas-- Brahmanas and Aranyakas- It related to the golden mean of 1.618<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID LEONARD DA VINCI GET THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 FOR MONA LISAs FACE ?<br />\n<br />\n1.618 IS THE FOUNDATION OF THE ANCIENT SRI YANTRA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9nHcGHmUrK4</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\nIn De divina he explores its relation to the five regular (or Platonic) solids: the cube, tetrahedron and octahedron (used by the Pythagoras who studied in Kodungallur University )<br />\n<br />\nThe Pythagoreans had assigned each figure to an element: the cube to earth; the tetrahedron to fire; the octahedron to air; the icosahedron to water; and the dodecahedron to heavenly ether. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Physicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Qubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Entanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Maharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">It\u2019s main postulates are:--</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">All of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Except ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Space-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">There are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Energy and mass are equivalent.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Here are some of the Sutras: ---</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Force is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">In the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4093553763592258806\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_15.html?showComment=1516063668705#c4093553763592258806\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 16, 2018 at 6:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE CALLED ME UP OVER THE CNN TV PROGRAM --WHERE IRANIAN JEWESS CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR WAS DISCUSSING LEORNARDO DA VINCI WITH JEW WALTER ISAACSON, THE EX-CHAIRMAN OF CNN.<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID , EVEN IF LEONARDO DA VINCI STOLE 100% FROM TECHNICAL BOOKS OF THE GREAT LIBRARY AT CORDOBA SPAIN.. HE WAS A GREAT ARTIST<br />\n<br />\nBALLS<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN, I HAVE SEEN THEM ALL--I HAVE BEEN ALL OVER ITALY AND SPAIN --AND SO HAS MY ELDER SON<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HEARD OF BERNINI ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/bernini-unsung-genius-bernini-versus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLET US ASSUME FR ARGUMENTs SAKE THAT LEONARDO DA VINCI DID NOT STEAL ( ONLY IMAGINE )<br />\n<br />\nHIS TECHNICAL DRAWINGS ARE NOTHING --<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE FIRST TO SAY THAT PYRAMIDS IN EGYPT WERE BUILT BY WATER FLOTATION POWER--LIKE SHIPS IN THE PANAMA CANAL--THIS IS ON RECORD<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EASE IN SOME MORE<br />\n<br />\nPYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY KERALA SAGES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THEY GET THE PRECISION--THIS IS BEING TOLD FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THE PLANET--SO HARK<br />\n<br />\nPRECESSION INSTRUMENTS LIKE SPHEROMETER , SCREW GUAGE , VERNIER CALIPERS ETC WERE ALL LIFTED FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY<br />\n<br />\nTOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION WAS AN INDIAN INVENTION..<br />\n<br />\nAncient Indians were the masters of Total Internal Reflection, and faster than light soliton waves. Today we see it used in fibre optics. Total Internal Reflection was a science written down in our Vedic texts 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nTill the white man discovered diamonds in South Africa in 1886, diamonds were available only in India. In 1726 the white man had found some\" low quality\" diamonds on a Brazilian river bed. The next discovery was in 1906 in Congo.<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT GET THE PRECISION WITHOUT MEASURING INSTRUMENTS AND KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nA PYRAMID ( ON A MACRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE FIRST DRAWN IN SMALL SCALE ON PAPER--INCORPORATING THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 AND THE GOLDEN ANGLE OF 51 DEGREES, 49 MINUTES AND 38.25 SECONDS<br />\n<br />\nA DIAMOND ( ON MICRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE ENLARGED ON PAPER<br />\n<br />\nRATNA PARIKSHA was a 5000 year old Sanskrit text on optics which dealt with critical angles, high refractive index of diamond ( 2.4 ) and low critical angle ( 24 deg ) and total internal reflection physics and the art of cutting diamonds, to make it spit fire.. Precision was 100% required as a poor cut brought bad luck<br />\n<br />\nThe EYE OF BRAHMA ( colour changing diamond at middle eye ) would become opaque as soon as it was gouged out and stolen --and it brought a terrible curse. So as soon as the white an stole it , the first thing he did was to cut the diamond ( poorly ).<br />\n<br />\nThis was done even with SYAMANTAKAM ( Kohinoor). Despite cutting it brought bad luck. The queen consulted Indian astrologers and started the BEEF EATER and BLACK RAVEN thingy -it continues even today at the Tower of London<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun is low in the sky the rainbow appears relatively high; as the Sun rises higher, the rainbow appears lower in the sky, maintaining the critical 40\u00b0- to 42\u00b0-angle. When the Sun is more than 42\u00b0 above the horizon no rainbow can be seen because the required angle passes over the head of the observer.<br />\n<br />\nThe secondary rainbow has an angular radius of about 50\u00b0 and hence is seen outside of the primary bow. Higher-order rainbows, resulting from three or more internal reflections, are exceedingly weak but can be observed in Kerala in the months of August.<br />\n<br />\nAll this is written in our ancient texts.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_77b+seedBU77D\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_76T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; THE EYES HAD GOLDEN PYRITE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NUGGETS OF GOLDEN PYRITE AS LARGE AS 5 INCHES IN DIA WERE FOUND.. IN ANCIENT DAYS IN KERALA WE USED PYRITES TO CREATE SPARKS FOR FIRE..YOU CAN EXTRACT GOLD FROM PYRITES --AS THEY DO IN TAIWAN JINGUASHI GOLD MINE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MICA WAS USED EXTENSIVELY IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE TEOTIHUACAN PYRAMIDS</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">--INNER STRUCTURE. MICA IS A POWERFUL RADIOACTIVE INSULATOR WAS WAS FOUND IN THE KINGS COFFIN OF GIZA PYRAMID AS A VENEER.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U9e-HqSCSbU</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WROTE THe POST BELOW-- MY DETRACTORS LAUGHED SO MUCH THAT THEY LEAKED FROM ALL 3 ORIFICES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On April 4, 1944 at 4:40 a.m. the German submarine U-859 left on a mysterious mission carrying 67 men and 33 tons of mercury sealed in glass bottles in watertight tin crates.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The sub was sunk by a British submarine and most of the crew died. One survivor on his death bed about 30 years later told about the expensive cargo and some Naval divers checked out his story and found all the mercury.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This was the mercury destined for a secret base in Antartica , near a warm water geo-thermal pond, where a VIMANA construction factory was situated .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ANCIENT WORLD STRUCTURES HAD A MATH GEOMETRY PATTERN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>55.04 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_111B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7380140728632971986\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521641838855#c7380140728632971986\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 7:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_128MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOME ONE ASKED ME ABOUT MY STATEMENT BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Jesuit JEW Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons ( an expert in Sanskrit ) was in Kerala scrounging for Sanskrit texts in Math and Astronomy. He died in Chandernagor (Mission of Bengal in India ) in 1752..<br />\n<br />\nBy 1734, Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons called Jesuit JEW Antoine Gaubil \u2013and between them they deciphered Kerala astronomy .. they then charted 65 Indian cities on a map with Latitude and Longitude. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nWELL BEFORE THESE TWO THIEVES THAT WAS A JEW JOHN HOLWELL ( DIED 1686 ) WHO COLLECTED BOOKS ON CALCULUS AND ASTRONOMY FROM THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF ISAAC NEWTON DIED ONLY IN 1729<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLATER JOHN HOLWELLs SON JEW ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WOULD BUT KERALA TEAK AND ROSEWOOD FOR MAKING SHIPS IN LONDON..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN HOLWELLs GRANDSON JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL ( DIED 1798 )WAS A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT WHO CAME TO KERALA STOLE FROM SUSTRUTA SAMHITA AND BECAME A FAMOUS SURGEON..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIEF EDWARD JENNER ( FATHER OF VACCINATION ) DIED ONLY IN 1823 .. WE IN KERALA HAVE BEEN VACCINATING EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/edward-jenner-leech-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS A SURVIVOR OF THE \"BLACK HOLE OF CALCUTTA\" AND HE GAVE AN EXAGGERATED VERSION SO THAT ROTHSCHILD COULD USE THIS AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA , IF YOU ASK A GENERAL OR A DGP --WHAT IS \"HEGELIAN DIALECTIC\" -THE CUNT WONT EVEN KNOW.. SO MUCH FOR OUR TRAINING ..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS ELECTED FELLOW OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY IN 1767--AS HE GAVE MANY OF HIS STOLEN BOOKS FROM KERALA IN AYURVEDA AND MATH. ROTHSCHILD WOULD USE HIM FOR VACCINATING HIS WHITE SOLDIERS.<br />\n<br />\nIN GRATITUDE ROTHSCHILD MADE JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL GOVERNOR OF BENGAL --SUCCEEDING ROBERT CLIVE--ANOTHER THIEF OF THE FIRST ORDER.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WE MUST THANK JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL FOR DECLARING IN ENGLAND TO THE PUBLIC THAT INDIANS ARE NOT A BUNCH OF SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nIT SHOCKED THE WHITE ENGLISH PUBLIC WHEN HE WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Homer, Virgil, Lucretius, Ovid, Lucian availed themselves of the simple cosmology of Brahma and derived their myths of creation from the Hindus. --from these Hindoos our Mitton copied -- Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, borrowed their mythology and cosmology from the doctrines of the Indian Hindoo\"<br />\n<br />\nHolwell in his Preliminary Discourse to the Religious Tenets of the Gentoos&nbsp;said :&nbsp; \"Having sediously perused all that has been written of the empire of&nbsp;ndostan, both as to its ancient as well as more modem state; as also the various&nbsp;accounts transmitted to us, by authors in almost all ages ... I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. This statement was deleted by Jew Rothschild ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />John Zephaniah Holwell</span>&nbsp;thus established the great antiquity of the Indian people and their literature. He, expressing himself against superficial studies, emphasized the need for a new orientation to Indian studies.<br />\n<br />\nIn this context he told not to depend only on the application of European standards to the study of India's past\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAT LEAST WE HAVE A HONEST JEW IN SURGEON JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL--UNLIKE HIS MATHEMATICIAN GRANDFATHER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE INDIANS ARE GRATEFUL TO THIS JEW&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayi<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_112b+seedBBmdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_112b+seedBBmdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; &nbsp;MOSES PROMISED HIM THAT ..</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">PEOPLE ASK WHY WAS JETHRO SO COMMITTED TO THE LAND OF PALESTINE?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;BECAUSE HE WAS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT, WHO CREATED JUDAISM AND THE LANGUAGE HEBREW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; ) \u2014 THE WAY THE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS DID, TO PREVENT INFECTION. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE THREW THE FORESKIN OF HER SONs PENIS , ON THE FEET OF MOSES IN DISGUST FOR BREAKING HIS PROMISE TO HER FATHER JETHRO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED. &nbsp;&nbsp;JESUS WAS COOKED UP IN 325 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Jesus Christ is &nbsp;identified as a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek quoting from Ps. 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Melchizedek is Jesus\u2014NAY\u2014Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DEAD SEA SCROLLS TELL CLEARLY THAT PAGAN ESSENES WERE UNCIRCUMCISED AND MELCHIZEDEK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Reference between the messiah and Melchizedek appears in subsequent biblical verses: Genesis 14:18-20; Psalm 110:1-7 Matthew 22:44; 26:26-28 Luke 22:19; Mark 14:22 John 6:53 Acts 2:34 I Corinthians 11:23-25 Hebrews 4:14-15; 5:6; 5:10; 6:19-20; 7:1-21. Revelation 1:6.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Melchizedek is mentioned twice in the Hebrew Bible, the first in Genesis and the second in Psalms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Genesis 14:18 introduces Melchizedek a \"Priest of the Most High God\" (El Elyon), a term which is re-used in 14:19, 20, 22.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The second and final Hebrew Bible mention of Melchizedek is in Psalm 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Lord hath sworn, and will not repent: 'Thou art a priest for ever after the manner of Melchizedek.'. (JPS 1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">11Q13 (11QMelch) is a fragment (that can be dated to the end of the 2nd or start of the 1st century BC) of a text about Melchizedek found in Cave 11 at Qumran in the Israeli Dead Sea area and which comprises part of the Dead Sea Scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;In this eschatological text, Melchizedek is seen as a divine being and Hebrew titles such as Elohim are applied to him. According to this text Melchizedek will proclaim the \"Day of Atonement\" and he will atone for the people who are predestined to him. He also will judge the peoples<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 24px;\">According to Encyclop\u00e6dia Britannica, Joseph Smith ( MORMON ) &nbsp;\"appointed his male followers to priesthoods, named for the biblical figures Melchizedek and Aaron, that were overseen by the office of High Priest\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; LOT OF THIS MONEY WENT INTO THE FUNDS OF \" POPEs HUSH MONEY \" ( PEDOPHILE SEX OF CLERGY PAY OFFS )<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</span><br /><br />95% OF THE CHILD VICTIMS PARENTS CHOSE HUSH MONEY ..<br /><br />There has been a culture of denial and secrecy that has prevented allegations from being fully investigated.<br /><br />A 1962 Vatican document instructed bishops to observe the strictest secrecy in sexual abuse cases and to address sexual abuse, or \u201csolicitation,\u201d as an internal church matter, not as an offense that should be reported to local authorities.<br /><br />Despite establishing a commission to look into the problem and address a backlog of cases, Pope Francis has still not established any protocol for handling sex abuse allegations for the Catholic Church as a whole. The Pope is more worried about the reputation of the church..<br /><br />ONCE AS A YOUNG MAN 38 YEARS AGO, I STAYED IN VATICAN FOR 3 DAYS IN A SEMINARY - CASA PAOLTTI BY THE BANKS OF THE RIVER TIBER . MY GOAN PURSER WHOSE BROTHER WAS A PRIEST IN VATICAN, HE WAS WITH ME.. WE HAD FREE FOOD AND LODGING -- NICE SPACIOUS CLEAN..<br /><br />THE WORD SPREAD AND SOME EXCITED MALAYALI NUNS CAME RUNNING TO SEE ME.. ALL PRETTY.. I WAS SURPRISED AS KERALA NUNS ARE ALL FUCKIN' BALLS TO LOOK AT.<br /><br />ONE NUN TOLD ME ABOUT THE RAMPANT SEXUAL ABUSE.. SHE WAS BEING ABUSED BY BOTH PRIESTS AND NUNS..<br /><br />IT WAS ALMOST AS IF SHE WAS A SEX SLAVE AND EXPECTED ME TO DO SOMETHING..<br /><br />I HAVE DONE MY PART IN THE PRE-INTERNET DAYS USING WHITE CLERGY IN BRITAIN.. SO I DONT HAVE A GUILTY CONSCIENCE ABOUT THIS.. MY DECISION TO START BLOGGING TO EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS HAS A ROOT IN THIS UNFORTUNATE NUN..<br /><br />SHE TOLD ME THAT BISHOPS ARE CHOSEN BY POPE IN KERALA TO SNUFF OUT ANY WHISTLE BLOWERS BY CASH/ LAND OR FEAR .. IT WAS A WATER TIGHT SYSTEM..<br /><br />The Vatican instructed Catholic bishops around the world to cover up cases of sexual abuse or risk being thrown out of the Church.<br /><br />It focuses on sexual abuse initiated as part of the confessional relationship between a priest and a member of his congregation. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br /><br />The 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br /><br />They also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br /><br />I DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br /><br />IN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. THE TALL MAN WITH ME IS SECOND ENGINEER, A HINDU MALAYALI FROM CALICUT.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br /><br />The pope has set guidelines for removing bishops who have been \u201cnegligent\u201d in addressing cases of abuse. This is all charade..<br /><br />There has been a long history of protecting highly placed Catholic leaders from charges of sexual abuse.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\"></span></span><br /></span><br /><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_28B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5270560851422573945\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686521119#c5270560851422573945\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br /><br />When reports surfaced in 1995 that Austrian Cardinal Hans Hermann Groer had molested monks and schoolboys, the sexual abuse was dismissed by Bishop Kurt Krenn as \u201cboyish pranks.\u201d It was proved that parents of child victims were paid \u201chush money\u201d to buy their silence. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br /><br />LISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br /><br />In another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br /><br />Joseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br /><br />Maciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br /><br />The hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br /><br />Superiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br /><br />It is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. You see, the Catholic Church is a divine institution necessary for salvation, then there are those who will protect its reputation at all costs.<br /><br />ASRAMA BAPU HAS BEEN FRAMED TO PROVE THAT SUCH THINGS HAPPEN IN HINDUISM TOO. ALMOST ALL HIS ROOTLESS VULNERABLE FOLLOWERS ARE NOW CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</span><br /><br />There is a tipping point, however. The key moment leading to the resignation of Cardinal Law was a letter, signed by 58 priests, asking him to resign.<br /><br />While the priest that Cardinal Law protected, John Geoghan, was convicted of his crimes \u2013 and later killed in prison \u2013 Bernard Law himself never faced a court of justice.<br /><br />In fact, he was effectively promoted to a venerable position as head of one of Catholicism\u2019s most famous churches, Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome.<br /><br />For victims of sexual abuse that occurred under his tenure, Cardinal Law only offered only a general apology and a vague reference to his own \u201cshortcomings.\u201d<br /><br />THE KERALA BISHOP MADE LOT OF HOOO HAAA ABOUT NCW WANTING TO STOP CONFESSIONS IN CHURCH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/kerala-nun-rape-audio-clip-of-priest-trying-to-bribe-nun-surfaces-case-registered/story-46dy2OsB6YSIYJoyuuur0L.html</span><br /><br />There is an international conspiracy by the Church to hush up sexual abuse issues. It is a devious attempt to conceal criminal conduct and is a blueprint for deception and concealment.<br /><br />Threatening excommunication to anybody who speaks out shows the lengths the most senior figures in the Vatican were prepared to go to prevent the information getting out to the public domain<br /><br />THREE BILLION USD PAY OUT IN THE POST BELOW IS GROSS UNDER ESTIMATION.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-bully-reloaded-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1477037752793#c164755534999758519\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 21, 2016 at 1:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nINDIAN ELECTRONIC VOTING MACHINES HAVE BEEN RIGGED IN THE PAST.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MODI GOVT MUST FIND OUT HOW KACHRAWAAL WON 4 LOK SABHA SEATS IN PUNJAB IN MAY 2014<br />\n<br />\nIN USA BIG BROTHERS AGENTS BOASTED THAT VOTING MACHINES CANT BE RIGGED<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nEVEN AN UNDERGRADUATE CAN DO THIS--IT IS NOT COMPLICATED<br />\n<br />\nAt Princeton University, proved that in less than 60 seconds , a criminal could bypass the lock using a simple tool and replace the memory card with one containing malicious code.<br />\n<br />\nIt's ridiculously easy to open the box that the researchers show how it is done in a video.<br />\n<br />\nAny desired algorithm can be used to determine which votes to steal and to which candidate or candidates to transfer the stolen votes.<br />\n<br />\nAn abstract of the Princeton study : \"Malicious software running on a single voting machine can steal votes with very little risk of detection. The malicious software can modify all of the records, audit logs, and counter kept by the voting machine so that even careful forensic examination...will find nothing amiss.\"<br />\n<br />\nOne machine can be rigged within less than a minute and then it goes viral.<br />\n<br />\n\"An attacker could infect a large population of machines while only having temporary access to a single machine or memory card.\"<br />\n<br />\nIf you work for the elections office, you don't even need a key.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2012, one in five Americans (27 million people), voted by absentee ballot. Of those, 258,000 absentee ballots were thrown out for arriving late in the mail, not having valid signatures, not having a matching signature, or \"other.\"<br />\n<br />\nHULLO DONAL DRUP--<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nAND LISTEN GOOD<br />\n<br />\n##############################<br />\n<br />\nInstall a web camera, so citizens can watch the vote-counting live, on the Internet.<br />\n<br />\nFind out the truth about vote counting system <b><span style=\"color: red;\">GEMS.</span></b>..one vote can be counted 25 times, another only one one-thousandth of a time, effectively converting some votes to zero<br />\n<br />\n###############################################<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/JOUFsCS7xYE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/JOUFsCS7xYE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_26TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_25B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4652594842361788469\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_25M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. [gross domestic product] by about $1.70\u2014which means, by the way, that much of the money laid out to help families in need actually comes right back to the government in the form of higher revenue. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HEY CHOOT PAUL KRUGMAN \u2013<br /><br />WE KNOW YOU DO NOT KNOW A SHIT ABOUT ECONOMICS<br /><br />YOU SHALL REFRAIN FROM ADVISING INDIA, EVER AGAIN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBarack Obama\u2019s government-paid recruiters hold bingo games and \u201cparties\u201d to try to get more people on food stamps who might not otherwise seek taxpayer assistance.<br />\n<br />\nFood stamps are intended to serve as a temporary safety net for those who face economic hardship, not as an economic stimulus.<br />\n<br />\nTo justify food stamps as a stimulus to raise government revenue ignores the long-term economic consequences of welfare spending.<br />\n<br />\nFood stamp dollars come from the taxpayers, meaning that as program spending increases, fewer dollars are available in the private sector.<br />\n<br />\nThe argument for stimulus assumes that consumption spending adds to immediate economic growth while savings do not.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, private savings help lift people out of poverty and boost the economy, but high rates of government borrowing can weaken the economy and harm Americans.<br />\n<br />\nThe United States just hit the debt ceiling with 19.8 TRILLION USD in external debt, and spending on means-tested welfare programs, which include food stamps, is the fastest growing component of government.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HEY CHOOT WINNER OF NOBEL PRIZE IN ECONOMICS PAUL KRUGMAN \u2013 ARE YOU MAD, LIKE NOBEL PRIZE WINNER AMARTYA SEN ( WITH A ROTHSCHILD WIFE ) ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; While Barack Obama was\nat Columbia and CIA front BIC, his mother was under non-official CIA cover from\n1981 to 1984 in Jakarta as the program officer for women and employment for the\nFord Foundation's Southeast Asia regional office, a job that took Dunham\nSoetoro to other nations in the region, including the Philippines, Thailand,\nand Malaysia. The airgram was drafted by Martens and signed by\nMasters. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pakistan's finance\nminister, Sartaj Asis, revealed that local branches of BCCI had laundered drug\nmoney for the CIA, channelled covert CIA aid to the Afghan resistance, and also\nmanaged a multi-million dollar \"slush fund\" for covert operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Eight Iraqi civilians, including the\ndistinguished Iraqi artist Layla al-Attar were killed in the raid, and 12 more\nwere wounded.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This kind of unilateral action in response to an unproven charge\nis a violation of international law. The legal excuse given by U.S. officials,\nwhich they relied on in justification of the bombing of Libya in 1986, is the\nright to self defense under Article 51 of the UN Charter.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But that Article\nrequires that the response be to an immediate threat to the retaliating party,\nclearly not the case, and therefore a legal fraud. The most monumental of\nClinton's war crimes, however, has been his policy of sanctions on Iraq,\nsupplemented by the maintenance of intense satellite surveillance and regular\nbombing attacks that have often resulted in civilian casualties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNICEF reports\nthat in 1999 more than 1 million Iraqi children under 5 were suffering from\nchronic malnutrition, and some 4,000-5,000 children are dying per month beyond\nnormal death rates from the combination of malnutrition and disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one of the most\nbravest moments in 20th century history, the people of East Timor stood up to\nthe western backed bullies of Indonesia and overwhelmingly voted for\nIndependence. The 203 acre plot, known as\nWhitewater, is fifty miles from the nearest grocery store. The Washington Post\nwill report later that some purchasers of lots, many of them retirees,\n\"put up houses or cabins, others slept in vans or tents, hoping to be able\nto live off the land.\" &nbsp;More than\nhalf of the purchasers would lose their plots thanks to the sleazy form of\nfinancing used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two months after\ncommencing the Whitewater scam, Hillary Clinton invested $1,000 in cattle\nfutures. Within a few days she made a $5,000 profit. Before bailing out she\nearned nearly $100,000 on her investment. Many years later, several economists\nwould calculate that the chances of earning such returns legally were one in\n250 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1981 Hillary Clinton\nwrote toJim McDougal: \"If Reagonomics works at all, Whitewater could\nbecome the Western Hemisphere's Mecca.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Major drug trafficker\nBarry Seal, &nbsp;relocated his operations to\nMena, Arkansas. &nbsp;Seal was importing as\nmuch as 1,000 pounds of cociane a month from Colombia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He would claim to have\nmade more than $50 million out of his operations. The subject was discussed repeatedly in\nClinton's presence by state troopers working on his security detail, he\nalleged. Patterson said the governor 'had very little comment to make; he was\njust listening to what was being said.'\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1982 A DEA report\nuncovered by Ambrose Evans-Pritchard would cite an informant claiming that a\nkey Arkansas figure and backer of Clinton \"smuggles cocaine from Colombia,\nSouth America, inside race horses to Hot Springs.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1984 Clinton backer Mochtar\nRiady bought a banking firm and change its name to Worthern Bank with Riady's\n28-year-old son James as president. Other Worthen co-owners would eventually\ninclude BCCI investor Abdullah Taha Bakhish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1986, Journalist\nEvans-Pritchard will describe the Arkansas of this period as a \"major\npoint for the transshipment of drugs\" and \"perilously close to\nbecoming a 'narco-republic' -- a sort of mini-Columbia within the borders of\nthe United States.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Whitewater scandal\n(also known as the Whitewater controversy, or simply Whitewater) began with an\ninvestigation into the real estate investments of Bill and Hillary Clinton in\nthe Whitewater Development Corporation, a failed business venture in the 1970s\nand 1980s. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A March 1992, New York\nTimes article published during the U.S. presidential campaign reported that the\nClintons, then governor and first lady of Arkansas, had invested and lost money\nin the Whitewater Development Corporation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1987, the Whitewater\nfiles are transferred to the Clintons. In the 1992 campaign, the Clintons would\nLIE say they can not find the records.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On January 26, 1996,\nHillary Clinton testified before a grand jury concerning her investments in\nWhitewater. This was the first time in American history that a first lady had\nbeen subpoenaed to testify before a grand jury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to journalist\nPhilip Weiss, \"In 1988, SCREW MASTER Bill Clinton chose not to run for the\npresidency, in part out of fear of personal disclosure about his sex life. The\nstory goes--and now we are into rumor/recollection, but it's persuasive--that\nHillary Clinton was angry that he had bowed out and wanted a divorce. She compiled\na divorce file with her friend, lawyer Vince Foster, involving a number of\nwomen in Arkansas. Ultimately she dropped the plan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A story, in the Globe,\ncharges that Bill Clinton had a relationship with a woman who claimed that\nClinton was the father of her child. Wright, who\nworked in 1977 at the consulate in Surabaya \u2014 while Dunham Soetoro was working\nin the Surabaya CIA station city of responsibility Yogyakarta \u2014 and who was\ntransferred in 1979 to Jakarta. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The time period that\nPresident Obama\u2019s mother, Stanley Ann Dunham Soetoro/Sutoro, worked for various\nIndonesian and Pakistani operations associated with the US Agency for\nInternational Development (USAID) was during a time frame when USAID was\ncomposed almost entirely of CIA official and non-official cover agents who\nworked throughout Indonesia and Southeast and South Asia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before he was sacked as\nCIA director in 1976 and replaced by George H. We need particularly, gains in the\ninterrelationships between overt and clandestine and technical and human\nsources.
