, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Classified CIA\ndocuments from the late 1970s, while Dunham Soetoro was working for USAID, the\nCIA-linked Development Alternatives, Inc. and East-West Center of the\nUniversity of Hawaii, describe in great detail the type of deep agent \u201cflexible\ncover\u201d under which she worked for the CIA.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edbrook defines\n\u201cflexible cover\u201d as \u201ca logical reason for interest in diversified local groups\u201d\nand \u201cmobility.\u201d Dunham Soetoro\u2019s varied employers in Indonesia suggest that her\ncareer met the definition of a \u201cflexible agent,\u201d either a non-official cover\n(NOC) employee of the CIA or a career contract agent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Methven became the CIA station chief in Kinshasa, Zaire in 1974 from\nwhere he launched the CIA\u2019s covert war against the government of Angola.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From January 1970 to\nAugust 1972, Dunham Soetoro was an executive at the Institute ofManagement\nEducation and Development (IMED) in Jakarta, likely a continuation of her CIA\nflexible cover employment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1972 to 1975,\nDunham Soetoro double-dipped, returning to the University of Hawaii to obtain\nher Masters of Arts in anthropology from the University of Hawaii, under a\ngrant from the CIA-funded Asia Foundation, while continuing to serve under\ncontract IMED in Jakarta.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CIA\u2019s liaison for various USAID programs in\nJakarta was Vicent Michael Shields who operated under official cover as the\nembassy\u2019s economic and commercial attache.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1972 to 1975,\nDunham Soetoro taught Indonesian crafts at the Bishop Museum in Honolulu,\nfurther developing her \u201cflexible cover\u201d credentials. In 1975, the year\nIndonesia invaded East Timor with the support of the CIA, Dunham Soetoro returned\nto conduct \u201canthropological field work\u201d on Java. Dunham Soetoro worked in\nJakarta in 1975 and moved to work in Yogyakarta in 1976.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 1977, Dunham\nSoetoro taught a course under Professor Leon Mears at the Faculty of Economics\nof the University of Indonesia in Jakarta. The course was designed for the\nstaff of the Indonesian National Development Planning Agency (BAPPENAS). From June\n1977 to September 1978, Dunham Soetoro returned to Yogyakarta and researched\nsmall village industries under a grant from the CIA-linked East-West Center.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 1978, Dunham\nSoetoro returned to Jakarta and consulted with the International Labor Organization\nto develop recommendations on village industries for the Suharto regime\u2019s third\nfive-year plan, REPELITA III.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 24, 1980, Dunham divorced Lolo\nSoetoro.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1977 to 1980, the CIA station chief in Jakarta was Carl Edward\nGebhardt. Case officers at the CIA station during this time frame were\neconomics section officer James D. Anders, Jr.; Ronald M. Cinal, whose previous\nposting was Nairobi, Kenya; and William H. Wright, who worked in 1977 at the\nconsulate in Surabaya \u2014 while Dunham Soetoro was working in the Surabaya CIA\nstation city of responsibility Yogyakarta \u2014 and who was transferred in 1979 to\nJakarta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dunham Soetoro\u2019s field\nwork extended throughout Java: a major target in the CIA\u2019s influence extension\noperations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From October 1978 to\nDecember 1980, under contract to USAID and Development Alternatives, Inc.\n(DAI), a CIA front company, Dunham consulted on rural industries development in\ncentral Java. The CIA\u2019s station chief in Jakarta in June 1980 was Warren E.\nFrank and the deputy chief of station from July 1979 through 1980 was Harrison\nMcAlpine, who, from 1971 to 1974, was a USAID \u201cpublic administration adviser\u201d\nin Vientiane, Laos.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also at the CIA station in Jakarta in 1980 was Robert H.\nMills, operating under official cover of embassy First Secretary and who, form\n1972 to 1974, was operating at the U.S. Consulate in Surabaya, eastern Java, as\na USAID \u201cpublic safety program\u201d officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The identities of the\nCIA agents assigned to Indonesia in the late 1960s, 70s, and 80s were compiled\nin various writings by the whistleblowing former CIA agent Philip Agee. Philip\nBurnett Franklin Agee was a Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) case officer and\nwriter, best known as author of the 1975 book, Inside the Company: CIA Diary, &nbsp;detailing his experiences in the CIA.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agee\njoined the CIA in 1957, and over the following decade had postings in\nWashington, D.C., Ecuador, Uruguay and Mexico. After resigning from the Agency\nin 1968, he became a leading opponent of CIA practices.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The London Evening News\ncalled Inside the Company: CIA Diary \"a frightening picture of corruption,\npressure, assassination and conspiracy\". The Economist called the book\n\"inescapable reading\". Miles Copeland, Jr., a former CIA station\nchief in Cairo, said the book was \"as complete an account of spy work as\nis likely to be published anywhere\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inside the Company identified 250 alleged\nCIA officers and agents. The list of officers and agents, all personally known\nto Agee, appears in an appendix to the book. While written as a diary, the book\nactually reconstructs events based on Agee's memory and his subsequent research<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agee describes his\nfirst overseas assignment in 1960 to Ecuador, where his primary mission had the\naim of forcing a diplomatic break between Ecuador and Cuba. He writes that the\ntechnique he used included bribery, intimidation, bugging, and forgery.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agee\nspent four years in Ecuador penetrating Ecuadorian politics. He states that his\nactions subverted and destroyed the political fabric of Ecuador<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XQnJ7DGeVDM/WA3-mBfay4I/AAAAAAABNMc/Mm221Vanr7s4D_2zWJd5ZMUDBoJZxJDSQCLcB/s1600/gloria-speaking-into-mic-sitting-on-pSS3anel.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XQnJ7DGeVDM/WA3-mBfay4I/AAAAAAABNMc/Mm221Vanr7s4D_2zWJd5ZMUDBoJZxJDSQCLcB/s640/gloria-speaking-into-mic-sitting-on-pSS3anel.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">INDIAs INTELLIGENCE NETWORK IS PATHETIC--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">GREASE AND TACKLE</span> PARTY--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH MEIN DAAL</span> PARTY !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/197Op8BMAwE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/197Op8BMAwE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From January 1981 to\nNovember 1984, Ann Dunham worked under the cover of the Ford Foundation\u2019s\nSoutheast Regional Office in Jakarta. Dunham\u2019s grants came from the head of the\nfoundation\u2019s grant program in New York, Peter Geithner, the father of Timothy\nGeithner, the Treasury Secretary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In post-coup Indonesia\n\u201cteachers\u201d like Dunham Soetoro were able to make instant inroads in urban and\nrural areas alike while keeping her CIA cover intact. Similarly, Obama\u2019s 1981\ntrip from Indonesia to Pakistan and southern India ( including Hyderabad ) , &nbsp;using an Indonesian passport issued to \u201cBarry\nSoetoro,\u201d describes Edbrook\u2019s \u201ccover opportunities\u201d for \u201cthird-national\nagents.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama administration\nhas applied strong pressure on Cuba to release jailed accused CIA spy JEW Alan\nGross, who operated in Cuba under Development Alternatives, Inc., the same\nCIA-USAID front company that employed Obama\u2019s mother in Indonesia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">National Security\nCouncil Decision Directive 77- NSCDD-77 authorized the CIA and other\nintelligence agencies to produce mountains of disinformation, biased news,\npropaganda, and planted news stories in the name of \u201cProject Democracy\u201d and the\nrenewed ideological war against Communism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The plan was the\nreincarnation of CIA Plans Director Frank Wisner, Sr.\u2019s \u201cMighty Wurlitzer,\u201d the\nCIA\u2019s worldwide propaganda and deception operation that relied on, in part,\nfirms like BIC. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wisner was also the\noriginator of the CIA\u2019s program to recruit foreign students attending U.S.\nuniversities \u2014 students like Barack Obama, Sr. and Lolo Soetoro \u2014 to serve as\nCIA agents after they returned to their home nations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI DOES NOT KNOW EVEN\nNOW HOW KACHRAWAAL SECURED 4 LOK SABHA SEAT IN MAY 2014 I PUNJAB.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE DOES NOT KNOW WHO\nINSIGATED THE AWARD WAPSI THINGY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE DOES NOT NOW WHO\nINSTIGATED \u201cDON\u2019T GIVE US&nbsp; VISA \u201c THINGY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jackson T Stephens Sr brought\nBCCI to US shores in 1979 and helped to launder cocaine profits from CIA drug\nsmuggling in Mena, Arkansas and elsewhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Stephens\u2019 software\nfirm Systematics was to become the nation\u2019s biggest supplier of back-office\nbanking software, and would eventually work closely with the National Security\nAgency to facilitate intelligence monitoring of banking transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jackson Stephens,\nmeanwhile, proposed, developed, and financed a plant for hazardous waste\nfacilities, called Waste Technology Inc., beginning in 1979. This project\nbecame a bottomless pit for the consumption of funds, and at one point, the\nfinancially- strapped Stephens made a Faustian pact with Indonesian Mochtar\nRiady to set up a money-laundering operation in Arkansas. Stephens and Riady\nhad previously formed Stephens Finance Ltd. in Hong Kong in 1976.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indonesian Mochtar\nRiady\u2019s point-man was Ann Dunham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President Obama's own\nwork in 1983 for Business International Corporation, a CIA front that conducted\nseminars with the world's most powerful leaders and used journalists as agents\nabroad, dovetails with CIA espionage activities conducted by his mother,\nStanley Ann Dunham in 1960s post-coup Indonesia on behalf of a number of CIA\nfront operations, including the East-West Center at the University of Hawaii,\nthe U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID), and the Ford Foundation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dunham was three\nmonth's pregnant with Barack Obama, Jr. ( biological child of Frank Davis ) at\nthe time of her marriage to Obama, Sr. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Obama, Sr., who left Hawaii for Harvard in\n1962, divorced Dunham in 1964. Obama, Sr. married a fellow Harvard student, JEWESS\nRuth Niedesand, woman, who moved with him to Kenya and had two sons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama, Sr. was a friend\nof Tom Mboya and a fellow Luo. After Mboya was assassinated in 1969, Obama, Sr.\ntestified at the trial of his alleged assassin. CIA files indicate that Mboya\nwas an important agent-of-influence for the CIA, not only in Kenya but in all\nof Africa. In 1958, at the age of 28, Mboya was elected Conference Chairman at\nthe All-African Peoples' Conference convened by Kwame Nkrumah of Ghana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1959, together with\nthe African-American Students Foundation in the United States, Mboya organized\nthe Airlift Africa project, through which 81 Kenyan students were flown to the\nU.S. to study at U.S. universities and this included Barack Obama Sr. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Kenya's\nindependence on 1 June 1963, Mboya was elected as an MP for Nairobi Central\nConstituency (today: Kamukunji Constituency) and became Minister of Justice and\nConstitutional &nbsp;Affairs &nbsp;and later Minister for Economic Planning and\nDevelopment. He would allow white Jews to steal from his nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ambedkar earned his master's\ndegree in 1915, and his Ph.D. in economics in 1928. In 1952, Columbia presented\nhm with an honorary doctorate of law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Jew John Dewey, was\nsent to China to launch Rothschild\u2019s Communism . He was there for nearly 3\nyears 1919 to 1921 AD.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1903, opium founded\nYale Divinity School established a number of schools and hospitals throughout\nChina that were collectively known as 'Yale in China.', which was an an\nintelligence network of Jew Rothschild.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of 'Yale in\nChina's' most important students was Mao Zedong.&nbsp; Rothschild used Judaized Freemasonic asset\nSun Yat-sen to pave the way for Mao\u2019s murderous Communist regime which killed\nmaximum people on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For Chinese\nintellectuals and students today, 1919 invokes the stirrings of the \u201cNew\nCulture Movement\u201d and the foundations of the Chinese revolution more broadly.\nThe New Culture Movement is closely associated with what became known as the\n\u201cMay Fourth Movement\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Dewey wrote (pp.\n97-8) in one of several essays during his time in China,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAmerican children are\ntaught the list of \u2018modern\u2019 inventions that originated in China. They are not\ntaught, however, that China invented the boycott, the general strike and guild\norganization as means of controlling public affairs\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May Fourth Movement marked\nthe upsurge of Chinese nationalism, a shift towards political mobilization and\naway from cultural activities, and a move towards a populist base rather than\nintellectual elites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many political and social leaders of the next decades\nemerged at this time\u2014all brainwashed by JEW John Dewey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>John Dewey arrived in China weeks before &nbsp;May 4, 1919 -- read this line THRICE.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Mao traveled with\nProfessor Yang Changji,&nbsp; his college\nteacher and future father-in-law, to Beijing during the May Fourth Movement in\n1919, John Dewey was with him, as a brainwasher <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Dewey\u2019s works are\nwidely read on Chinese campuses even today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>On the afternoon of May\n4 over 3,000 students of Peking University and other schools marched from many\npoints to gather in front of Tiananmen. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next day, students\nin Beijing as a whole went on strike and in the larger cities across China,\nstudents, patriotic merchants, and workers joined protests.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild &nbsp;sent Jew Bertrand Russell\u2019s&nbsp; to China in the fall of 1920, to deliver\nlectures on Communism .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mao &nbsp;claimed that the May Fourth Movement was a\nstage leading toward revolution:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The May 4th Movement\ntwenty years ago marked a new stage in China's bourgeois-democratic revolution\nagainst imperialism and feudalism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cultural reform movement which grew out\nof the May 4th Movement was only one of the manifestations of this revolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the growth and development of new social forces in that period, a powerful\ncamp made its appearance in the bourgeois-democratic revolution, a camp\nconsisting of the working class, the student masses and the new national\nbourgeoisie.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Around the time of the May 4th Movement, hundreds of thousands of\nstudents courageously took their place in the van. In these respects the May\n4th Movement went a step beyond the Revolution of 1911<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The May Fourth Movement\nserved as an intellectual turning point in China; it was a seminal event that\nradicalized Chinese intellectual thought. Western-style liberal democracy had\npreviously had a degree of traction amongst Chinese intellectuals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Master brainwasher JEW\nJohn Dewey\u2019s Democracy and Education (1916) is one of the most dangerous books\never written \u2013 it is ten times more &nbsp;harmful than Das Kapital.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Some parts of his book are a twisted version of our Upanishads.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The individual is a\nmeaningful concept only when regarded as an inextricable part of his or her\nsociety, and the society has no meaning apart from its realization in the lives\nof its individual members. Mere physical growing up and mastery of the bare\nnecessities of subsistence will not suffice to reproduce the life of the group.\nDeliberate effort and the taking of thoughtful pains are required.&nbsp;&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHATEVER BR AMBDEDKAR WROTE ,&nbsp; HAD BEEN&nbsp;\n&nbsp;WRITTeN BY JOHN DEWEY EARLIER.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>John Deweys\u2019s &nbsp;prolific&nbsp;\nand voluminous &nbsp;written output has\nbeen collected in 38 volumes.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>John Dewey\nwas Ambedkar\u2019s teacher at Columbia University, New York, from 1913 to 1916.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I know what John Dewey wrote and I know what\nBR Ambedkar wrote \u2013and I know who wrote it first !! .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One quote of BR Ambedkar \u2013giving credit to\nhis professor John Dewy &nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>\u201c\u2026 Prof. John\nDewey said... Every society gets encumbered with what is trivial, with dead\nwood from the past, and with what is positively perverse. As a society becomes\nmore enlightened, it realizes that it is responsible not to conserve and\ntransmit the whole of its existing achievements, but only such as to make for a\nbetter future society. The school is its chief agency for the accomplishment of\nthis end.\u201d</b></span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maoism, also called Mao\nZedong Thought, is considered a communist theory, and it is applied as the\nCommunist Party\u2019s ideology.&nbsp;&nbsp; Mainstream\nscholars take the position that Mao drew on the writings of Marx, Engels and\nLenin in elaborating his theory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before his involvement with Communism, he was\na librarian at the Rothschild sponsored University of Peking from 1919 to 1921,\nwhen John Dewey lectured on social and political philosophy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Dewey\u2019s lecture on\n\u201cSocial Philosophy and Political Philosopy\u201d greatly influenced Mao\u2019s &nbsp;thinking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOT MANY PEOPLE KNOW\nJOHN DEWEY ALSO INFLUENCED THE BOLSHEVIK REVOLUTION IN RUSSIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His philosophical\ninfluence on socialist educators in Russia can be traced back to the 1905\nrevolution, but since his most prominent followers did time in Czarist prisons\nthereafter, his ideas were not resurrected until after 1917.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Russian\nRevolution\" is the collective term for a pair of revolutions in Russia in\n1917, which dismantled the Tsarist autocracy and led to the eventual rise of\nthe Soviet Union.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW John Dewey\u2019s first\nsix books were rapidly translated into Russian by Jew Rotshchild.&nbsp; John Dewey\u2019s ideas were apparently judged as\ncrucial to the revolution as any weapon in the arsenal of the Red Army<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Dewey and the Jews\nof Soviet Union had a mutual admiration society going. In fact, the latter led\nthe former on a grand guided tour of the USSR in 1928.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The visit presaged the appearance of Dewey\u2019s\nsignature on a letter to President Franklin D. Roosevelt urging diplomatic\nrecognition of Stalin\u2019s Soviet state, which FDR granted<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current cause\ncelebre against Trump is his conditional statement that he might not accept the\nelection results if they appear to have been rigged. The presstitutes\nimmediately jumped on him for \u201cdiscrediting American democracy\u201d and for\n\u201cbreaking American tradition of accepting the people\u2019s will.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The discrepancies\nbetween exit polls and the vote count of the secretly programmed electronic\nvoting machines that have no paper trails are also legendary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is paper trail ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/evm-electronic-voting-machines-hacking.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/evm-electronic-voting-machines-hacking.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The presstitutes have\ngone all out to demonize both Trump and any mention of election rigging,\nbecause they know for a fact that the election will be stolen and that they\nwill have the job of covering up the theft. This time around with Trump have\nthe people\u2019s support it will blow up in their mangy faces<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IMPORTANT :&nbsp;&nbsp; Don\u2019t vote early. The purpose of early\nvoting is to show the One Percent how the vote is shaping up. From this\ninformation, the oligarchs learn how to program the electronic machines in\norder to elect the candidate that they want. Rigging a EVM can be done by even\na undergraduate student<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/08/2016-elections-russia-hack-how-to-hack-an-election-in-seven-minutes-214144\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2016/08/2016-elections-russia-hack-how-to-hack-an-election-in-seven-minutes-214144</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Last week, Symantec\nreleased the results of a simulated election it ran during the Black Hat\nconference in August using an electronic voting machine it bought at auction.\nThe company found numerous vulnerabilities in the machine that left it open to\nmanipulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Symantec warned that a\nlack of encryption on the system's removable storage device \"makes it\neasily exploitable, requiring only a simple device to reprogram the compact\nhard drive.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American voters will\ncast their ballots on November 8 using one of nearly two dozen different models\nof electronic voting machines -- manufactured by 15 companies. They all fall\ninto two general categories: Optical-Scan Paper Ballots and Direct Recording\nElectronic (DRE) Systems. In precincts using optical scan systems, voters mark\ntheir ballots in pencil and then feed them into a scanning device that records\nthe data and stores it electronically, while the paper ballot falls into a\nsecured box in the event officials have to manually recount the vote.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But security experts\nsay that DRE machines, which allow voters to select their candidate using a\npush-button or touchscreen system with vote counts stored on a internal hard\ndrive or removable storage, are easiest to exploit. Technology varies between\nmodels, but at least three widely used DRE systems are proven to be sitting\nducks for anyone with BASIC hacking skills.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone who knows how to\nprogram a chip card and purchases a simple $15 Raspberry Pi-like device, could\nsecretly reactivate their voter card while inside the privacy of a voting booth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In testimony in\nSeptember 2016, before a House subcommittee, one expert in voting machine\ntechnology said he could hack the Sequoia AVC Advantage in seven minutes --\nusing just a screwdriver and simple piece of malware he created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Andrew W. Appel, who\nteaches computer science at Princeton University, said the most dangerous\ninsecurities in DRE voting machines -- the Advantage, in particular -- allows\nan attacker to install a fraudulent vote-counting program to control the\ncomputer in the voting machine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The software I\nbuilt wasn't rocket science -- any competent computer programmer could write\nthe same code. Once it's installed, it could steal elections for years to\ncome,\" said Appel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Appel called on\nCongress to outlaw DRE machines immediately after the November election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To ensure integrity,\nmost DRE voting systems now produce an individual paper record of each vote --\nknown as a voter-verified paper audit trail -- which prints a paper ballot\nreflecting the voter's choice on the computer so it can be examined for\naccuracy. The paper drops into a ballot box in case of a recount.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Verified Voting said\neight out of ten of Americans will cast their ballot this year on an electronic\nvoting machine that produces some form of hard copy record of their vote. That\nleaves more than a dozen states using DRE machines this year without this paper\naudit technology. In five states, not a single voting machine will produce a\npaper audit trail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The billionaires name\nalso appeared in email exchanges from when Hillary Clinton was Secretary of\nState.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Chagoury is a CROOK and was refused a visa to\nenter the U.S. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2010, he was pulled\noff a private jet in Teterboro, N.J., and questioned for four hours because he\nwas on the Department of Homeland Security\u2019s no-fly list. He was subsequently\nremoved from the list and categorized as a \u201cselectee,\u201d meaning he can fly but\nreceives extra scrutiny, Homeland Security documents show. The agency later\nwrote to Chagoury to apologize \u201cfor any inconvenience or unpleasantness.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chagoury\u2019s company, the\nChagoury Group, pledged $1 billion to the Clinton Global Initiative in 2009,\nthe same year the Clinton Global Initiative awarded the Chagoury Group its\nannual prize for \u201csustainable development.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He came out in support of Barack Obama\u2019s presidential bid after the Clintons endorsed the Democratic winner.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) in the U.S. sued him for recovery of USD million he borrowed from First New York, a bank of which he was a director and which subsequently went bankrupt, Mr. Chatwal testified that he was a PAUPER with assets of only $2,600 and a cash balance of USD 100.<br />\n<br />\nWhen asked how he can have only 100 USD and live in ULTRA LUXURY this CRIMINAL without integrity said that the multi-million dollar luxury penthouse he lived in belonged to his brother, to whom he paid a monthly rent of USD 5,000, \u201cpursuant to an ORAL sub-lease,\u201d out of the USD 6,700 he and his wife earned every month as employees of a hotel and restaurant respectively.<br />\n<br />\nHE USED MANMOHAN SINGH TO FURTHER HIS POLITICAL AGENDAS\u2014INCULDING SELLING OUT INDIA IN THE NUCLEAR DEAL.<br />\n<br />\nChatwal openly boasted that he is responsible for the Nuclear deal which cut Bharatmata\u2019s feet.<br />\n<br />\nIndia commits to signing an Additional Protocol (PDF) -- which allows intrusive IAEA inspections -- on its civilian facilities.<br />\nIndia agrees to continue its moratorium on nuclear weapons testing.<br />\nIndia works toward negotiating a Fissile Material Cutoff Treaty (FMCT) with the United States banning the production of fissile material for weapons purposes.<br />\nIndia agrees to support international nonproliferation efforts.<br />\nU.S. companies will be allowed to build , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In March 2016, The Free Thought Project\nexamined Wikileaks searchable archive of Clinton\u2019s emails and found intimations\nof a close relationship with the infamous Rothschild family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Lynn Forester de Rothschild wrote an email on\nApril 18, 2010, in which she tells Hillary she would \u201clove to catch up\u201d \u2014 and\n\u201cI remain your loyal adoring pal.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Clinton responds, \u201clet\u2019s make that happen,\u201d\nand signs her response, \u201cMuch love, H.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">On September 23, 2010, Clinton emailed Lynn\nForester de Rothschild (an email chain marked by heavy redaction) saying, \u201cI\nwas trying to reach you to tell you and Teddy that I asked Tony Blair to go to\nIsrael as part of our full court press on keeping the Middle East negotiations\ngoing \u2026\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Rothschild responds, thanking Clinton for\n\u201cpersonally reaching out to us,\u201d and adds, \u201cYou are the best, and we remain\nyour biggest fans.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">This correspondence gives the greatest\ninsight into the fact that the Rothschild family works behind the scenes to use\ntheir enormous clout to forward a geopolitical agenda using their bought and\npaid for politicians as a means to an end.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">A January 9, 2012, email discusses a\nconference on the environment set to take place at Jacob Rothschild\u2019s \u201chistoric\nestate, Waddesdon.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">It\u2019s clear that while Hillary Clinton is a\npolitician who often attempts to publicly portray herself as a candidate\nlooking out for the interests of the common working American \u2014 a notion that\nhas been widely challenged during this election cycle due to her adamant\nrefusal to release the transcripts of her 12 speeches to various Wall Street\ninstitutions \u2013 for which she received almost $3 million dollars in\ncompensation, a sum greater than most Americans will earn in their lifetimes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-INpcX5HR_BI/WA8nrOCOLwI/AAAAAAABNSE/Vuugbt7MSu4iBRUqz7e5AJGsH4Yby_z_QCLcB/s1600/ie4mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The evidence of politicians for sale to the\nhighest bidder lends credibility to a 2014 study from Princeton University that\nrevealed the U.S. is not a republic or a democracy, but rather a Rothschild\u2019s oligarchy.\n</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;An\noligarchy is a form of government in which power resides in the hands of a small\nnumber of elites within a society.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
