, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Affordable Care Act\n(ACA), also called \"Obamacare,\" may be the biggest insurance scam in\nhistory. Rothschild\u2019s insurance companies have laughed all the way to the bank</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People get only the\namount of health care they can afford, rather than what they need. The ACA\ntakes the failed market-based system to a whole new level by forcing the\nuninsured to purchase private health plans and using the government to sell and\nsubsidize them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hilly Billy yanks are\nso stupid that they are manipulated into supporting the ACA and do not even\nknow they are being bamboozled. That is how scams work. Even after the con is\ncompleted, victims do not know they have been manipulated and ripped off<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A scam is a fraudulent\noperation designed to make money. A scam unfolds over time with a team of\nswindlers seeking to rob the victim without the victim ever knowing they have\nbeen scammed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vehicle for the ACA\ncon was the tech-savvy Rothschild sponsored political campaign of Barack Obama.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The candidate\npromised hope and change. Obama, who had supported single payer before running\nfor president, was able to point to all of the problems in the US health care\nsystem and excite people with the potential of a new leader who understood the\ncrisis and would fix it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After his election, the\ncampaign organized Health Care House Parties in December 2008\u2014the way AMWAY\nconned the Hilly Billy yanks . People were encouraged to invite friends and\nneighbors to their homes, and the Obama transition team provided the kosher materials.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/amway-merchants-of-pipe-dreams-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/amway-merchants-of-pipe-dreams-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The booklet that was\nused was tightly scripted to build support for the ACA rather than actually\nelicit citizen input on what kind of health system was desired.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this stage, the\nvictim is excited about the prospect and is filled with anticipation so their\njudgment is warped and caution is thrown away, setting them up to fall for the\nscam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the winter\nand spring of 2009, the Obama administration gave the appearance of bringing\nall of the \"stakeholders\" together to work for health reform. The\npresident held a White House Health Summit in March 2009, which included representatives\nfrom Rothschild's health insurance corporations, hospitals and Rosthchild's pharmaceutical companies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nonly groups that were not included, until there was a threat of protest, were\nthose who advocate for Medicare for all. The single-payer advocates did not\nspeak, but Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;insurance\nspokesperson opened and closed the White House summit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the spring,\nthe president and allies reassured the public that if they liked their health\ninsurance, they could keep it; that insurance would be made more affordable\n(not that health care would be more affordable); and that reform would aim for\nuniversal coverage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The convincer for many\nwho supported real health reform was \"the Public Option.\" The idea\nwas that the law would force the uninsured to purchase insurance but would\ninclude the choice of a public health insurance plan. The public was told that\nthis option would be more cost-effective than private insurance and, thus, less\nexpensive, which would make it more attractive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many were convinced\nthat a public option would become a Medicare-for-all system, that it was a\n\"back door\" to single payer. They were told that going straight to a\nsingle-payer health care system would be too difficult and that the public\noption was a first step. Health Care for America Now organized grass-roots\ngroups to put their energy into fighting for a public option, and many\nresponded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was real\nanimosity directed toward those who pointed out that from a policy standpoint a\npublic option made no sense. It was simply adding another insurance plan to an\nalready-complex and expensive system of hundreds of insurances and that, as had\noccurred time and again at the state level, it would attract those with the\ngreatest health needs and as a result would ultimately fail because of high\ncosts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What most people did\nnot understand at that point was that the public option was not only a\nnon-solution to the health care crisis but that it was not even destined to be\nin the final legislation. It was a \"bargaining chip\" to get health\ninsurers to accept regulations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hurrah phase of a\ncon involves some sort of crisis that must be overcome. This phase started in\nAugust 2009, when the Tea Party, backed by Americans for Prosperity (a Koch\nbrothers front group), came out very aggressively against the ACA at local town\nhalls.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They called it \"government-run\" and opposed its fictional\n\"Death Panels.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TYPICAL BACK SWING OF JOHN fuckin' GALT.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This served to energize the progressive\ngroups to rally around the president and come out strongly in favor of the law.\nRallies in favor of health reform were organized across the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Health reform advocates\nwere activated further to support the law as the House and Senate struggled to\ncome to consensus. As more aspects of the law that were important to health\nreform supporters were jettisoned, such as coverage for immigrants and\ninclusion of reproductive services, and the public option was whittled down to\nnothing, support for the law became a partisan statement of support for\nPresident Obama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Members of Congress who\nsupported the Medicare-for-all approach told us that they were going to\n\"hold their nose and vote for it.\" Progressive groups and media\nfeared that if the health bill did not become law, it would ruin the Democrats'\nchance to hold a majority in Congress in the midterm elections and would\ndestroy the president's chance to be re-elected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the\nfinal phase of the con is to make sure the victims do not realize they've been\nconned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama signed the ACA on\nMarch 23, 2010. Immediately the marketing began. The three words we heard the\nmost to describe it were universal, affordable and guaranteed. Of course, the\nACA is none of those. &nbsp; But members told yanks &nbsp;personally that if they told the\ntruth, they wouldn't be re-elected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progressive groups\nstarted the work of explaining the advantages of the new health law to the\npublic. The few positive aspects of the law were promoted without explaining\nthe big picture. Overall, the ACA is similar to other neoliberal economic\npolicies; it defunds and destroys our public health insurances and further\nprivatizes health care.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The end goal of the ACA\ncon, to make sure people do not realize they have been conned, is ongoing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As\nwe will see below, salespeople, often the same nonprofits who pushed the ACA,\nare getting big money to sell Rothschild\u2019s insurance with Madison Avenue\nmarketing manipulation tactics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the same time,\nleading single-payer advocacy groups fear further marginalization in their\ncommunities and so are afraid to tell the truth about Obamacare.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The public has\nbeen so hoodwinked by the partisan debate between Republicans and Democrats,\nbased on misinformation from both sides, that single-payer advocates are afraid\nif they tell the truth, their allies, many whom are Democrats, will push them\naway.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the truth has few emissaries, while the well-funded deceivers continue\nthe ACA con.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite their\nadvertising slogans, private insurers primarily exist to create profit for\ntheir investors or, in the case of \"nonprofit insurers,\" to pay\nexorbitant salaries to their executives. They care about health as much as Big\nOil cares about the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SHIP CAPTAINS REGULARLY\nHAD TO ATTEND SEMINARS ASHORE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN THE\nINSURANCE SECTION CAME , I USED TO WALK OUT\u2014ONLY MY SEAT USED TO BE EMPTY.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>FOR AT SEA WHEN INSURANCE COMES IN, TRUTH\nTAKES A MORTAL BLOW</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Health insurers make\ntheir profits from charging the highest premiums they can and by restricting\nand denying payment for care. They want to take in as much money as they can,\nwhile paying out as little on health care as possible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have many tools\nwith which to do this, and they've successfully skirted regulations for\ndecades. When they can't make a profit, they simply pull that product from the\nshelf and create new products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hilly Billy yanks\nhave been led to believe that the ACA has changed the behavior of health\ninsurers.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Health plans are\nsending hundreds of thousands of cancellation letters to people who buy their\nown coverage, frustrating some consumers who want to keep what they have and\nforcing others to buy more costly Rothschild\u2019s policies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insurers pay only for\ncovered services because stupid yanks don't understand that they will have to\npay for uncovered and out-of-network services themselves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People are likely to\nchoose the least-expensive plans without fully understanding that a serious\naccident or illness could bankrupt them even though they have insurance. And\nthe race to the bottom in coverage will affect everyone<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insurance companies\nalso can charge three times as much based on age. Because most pre-existing\nillness comes with age, this greatly undermines the protection of those with\npre-existing illness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s Insurance companies are excellent at gaming\nlaws and regulations, so yanks can expect more creative avoidance of people who\nactually need health care.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the highly\ntouted claims of the ACA con was that youths would be covered on their parents'\ninsurance until they are 26 years old.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most parents cannot\nafford the increased premiums that are required when more family members are\ncovered. As a result this promise has been one of little value, except to the\nwealthy - and to those selling the Obamacare con.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the selling\npoints of the ACA con was that it would limit how much people pay out of pocket\nfor health care. The insurance companies claimed that their computers were not\nset up to handle this change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">STUPID HILLY BILLY\nYANKS THINK THAT OBAMA BABY CARES MORE FOR THEIR HEALTH, THAN THE PROFITS OF\nROTHSCHILDs INSURANCE COMPANIES</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most egregious\naspect of the ACA is the individual mandate that those without health insurance\nwho do not qualify for public insurance such as Medicaid must purchase private\ninsurance or pay a penalty for being uninsured.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The public is being led to\nbelieve that the solution to the health care crisis is to increase the number\nof people who have insurance. This ignores the fact that having insurance does\nnot mean that patients will have access to or will be able to afford the health\ncare they need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACA required states\nto create new marketplaces for insurance called exchanges or else the federal\ngovernment would create the exchange. In essence, the federal government is\nusing billions of public dollars to finance the exchanges, hire people to sell\ninsurance and subsidize the purchases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine what a benefit it would be if\nthose billions of dollars were used instead to hire health providers and pay\nfor actual care.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">INDIANS MUST KNOW THAT\nA BIG PERCENTAGE OF THEIR TAXES ARE USED TO SUSTAIN PARASITES ( TAPE WORMS IN\nSTOMACH ) WHO DO NOT DO ANY USEFUL WORK.&nbsp;\n</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE IN ALGERIA , I\nASKED AN INTELLIGENT MAN.&nbsp; IF ALGERIA HAS\nTHE BIGGEST RESERVES OF GAS ON THE PLANET ( UNDER THE SAHARA DESERT SAND )\u2014WHY IS\nALGERIA POOR.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SAID ZIONIST JEW\nINSURANCE COMPANIES HAVE INTRODUCED TERROR IN ALGEIA , AND THE INSURANCE\nPREMIUMS ARE TOO HIGH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HULLO APCO MODI \u2013 HULLO\nARUN JAITLEY --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE KNOW YOUR GAME OF GIVING FDI TO ROTHSCHILDs INSURANCE\nCOMPANIES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A RETIRED GEORGE BUSH CAME ALL THE WAY TO\nINDIA TO SELL ROTHSCHILDs INSURANCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/gold-finger-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/gold-finger-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACA con is part of\na broader con Americans and people around the world are having inflicted on\nthem, the false idea that privatization is a better way to provide services\nthan government. Even though there is virtually no evidence to support this\nclaim and there has been a long history with many examples of\nprivatizationcosting more and providing less, this is a centerpiece of\nneoliberal economics. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians like\nPresident Obama and the leadership of the corporate duopoly who believe in\nmarket solutions are pushing privatization at home and through\nbig-business-rigged trade agreements like the Trans-Pacific Partnership.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fundamental flaw of\nthe ACA is that it entrenches a market-based system that treats health care as\na commodity and profit center for Wall Street. The big drivers of the rising\ncost of health care - insurance, pharmaceuticals and for-profit hospitals -\ncontinue. The wealth divide that is a major byproduct of neoliberal economics\nis institutionalized by law under the ACA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hilly Billy yanks must\nrecognize that ending the corporate domination of health care is part of\nbreaking the domination of big business over the US government and the economy.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Health care is at the center of the\nconflict of our times, the battle between the people and corporate interests,\nthe battle to put people and planet before profits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today even stupid Hilly\nBilly yanks will NOT deny that the Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;Insurance Companies were the driving force\nbehind the writing of the Affordable Care Act legislation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The health care\nindustry spent hundreds of millions of dollars lobbying for health care issues<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Essentially, the ACA was\ndesigned to write the for-profit health care system into law, increase\ncorporate profits, and to discourage people from demanding a health care system\nthat would actually provide real health care coverage for all.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACA wasn\u2019t\nwritten to fix a broken system \u2013 it was written to ensure that the broken\nsystem would be kept in place. After all, from the standpoint of the health\ncare industry, the system is working just fine for their profit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the public\ninsurance providers are enjoying a jump in their stock values and a protected\nrise in premiums, the normal conclusion is that Obamacare is the big winner in\nthe socialization of medicine. Insurance companies &nbsp;play divine with their clout of who qualifies\nfor payment of treatment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In May 2015, APCO\nbranded PM Narendra Modi, passed legislation allowing Rothschild\u2019s insurance\ncompanies &nbsp;to increase their stakes in\nlocal joint ventures from 26 per cent to 49 per cent, kicking off a mad scramble.\nInsurance in India refers to the market for insurance in India which covers\nboth the public and private sector organisations.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It is listed in the\nConstitution of India in the Seventh Schedule as a Union List subject, meaning\nit can only be legislated by the Central government. Modi govt has &nbsp;allowed Rosthchild\u2019s insurance companies to\nbuy up to 49 percent stake in India's domestic insurers without prior approval\nfrom the Foreign Investment Promotion Board (FIPB).&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Within 3 months of coming into power Modi\nGovt permitted 49 percent in its defence sector with FIPB approval. &nbsp;We had a specially created minister Arun\nJaitley \u2013 a mere lawyer by the Rajya Sabha backdoor, heading the ministry of\nFinance and the Defence.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Six years ago, President\nObama passed the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act. This controversial\nlaw (simply called \"Obamacare\") was supposed to make it easier and\ncheaper for Americans to buy health insurance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obamacare made\ninsurance more expensive, going to the doctor more complicated, and created\nbizarre economic incentives that have nothing to do with delivering health care\nto the people that need it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obamacare is nearly\nimpossible to escape. Under Obamacare, everyone in the U.S. must prove they\nhave health coverage through a health insurance plan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a person is\nineligible for government coverage like Medicare or Medicaid, they must buy a\nprivate health insurance policy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you don\u2019t buy\ninsurance, you have to pay a fine. This has forced millions of Americans to buy\ninsurance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">70% of Americans had\nhealth insurance in 2010. Today, more than 92% of Americans have coverage,\nwhich is an all-time high.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As of now &nbsp;Obamacare is funneling over $100 billion to Rosthchild\u2019s\ninsurance companies.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_60B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; But does the public not even try to wonder why a foreign government would want to give an award to a citizen of another country. Does India hand out these types of awards to the French, English, Pakistani, Bangladeshi etc. It is ludicrous at best. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1477672949614#c4540266450340024946\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 28, 2016 at 10:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_102MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n########## SUBJECT -- TATA CORUS DEAL WITH EX-OPIUM DRUG RUNNING PARTNER JEW ROTHSCHILD AS ADVISOR ##############<br />\n<br />\nTata steel is the world's lowest cost producer of steel, while Corus's cost of production is almost twice that of Tata Steel\u2026\u2026<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br />Jew Rothschild\u2019s media fooled Tata , by endless propaganda of a WIN-WIN deal\u2026\u2026..&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n#### higher end markets and acquiring sophisticated customer base BLAH BLAH\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\n###### The company will have better geographical mix. Tata steel will have access to 40 countries across the globe, transforming it into a major global player from a domestic player BLAH BLAH KOSHER BLAH \u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\n#### Tata will consolidate in the fragmented steel sector after Mittal Steel's $31 bn acquisition of rival Arcelor. BLAH BLAH FUCK1N\u2019 BLAH\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\n### Corus does not have any mining asset, and hence link-up with a low-cost producer like Tata with access to raw materials ( we know how this happens in India ) will enable Corus to compete on a global scale. BLAH BLAH KOSHER FUCK1N\u2019 BLAH \u2026..<br />\n<br />\n#######Corus has strong relationships with customers in continental Europe, especially in high margin segments like construction, automobile and aerospace industry, the benefits of which eventually will be passed on to Tata Steel\u2026.. ONLY AN IDIOT WILL BELIEVE THIS ROTHSCHILD PROPAGANDA \u2026..<br />\n<br />\n##### The combined entity will enjoy synergies in procurement, distribution and logistics, it is not clear as to how and over what time period, the production costs are likely to come down. In medium to short term, synergies are less likely to be seen, but long-term prospects are good..GORA KOSHER GAAND SYNERGY \u2013TEE HEEEEEE \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !........<br />\n<br />\nSCREWED ROYALLY BY A FORMER OPIUM DRUG RUNNING PARTNER\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1984, when the Government of India arrested Union Carbide Chairman JEW Warren Anderson for his role in causing the Bhopal gas disaster, J.R.D. Tata with a French Rothschild mother was one of the few Indians to condemn the arrest\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn November 2006, Ratan Tata offered to bail out Union Carbide, and facilitate investments by Carbide\u2019s new owner Dow Chemical, by leading a charitable effort to clean-up the toxic wastes abandoned by Carbide in Bhopal\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2005, prompted by the corporate-friendly overtures of the Manmohan Singh Government and the Bush administration, business houses in the US and India set up the US-India CEO Forum comprising a select coterie of US and Indian CEOs\u2014approved by Jew Rothschild\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nTatas own and operate the only private city in India. The Rothschild owned steel city of Jamshedpur, which was founded by FRONT Jamsetji Tata in 1904, is one of few Indian cities that does not have a municipality or any local elected Government\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nIn the 1920s , when it was still called Tata Iron and Steel Company, TISCOs largely tribal workers fought pitched battles with the Rothschild\u2019s Kosher whites and Parsi management. ..<br />\n<br />\nWork conditions and the right to organise were important rallying issues, and over the years, the company developed a reputation for union-busting often by violent means\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe 74th Amendment to the Constitution of India devolves powers to locally elected urban bodies such as municipalities, and requires that all states enact laws to hold regular elections to such local bodies..<br />\n<br />\nConverting the Tata-controlled town to a democratically controlled municipality met with stiff resistance from Tata Steel who seemed to suggest that a benevolent rule, such as Tata Steel, was more desirable than a democratic set-up\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY IN THE INTERNET AGE ALL KNOW THE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING PARTNERSHIP BETWEEN ROTHSCHILD AND TATA..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.nbcnews.com/politics/donald-trump/michael-wolff-says-donald-trump-least-credible-person-who-has-n834921<br /><br />ALL THIS PROPAGANDA WONT WORK<br /><br />IT WORKED WITH NIXON-- IT WONT WORK WITH TRUMP<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/richard-m-nixon-greatest-american.html<br /><br />Nixon made no secret of the fact that he disliked Rosthchilds KOSHER media metropolitan media.<br /><br />On Aug. 9, 1974, Nixon became the first U.S. president to resign--FOOLED by rothschilds media that he has LOW approval ratings<br /><br />Trump knows his support base unlike Nixon<br /><br />Nixon developed an alarming skill at speaking over the head of the media directly to the American people, taking it upon himself to voice the hopes and fears of what he termed \u201cthe silent majority.\u201d<br /><br />Nixon had a overwhelming victory, carrying the Electoral College 521 to 17 and picking up over 60 percent of the popular vote--yet he got fooled by Jew Rothschild's media into resigning<br /><br />From the start, the KOSHER media interests which spoke for the SHADOW establishment treated the Nixon presidency as in some metaphysical sense an outlaw regime<br /><br />The powerful KOSHER media barons ( agents of INNER Bilderberg club ) felt themselves morally and constitutionally entitled to snatch back the power Nixon had secured from the voters by (as they tom tommed) chicanery. All they needed was a pretext--which they cooked up.<br /><br />Nixon played into their hands. His deep sense of insecurity, reinforced by what was now almost a paranoid fear of the EVIL press, led him to confuse a perfectly justified desire to prevent the media from publishing state secrets\u2014as they had done in the case of the Pentagon Papers and other documents\u2014with the routine skulduggery of party-political espionage.<br /><br />The result was the Watergate mess.<br /><br />In essence, Watergate was a mess and nothing more.<br /><br />The notion that he plotted an assault on the Constitution and the rule of law is a malicious invention of COMMIE JEWS.<br /><br />Nixon's defeat is a frightening example of how the will of a popular majority can be frustrated and overturned by the skillful manipulation of EVIL kosher main stream media<br /><br />This was the first media PUTSCH in history, as ruthless and anti-democratic as any military coup by bemedaled generals with their sashes and sabers.<br /><br />TRUMP USES TWITTER SKILFULLY. HE IS A BUSINESS MAN AND KNOWS HOW AND WHEN TO SHOOT THROUGH HIS HOLSTER--AT THE KOSHER MEDIA BASTARDS WHO TRY THE SAME \"IMPEACHMENT \" CHICANERY ON HIM , THE WAY THEY DID WITH NIXON AND SUCCEEDED<br /><br />Capt Ajit Vadakayil says this-- This planet must know that Nixon's patriotism took precedence over his self-interest, and he cut short the national agony by a voluntary abdication.<br /><br />In defeat Nixon was dignified and not at all disposed to recriminate.<br />VERY FEW PEOPE ON THIS PLANET UNDERSTANDS US SHADOW GOVT POLITICS.<br /><br />TRUMP SWEARS TO DRAIN THE SWAP--BUT HEY TRUMP, DO YOU KNOW WHERE THE DRAIN HOLE IS ? DO YOU KNOW HOW LARGE THE SWAMP IS AND HOW SMALL THE DRAIN HOLE IS.<br /><br />TRUMP-- I HAD WARNED YOU, ONLY \"CLEANIING THE AEGIAN STABLES METHOD\" WILL WORK-- A TSUNAMI -- A PURGE OF MIND BOGGLING PROPORTIONS<br /><br />Most ex-Presidents are anxious to offer their advice to those who succeed them, and find themselves consulted often out of mere courtesy . Nixon\u2019s advice, by contrast, was eagerly solicited .<br /><br />Nixon was the best of them all-- and had class.<br /><br />Read all 11 parts of the SUNK post ( by Google algorithms ) below<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/donald-trump-for-president-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />THE POST ABOVE WILL MARK A WATERSHED -- EL FUTURO<br /><br />THE TRUTH YOU DONT UNDERSTAND IS MORE DANGEROUS THAN A LIE.<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 13.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">A couple of years ago, after I came home on\nvacation, I had gone for a function with my wife. There I met my younger son\u2019s\nclassmate\u2019s father.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">During the course of our polite conversation he\nasked me I f I knew that my son is getting bullied in school.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I said \u201c&nbsp;&nbsp;He is the tallest and\nheaviest guy in his class- how can anybody&nbsp;&nbsp;dare to bully him.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">He replied \u201c Your wife will know the bully, he\nis the class leader and 4 years older than the rest of the class \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">On the drive back home I asked my wife , whether\nshe knew anything about it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">She said he has never come home with torn\nclothes. I asked her about missing pens , not wanting to go to school , or some\nsigns like that.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">She said&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c Yes, he does NOT like to\ngo to school.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sometimes he comes back with his compass box or pen\nmissing .&nbsp;&nbsp;I have already bought three new ones in the last 3\nmonths.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain days he comes back home without eating his lunch\npacked in the tiffin box. He appears disturbed while studying at home . But the\nclass leader is the boy who gives me notes , whenever Aashik has missed school.\nPoor chap, his parents are in Dubai and he is all alone , staying with some far\noff relatives \u201c.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GWwaI-hb_Bg/TjMLAZNWcCI/AAAAAAAAEws/nT7RRe74ER8/s1600/imagesCAG4F0HP.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_43\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1067\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GWwaI-hb_Bg/TjMLAZNWcCI/AAAAAAAAEws/nT7RRe74ER8/s1600/imagesCAG4F0HP.jpg\"\n href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GWwaI-hb_Bg/TjMLAZNWcCI/AAAAAAAAEws/nT7RRe74ER8/s1600/imagesCAG4F0HP.jpg\"\n style='width:174pt;height:162.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image002.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"imagesCAG4F0HP\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GWwaI-hb_Bg/TjMLAZNWcCI/AAAAAAAAEws/nT7RRe74ER8/s1600/imagesCAG4F0HP.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"217\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image002.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_43\" width=\"232\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">At home , I confronted my son . He came out with\nthe truth, after some arm twisting .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">My son was the butt of all\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp;practical jokes of the bully --&nbsp;&nbsp;he would throw things\nat him in class. \u2013 he would be teasing him in front of the whole class and\ngirls constantly\u2014</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I told my wife \u201c Tomorrow , though it is a\nholiday for younger kids --first thing in the morning we will be going to the\nschool and I will speak to the Principal and class teacher \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">At school I told the\nPrincipal&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c I want to speak to you in front of my son\u2019s\nteachers.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is about my son getting bullied in your\nschool.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If I don\u2019t see a good receptive attitude from you, I\nwill put unbearable heat on the school \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Pretty soon we had 3 teachers in the Principals\nroom.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I asked them if they knew my son was getting\nbullied.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">All the 3 of them said&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c Yes!. We\nthough you knew. Your son get bullied by children half his size , just because\nhe does NOT retaliate, so they get encouraged \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; I have taught him personally how to destroy anybody\nin physical contact OR even to kill a fully grown up adult. But I have told him\nnever ever to attack anybody,&nbsp;&nbsp;So may be this is why he is getting\nbullied. He can do it very easily, but then what if\nthe bully relatiates by poking his eye with a compass needle ? \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt;\">I said \u201c I would rather have a one eyed son ,\nthan a coward with my blood running in his veins . This bully works safe in the\nassumption that there will be NO relatiation .&nbsp;&nbsp;At his age of 16, he\nwants to impress all the 13 year old girls , by taking on a bigger\nchild.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He suffers from resentment as his parents have left him\nalone and are in Dubai\" .&nbsp;</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 18.0pt;\">\"&nbsp;Bullying gives him release from his\nfrustrations.&nbsp; This is a easy way out to displace internal aggression\n.&nbsp;&nbsp;It makes him feel empowered.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Teasing, playing\npractical jokes, throwing things at you,&nbsp;&nbsp;hiding personal\nbelongings,&nbsp; is all part of the bully\u2019s tactics .&nbsp;&nbsp;The only way\nout is to take him head on , just once , without hurting him physically \u201c</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">My son cried bitterly , for I was his ultimate\nhero, and had never beaten him or spoke to him rudely till then.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Next day\u2014he went to school .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">My son bent him double, picked him off the\nground whirled him around to upset his inner ear cochlea balance, and threw him\n8 feet away. He lay there for a couple of minutes&nbsp;&nbsp;totally dazed ,\npicked himself up and came charging . This time my son palmed his jaw, jerked\nhis head backwards to upset the inner ear spirit level again, and shoved him so\nhard that he went flying again . It took some time for him regain his balance\nget up and slink away .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">That was it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The girls , two dozen of them were the first to\nstart clapping , and then the rest of the class followed .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">This was what all of them wanted. Before he left\nschool for the day , this 16 year old bully taunted my son&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c Next\ntime you mother asks me for notes ,&nbsp;&nbsp;I wont give it to her!\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The word spread&nbsp;&nbsp;all over school like\nwild fire \u2013 Aashik has beaten up the school bully.&nbsp;&nbsp;This came to my\nwife from several sources. Few parents thanked my wife as the previous year 3\nchildern left the school, unable to face this type of harassment. Complaining\nto the teachers made NO difference as the bully's parents were wealthy people\nfrom Dubai, and close to a school board member.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I told my son \u201c After this man finishes, I want\nyou to go on stage and ask for one more tile and break it front of the whole\nschool&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;I don\u2019t care if you break your bone\n\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp;make sure you do it \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">His sweet spot was hard like steel \u2014 having\npounded it on the hard sand bag a thousands of times over the years. The sweet\nspot bone micro fractures and gets mended several times over , and thus gets\ntough.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">This art is something I had taught my son very\nearly in life \u2013to use the sweet spot 2 inches off the elbow ( toward the palm )\nand smash the brick stack with lightning speed , arm back swing like a\nnanchaku, and using FULL body weight for follow through.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">IT IS ALLOWED ONLY ON CONCRETE, &nbsp;FOR\nDEMONSTRATIONS</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">&nbsp;--&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">DON'T GO TO THE ELECTRIC CHAIR BY BEING A\nFUCKIN'&nbsp;IDIOT !</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Only fools break bricks with a wrist chop, as\nthere are too many bones and cartilages at the tender wrist. A punch or chop\ncan never be hard enough.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The next day my wife\u2019s friend call up and says .\n\u201c Do you know that Aaskik has become famous in school by out smashing the black\nbelt Karate instructor? \u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So in the evening my son comes back with the\nlook of a cat who swallowed all the cream .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
