line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">My idea of a holiday was fast flowing clear\nwater through rocks. Just lie down , get a free flowing water massage, relax in\ntotal privacy, with your family&nbsp;&nbsp;\u2014</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Every time my elder son used to ask me \u201c Daddy\nwhy do you take that dagger with you? \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I&nbsp;&nbsp;used to reply \u201c One day , you will\nsee me using it.&nbsp;&nbsp;Till&nbsp;&nbsp;then patience , son !\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So while on holiday somewhere at the Karnataka\nborder, I stopped the car to buy some cold Coke and chocolates.&nbsp;&nbsp;On\nthe wall opposite the street , some youngsters were sitting \u2013about 8 of them .\nAs soon as they saw me and my spaced out beard , my wife and niece \u2014they\nstarted making funny noises and yodeling catcalls.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So I told my elder son \u201c Now the time has come\nto show you what magic this dagger can do.&nbsp;&nbsp;I will raise my arms when\nI am out of this store and pretend to yawn with my hands high in the air. At\nthat time this dagger will pop out from underneath my hiked up T\nshirt.&nbsp;&nbsp;Just watch , soak it in, and let me know later what you saw \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Later after we drove off , my son totally\nexcited cried&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c Daddy, you should have seen their faces, when they\nsuddenly saw your knife.&nbsp;&nbsp;They all became silent and were sitting\nlike stones \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I said \u201c Well, none of them bargained for the\nfact that they could lose their lives on that very wall, on which they were all\nso merry a few minutes ago&nbsp;&nbsp;!\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-czZq2flLQNY/TjML2p8bnmI/AAAAAAAAExM/vUpGn3wjpsc/s1600/imagesCAKKUH8S.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_33\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1057\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-czZq2flLQNY/TjML2p8bnmI/AAAAAAAAExM/vUpGn3wjpsc/s1600/imagesCAKKUH8S.jpg\"\n href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-czZq2flLQNY/TjML2p8bnmI/AAAAAAAAExM/vUpGn3wjpsc/s1600/imagesCAKKUH8S.jpg\"\n style='width:140.25pt;height:201.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image014.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"imagesCAKKUH8S\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-czZq2flLQNY/TjML2p8bnmI/AAAAAAAAExM/vUpGn3wjpsc/s1600/imagesCAKKUH8S.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"269\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image014.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_33\" width=\"187\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Let me give another example of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">\u201cshowing grave intent\u201d.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">7 months ago, my elder son had just come home\nfrom Cornell during his end of semester Christmas\n2010&nbsp;&nbsp;vacation.&nbsp;&nbsp;Myself , my wife and two children aged 23\nand 16 went for a movie at a theatre in Calicut showing a 3D movie .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The theatre was full .&nbsp;&nbsp;There were 5\nrowdie youngsters at the back row of the balcony making loud sounds, whistling\n, passing loud uncouth remarks , even breaking their chairs \u2014we could hear the\ncracking sounds.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Immediately my wife held on to my arm, and said\n\u201c You are NOT gonna confront them . They are just having a ball, in a group. I\nam telling you. Meri kasam! \u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">She held on to my arm so strong that that spot\ntook 2 weeks to recover from compressed nerves and damaged muscle fibres.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">At half time interval,&nbsp;&nbsp;as soon as I\nsaw this gang going out for a smoke, I made an excuse that I have to go and\ntake a leak.&nbsp;&nbsp;And then I doubled back to the spot where these trouble\nmakers were sitting in a group , smoking and generally having a ball. They had\ntheir tails up, as all were giving them a wide berth.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So I went to them and said \u201c After the interval\n, when the movie starts,&nbsp;&nbsp;I don\u2019t want to hear you guys at all\n--&nbsp;&nbsp;If I hear you breathe , just see what I do to you.&nbsp;&nbsp;By\nthe way, I am NOT police \u2014 I sit in the front row with my wife and two\nsons&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">When I came back to my seat my wife and two sons\nasked me \u201c We know you talked to those men .What did you tell them?\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I told the truth \u201c I told them that I don\u2019t want\nto hear them breathe. I did NOT tell them what I will do to them if they\ndisobey\u2014 that is their problem to figure it out&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;Bullies\nalways work on the preconceived notion that there will NOT be a severe price to\npay.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">&nbsp;It is this feeling\nof safety which propels them \u201c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">20 minutes after the movie started again, the\ngroup of 5 quietly melted away in the darkness.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Later my elder genius son , who was never a fan\nof my tough acting , \u201ctaking on the world alone \u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;tactics , told his\nmother in private&nbsp;&nbsp;at the airport&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201d There was only one man\nin that&nbsp;&nbsp;movie hall holding hundreds , who could have silenced that\nrowdy gang,&nbsp;&nbsp;and he did it! \u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Now let me talk about \"</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">bullying at the workplace \"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Before going to Cornell for his ME in computer\nscience, he worked for the biggest computer software company in India for 6\nmonths-- just to get work experience, till he left India.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">He stayed with a brilliant Bihari boy , together\nin a rented flat.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So one day my son called me up and asked me if I\nhave some tips for painful stomach ulcers. He said his flatmate, suffers from\nit.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">So i wanted to know what type of food he eats.\nMy son said he has rarely eaten with him , that he goes to office by 7 AM and\ncomes back at midnight, no Saturdays and Sundays .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I had a piece of advise--&nbsp;&nbsp;I told my\nson never to get&nbsp;USED.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">He replied that he goes to office at 9AM and\ncomes back by 6 PM-- but the Bihari friend , was being used by his female\nboss.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">She would constantly shout at him , she would\nwork only between 9 to 5 will NOT come on Saturdays / Sundays . And that all\nthe projects were powered by the fertile brains of his friend -- but she took\nall the credit personally , as trainees don't count.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I said \" Tell your friend , that I told him\nthis.&nbsp; Never ever get used.&nbsp; And this type of thing is NOT gonna help\nhis ulcers. He MUST confront this Cruella De Ville.\"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">He said \" His friend confronted her .&nbsp;\nHe told her that he would report to her boss, that she does NOT have any brains\n, has&nbsp;NO dang clue what is happening , that she cannot understand the big\npicture or small picture of current ongoing high profile project with a major\nUS software company, that she is just a parasite / middleman in the work place,\nbut yet&nbsp;hogging all the team effort credit ,&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">but no more !\".</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Wonder of wonders--&nbsp; that very hour she\napplied for 6 months of official long leave and left the office.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">I guess she knew what she was worth. The only\nway this pretender female&nbsp;boss could continue was by twisting the arm of\nher team, by harassing, shouting, threatening --</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">You are entitled to say NO to such mindless abuse.</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; ( His target had shifted from my friend to me)<br />\n<br />\nHe kicked my foot as i was dribbling the ball, so i kicked the ball right into\nhis face - he hurt his nose.<br />\n<br />\nLater he tried to push me down when my back was turned, but i did not fall and\ni was able to keep my balance - may be from all the adrenaline from playing\nfootball.<br />\n<br />\nThen i chased him half the way through the foot ball field and threw him to the\nground, i did not realize i was growling. , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><b><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/bully-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1385746760344#c5156068134122427970\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">November 29, 2013 at 11:09 PM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hi sh,<br />\n<br />\nthere is a difference between light headedness and vertigo.<br />\n<br />\nin lightheadedness you may feel dizzy, but your surroundings do NOT move.\nlightheadedness often goes away or improves when you lie down. lightheadedness\nis often a momentary drop in blood pressure when you get up too fast from your\nseat , and blood flow to your head suddenly becomes less .<br />\n<br />\nvertigo is a feeling that you or your surroundings are moving when there is no\nactual movement. you may feel as though you are spinning, whirling, falling, or\ntilting. when you have severe vertigo, you may feel very nauseated . You will\nhave trouble walking or standing, and you may lose your balance and fall.<br />\n<br />\nvertigo occurs when there is conflict between the signals sent to the brain by\nvarious balance- and position-sensing systems of the body.<br />\n<br />\na portion of the inner ear cochlea is a spirit level that detect motion and\nchanges in position.<br />\ninjury to or diseases of the inner ear can send false signals to the brain\nindicating that the balance mechanism of the inner ear (labyrinth) detects\nmotion. if these false signals conflict with signals from the other balance and\npositioning centers of the body, vertigo may occur.<br />\n<br />\nvision gives you information about your position and motion in relationship to\nthe rest of the world--and this is one area of conflict with the inner ear\nspirit level.<br />\n<br />\nIf you have vertigo, do not lie flat on your back. prop yourself up slightly to\nrelieve the spinning sensation.<br />\n<br />\nthere are crystals of calcium carbonate within inner ear fluid that pull on\nsensory hair cells during movement and so stimulate the vestibular nerve to\nsend positional information to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nsymptoms can accompany vertigo, including hearing loss, tinnitus, nausea,\nvomiting or a feeling of fullness in the ear.<br />\n<br />\npositional vertigo is a type of dizziness that occurs when a person rolls in\nbed, bends over, or looks up. it is caused by crystals in the inner ear that\nare out of their normal position, and is easily resolved in most cases by a\nsimple roll procedure.<br />\n<br />\nwatch the youtube video below-<br />\n<br />\nhttp://youtu.be/QikUTAmeE0M Epley for Dizziness<br />\n<br />\ndrink plenty of fluids--have coriander in the curry. sambhar is full of it.<br />\n<br />\ndo not try to read when symptoms occur. avoid bright lights.<br />\n<br />\nfeeling seasick at sea, is a problem resulting from a miscommunication between\na healthy visual system and a healthy inner ear system.<br />\n<br />\nin this circumstance, the ears are telling the brain that there is movement,\nwhile the eyes may be seeing the fixed surroundings of the cabin. the inner ear\ncochlea is filled with liquid. microscopic hairs called cilia project out into\nthis liquid and they release a chemical neurotransmitter when stimulated<br />\n<br />\nchanges in visual acuity, glaucoma, and cataracts are examples of visual\nproblems that in some individuals may be enough to give them a balance\ndisorder.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nwhen walking, focus on distant objects. when riding in a car, try to sit in the\nfront seat. Look out the window at a fixed point. when going around curves,\nlook at a distant object beyond the curve.<br />\n<br />\nuse a walking stick for reassurance-- .and touch (tactile) orientation.<br />\n<br />\navoid activities that move the head up and down repetitively. try to avoid\nkeeping the head tilted back for long periods of time, for example dusting\nabove your head.<br />\n<br />\nconsult your doctor for medication.<br />\n<br />\nto be frank-- yesterday i gave my gym coach ( who keeps following me like a\npoodle to gain some knowledge ) the INNER EAR vertigo KALARI tretment. doubled\nhim over, picked him clean off the ground, whirled him around thrice and just\ndeposited him on the floor.<br />\n<br />\nso today just two hour back he was narrating to me ( with a sheepish grin )\nthat after 3 hours when he took the bus ride back home from the gym , he could\nNOT stand up as he felt the whole bus going round and round.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" target=\"_self\"><span style=\"color: #888888;
